title: 勇敢的唱吧！孩子
name: Tang Hui Kung
bio: La Voce Choir was founded in April 2006 by some 30 teenage choristers, who were driven by their love of choral music to set up the new choir. Coached and conducted by Mr. LimHock Siong and Madam Tang Hui Kung, La Voce Choir brings together the vast, collective experience of its members who previously sung with well-known and award-winning choirs. The choir has a wide repertoire of traditional, folk, classical as well as modern arrangements and this versatile choir can also perform in a variety of languages.

event.title: Connecting Dots
event.description:
In life’s journey, we come across with a myriad of situations, cross roads, and we meet many people. Some of them left an indelible footprint into our lives; some just fade away like the morning dew after the sun rises. If we see it on a different view, these are like Dots, dots that connect us along our own journey of our Life. The experience, moments and memories that some people leave us with, these are the kind of stories or ideas that ‘Connecting Dots’ is all about for this year’s theme. We have invited a group of outstanding individuals, all are prominent in their own field to come together and connect their dots with us. 

We hope their moments; their experiences will open up your own eyes, move your heart and soul. Let these ‘dots’, connect you to re-ignite your passion, dreams and inspire you to connect the dots of your own life.

translations.title: 點滴串聯
translations.description:
人生中某些时刻，所遇到的人和事，看似微不足道，然而有可能这些点和滴其实正在影响着我们的一生。在我们人生旅程不论是顺是逆，遭遇
是甜是苦，那都是人生求之不得的宝贵经验，而带来启发与觉悟，换化成生命的养分。今年我们就以点滴串联（Connecting Dots）作为年度
主题，邀请来自不同领域热爱这片土地的讲者，分别跟我们分享他们的生活态度，对这片土地的关系如何共创共生。是时候了，让我们一起寻
回共有的感动。

The choir has a wide repertoire of traditional, folk, classical as well as modern arrangements and this versatile choir can also perform in a variety of languages.

translations.title: 勇敢的唱吧！孩子
translations.name: 陈惠群老师
translations.bio: 巴生泰雷嘉吉他学院院长。 89年毕业于芙蓉中华独中，92年以最佳学生奖毕业于马来西亚艺术学院音乐系。主修声乐，副修钢琴。2006年4月，成立La Voce Choir爱韵合唱团，并担任该合唱团指导兼指挥之一。 2008年，1月成立泰雷嘉少儿合唱团。 爱韵合唱团 La Voce Choir 成立于2006年4月，由30余名雪隆区的青少年组成。 此合唱团由林福祥老师和陈惠群老师担任指导兼指挥。多年来爱韵合唱团尝试不同的语言和曲风的歌曲如：民谣、现代音乐、爵士曲风等且不断的在每场演出中寻求突破并为观众再来惊喜。
translations.introduction: 爱韵合唱团成立于2006年4月份，大约由30名爱好唱歌的知音组成。此合唱团由林福祥老师和陈惠群老师担任指导兼指挥，并由雪隆区的青少年所组成。多年来爱韵合唱团尝试不同的语言和曲风的歌曲如：民谣、现代音乐、爵士曲风等且不断的在每场演出中寻求突破并为观众再来惊喜。 这一次，爱韵合唱团将为大家呈现一系列耳熟能详、朗朗上口的曲子。

title: 梦想的天空，繁星点点
name: Goh Boon Peng
bio: Graduated from National Taiwan University. Founder of ‘MyStartr’, Malaysia’s first funding platform for creative projects. The MyStartr’s program, which is ‘Crown Funding’, is a collective effort consists of individuals that networks and pool their resources usually via the internet to support efforts initiated by creative individuals or organizations.Through this, many creative ideas could be shared to the community. To date: Mystartr has 12 successful funding cases.
introduction: Goh Boon Peng shared with us how MyStartr helps people realize their dreams through the cloud-based platform, using the power of everyone to pool small amounts into a usable fund, so that the dream can take the first step. With the efforts of everyone, we can accomplish what everyone can do, and build up Malaysia’s cultural and creative heritage step by step!

translations.title: 梦想的天空，繁星点点
translations.name: 吴文彬
translations.bio: 毕业于国立台湾大学计算机系。在2012年成立了圆梦工厂，马来西亚第一个创意项目群众集资金的平台。群众集资它仿效社会慈善事业的做法，是以个人向网友募集项目资金的模式。群众集资利用互联网和Facebook传播的特性，让小企业、艺术家或个人对公众展示他们的创意，争取大家的关注和支持，进而获得所需要的资金援助。至今圆梦工厂已累积12个成功案例。
translations.introduction: 吴文彬和我们分享圆梦工场如何透过云端平台助人圆梦，以众人的力量，由小额集合成一笔可用的资金，从而让梦想跨出第一步。众人之力，完成众人之事，一步一脚印地垫厚马来西亚的文化和创意的底蕴！

title: 非一般的身教 ～ 无语良师
name: Dr. Chin Kin Fah
bio: Professor Dr. Chin Kin Fah is one of few foremost laparoscopic surgeons in our country currently serving as Professor & Laparoscopic Consultant Surgeon in Department of Surgery, Faculty of Medicine, University Malaya Medical Centre, University Malaya. He is the pioneer of ‘SILENT MENTOR Program in Malaysia’, a humanity program that encourage people to come forward, donate their body after their demise for betterment and benefit of Medical Education & Research. Many specialists, intern doctors & medical students will use the donated remains as cadaver.
introduction: Professor Dr. Chin Kin Fah talks to us about the great love of the Speechless Teacher and the extraordinary dedication of great love. Tzu Chi honors body donors as “Great Body Teachers”. Body donors are not only courageous people who give up their lives, but also “teachers of the body” and “speechless mentors” to physicians and medical students, as they utilize the last use of their lives and dedicate their useless bodies to medical education and cultivation.

translations.title: 非一般的身教 ～ 无语良师
translations.name: 陈庆华医生
translations.bio: 陈庆华教授是国内少有的微创腹腔镜内视镜手术专家, 现任马来亚大学医学系外科教授及微创手术主治医师，微创内视镜模拟手术培训中心(MILES Training Centre) 总监及马来西亚无语良师计划首要推手。陈庆华教授放弃在英国的稳定生活回归大马，把他所擅长的微创手术技术带回大马，提升本地的医学发展。
translations.introduction: 陈庆华教授和我们谈无语良师的大爱和非一般的大爱奉献。慈济尊称遗体捐赠者为 “大体老师”。遗体捐赠者, 发挥生命最后的使用权, 化无用的死后身躯, 奉献医学教育培育良医, 他们不仅是生命的勇者、舍身的菩萨, 也是医师及医学生的 “大体老师” 与“无语良师”。

title: 留住星的那一刻
name: William Chin Wei Loon
bio: Graduated in University of Malaysia with BSC in Physics, Holds a masters degree in Science and Solar Physics. Experienced researcher and avid amateur astronomer, he dabbled into photography, taking pictures of the celestial heaven the stars. William Chin was selected to be the vice president of the Astrophotography Group of Malaysia. He is also the winner of the astrophotography competition in the 1st USM National Astronomy Convention 2005. His works are published in “Southern Skyscape” The Sky and Telescope magazine, “Pleaides in Taurus” and “Nebulas in Orion” The Night Sky magazine and “Jupiter Drifts by” The Sky and Telescope magazine.
introduction: The starry sky in Malaysia is the most beautiful scenery that William Chin & Gradient Lok have ever seen. However, many Malaysians have always misunderstood that only abroad can see the starry sky. In fact, there are many places in Malaysia where you can see the starry sky. This time Let them introduce and share the starry sky they saw in Malaysia.

translations.title: 留住星的那一刻
translations.name: 陈伟伦
translations.bio:
陈伟伦毕业于马来亚大学物理学士，他是一位经验丰富皆热爱天文的研究员，他目前在马大空间物理实验室当研究助理，负责分析与研究天文观测资料，他的最大兴趣是天文摄影，喜欢拍摄各种天体和天象，如月球、行星，甚至遥远的深空天体；目前担任马来西亚天影社副社长，他也获得2005年USM（槟城理大） 国家天文学研讨会的天文摄影比赛优胜者。

陈伟伦作品有包括了“Southern Skyscape” The Sky and Telescope magazine, “Pleaides in Taurus” and “Nebulas in Orion” The Night Sky magazine and “Jupiter Drifts by” The Sky and Telescope magazine.
translations.introduction: 大马的星空是陈伟伦& 陆维强见过最美的景色，不过很多马来西亚人一直误会只有在国外才能看到满天星斗的天空，其实马来西亚也有很多地方有机会看到星光灿烂的天空，这次就让他们来介绍及分享一下在马来西亚看到的星空。

title: 留住星的那一刻
name: Gradient Lok
bio: Graduated in Malaysia Institue of Art in Graphic Design. He taught and lectured on design and photography. He is also the founder & president of Astrophography Group of Malaysia. Passionate for photography led him to form Insight Photo Studio and his works are seen in magazines like Sky & Telescope , The Night Sky & Taipei Starry Night etc.
introduction: The starry sky in Malaysia is the most beautiful scenery that William Chin & Gradient Lok have ever seen. However, many Malaysians have always misunderstood that only abroad can see the starry sky. In fact, there are many places in Malaysia where you can see the starry sky. This time Let them introduce and share the starry sky they saw in Malaysia.

translations.title: 留住星的那一刻
translations.name: 陆维强
translations.bio: 毕业于马来西亚艺术学院平面设计课程，及对摄影美学深入研究，他热爱摄影天体和天象等，他创办了以天文摄影为主的团体《天影社》，目前也是该团体的主席。他的作品常可在杂志（Sky & Telescope and 台北星空等）及报章刊登，他也曾接受本地电视台Astro AEC 关于天文摄影的采访。
translations.introduction: 大马的星空是陈伟伦& 陆维强见过最美的景色，不过很多马来西亚人一直误会只有在国外才能看到满天星斗的天空，其实马来西亚也有很多地方有机会看到星光灿烂的天空，这次就让他们来介绍及分享一下在马来西亚看到的星空。

title: 我们都「不，完美」（粤语演说）
name: Eddy Yu
bio: Eddy co-founded CoDesign Ltd with Hung Lam in 2003, specializing in branding design. In 2011, they established CoLAB, a collaborative platform for social innovation through design. One of the CoLab projects, ‘So…Soap!’, not only attracted wide coverage of local and international media, but also won several prestigious awards including Bronze Pencil, Sustainability in Design, One Show 2011, New York and Grand Award, Design for Asia Awards 2011 in Hong Kong. The project was selected by Hong Kong Museum of Art as one of three representing works of Hong Kong to participate the Liverpool Biennial 2012. In 2012, CoLAB launched its first self-initiated movement, ‘I’m perfect’, that encourages appreciation of imperfection in our lives. Eddy was Chairman of Hong Kong Designers As_x0002_sociation and is now a Fellow Member of the Association.
introduction:
The world is imperfect, but we all strive for perfection - the perfect person, the perfect thing, the perfect object, sometimes even at any cost. But is there really a standard for perfection? If not, what is imperfection?

Here, Eddy will share with us how “No, Perfect” reflects on the meaning of perfection through creativity and design, and encourages people to embrace the imperfections in life.

event.title: Connecting Dots
event.description:
In life’s journey, we come across with a myriad of situations, cross roads, and we meet many people. Some of them left an indelible footprint into our lives; some just fade away like the morning dew after the sun rises. If we see it on a different view, these are like Dots, dots that connect us along our own journey of our Life. The experience, moments and memories that some people leave us with, these are the kind of stories or ideas that ‘Connecting Dots’ is all about for this year’s theme. We have invited a group of outstanding individuals, all are prominent in their own field to come together and connect their dots with us. 

We hope their moments; their experiences will open up your own eyes, move your heart and soul. Let these ‘dots’, connect you to re-ignite your passion, dreams and inspire you to connect the dots of your own life.

是甜是苦，那都是人生求之不得的宝贵经验，而带来启发与觉悟，换化成生命的养分。今年我们就以点滴串联（Connecting Dots）作为年度
主题，邀请来自不同领域热爱这片土地的讲者，分别跟我们分享他们的生活态度，对这片土地的关系如何共创共生。是时候了，让我们一起寻
回共有的感动。

translations.title: 我们都「不，完美」（粤语演说）
translations.name: 余志光
translations.bio: 余志光与林伟雄在2003年创办品牌形象设计公司- CoDesign Ltd.在2011年，他们再成立合作创意平台- CoLAB,以设计推动社会创新。CoLAB参与的区区肥皂项目，除吸引了香港本地及国际媒体广泛报导外，更赢得纽约The One Show 2011年「可持续设计铜铅笔奖」及香港设计中心2011年「亚洲最具影响力设计大奖」。该项目更获香港艺术馆选爲三件香港代表作品之一，在2012年英国「利物浦艺术双年展」展出。在2012年，CoLAB发起「不，完美」运动，鼓励人们拥抱生命中的不完美。余志光曾任香港设计师协会主席，现为该会资深会员。
translations.introduction:
世界是不完美的，但我们都追求完美— 完美的人，完美的事，完美的物，有时更为此不惜代价。但完美真是有标准的吗？若没有，那什么是不完美？

来自香港的余志光将会和我们分享「不，完美」如何通过创意及设计，反思完美的意义，鼓励人们拥抱生活中的不完美。

title: 笑看人生！
name: Kelvin Leong
bio: Kelvin Leong, a Johorian and multilingual, became keen in stage performance since young. His experiences – includes being producer, director, scriptwriter, TV actor, radio actor, host and a creative director for advertising and stage performance. Founder of Malaysia Crosstalk Association and is president of the association, He dabbled in drama and public speaking.
introduction: Kelvin Leong has lived with crosstalk for 27 years. How to face himself, the environment, the reality, the culture and the future along the way? He has lived his values, the dignity of the nation and the essence of culture with his crosstalk.

translations.title: 笑看人生！
translations.name: 梁拯康
translations.bio: 梁拯康是柔佛人，马来西亚一级相声演员，马来西亚相声社创办人兼社长，广告创意总监，亚洲绿色联盟集团执行长，电视和电影演员，节目主持人，编剧，制作人，网络电台政治评论员。
translations.introduction: 梁拯康与相声生活了27年。如何一路走来，面对自己，面对环境，面对现实，面对文化，面对未来？他用相声活出了自己的价值，民族的尊严和文化的精髓。

title: 一千零二个决定
name: Dick Chua
bio: Graduated from Vancouver Film School. His first directed short film “Live Life” won nominations in Calgary Fringe Film Festival and Akira Kurosawa Memorial Short Film Competition in Japan. With an enthusiastic passion in storytelling and filmmaking, he began involving himself in many local productions such as featur e films, commercials, and documentaries. In 2010, Dick founded D Moving Pictures. The same year, Dick’s thriller short film “The Bloody Fish” has been selected for the Young Director Award by CFP-E. Dick has also directed numerous TV commercials, music videos and program series. In 2012, Dick and together with his team, shot another thriller short film titled “Murdered” has won six awards in BMW Shorties 2012 competition including the best film.
introduction: Dick shares with us his dream of directing, his work as a director, his style of filmmaking and the turning point of his life. He is one of the most outstanding young original directors in recent years. Last year, he won 7 awards for “Murdered”, including Best Film and Best Screenplay in the 6th BMW Short Film Competition.

translations.title: 一千零二个决定
translations.name: 蔡荻蔚
translations.bio: 毕业于温哥华电影学院。他的第一部自导的短片“Live Life”荣获提名卡尔加里边缘电影节和日本黑泽明短片竞赛。随着热衷于分享故事及电影制作，他开始自己参与各类制作专题片，广告片，纪录片等。2010年荻蔚创立D Moving Picture, 同年拍摄了恐怖短片“The Bloody Fish”获得2010年CFP-E青年导演奖 。荻蔚也拍摄了很多著名品牌的电视广告，音乐片和系列主题节目。 2012年他拍摄另一部恐怖短片名为“谋杀”荣获2012 BMW短片大奖最佳影片！
translations.introduction: 蔡荻蔚这次和我们分享他的电影梦，导演的工作，电影风格和他人生的转折点。他更是近年来年轻卓越原创导演，去年凭《草案Murdered》拿下"第六届BMW短片比赛"的最佳电影、最佳编剧等7项大奖。

title: 爵处逢生
name: Winnie Ho
bio: Malaysia’s new grown talent, one of her albums 2V1G (1 guitar 2 vocals) gain recognition in the international music industry and sold 20,000 copies worldwide. This album was featured in Taiwan’s acclaimed HI-FI Music Magazine. A Champion winner of the ASTRO Talent Quest and a 2nd runner up for TVB International Chinese New Talent Singing cham_x0002_pionship.Through sheer hard work, recording demos, experimenting vocals and sound through D-I-Ys and finding opportunities to work with other producers. Winnie is the vocal coach behind every ASTRO Talent Quest, and has since helped many aspiring young talent to be better. Recently she performed at the Esplanade in Singapore, her vocal talent is impeccable and has a wide range of tone.
introduction: She comes from a pop singing talent competition, but redefines herself in singing jazz. No glittering stage, no mainstream media coverage, but she still says she likes it. Winnie says she likes this form of singing because she can feel and witness the love and stories of many lives, and understand that nothing is immortal, only the energy of love will always continue.

translations.title: 爵处逢生
translations.name: 何芸妮
translations.bio: 何云妮是新晋本地畅销艺人，其首张专辑《2V1G (1吉他2声) 在世界各地的销售量超过20,000份，且收入在台湾顶级的Hi-Fi音乐艺术杂志。身为ASTRO新秀大赛冠军的她同时在<全球华人歌唱大赛>获得季军。之后，陆续参与许多DEMO, DIY的演唱及和音、和声编写, 这位实力派歌手最近在新加坡滨海艺术中心办了场演唱会。
translations.introduction: 从流行歌唱选秀比赛出身，却在唱爵士乐里重新定义自己。没有璀璨的舞台，没有主流媒体的大事报导，却依然固执地说，就是喜欢这样。何芸妮说她喜欢这样的唱歌形式，因为她能从中感受并见证许多人生的爱和故事，了解到没有什么是永垂不朽的，唯有爱的能量会一直延续。

title: 乔治市世界文化遗产
name: Lim Gaik Siang
bio: Lim Gaik Siang is an enthusiastic promoter of cultural heritage and Chinese culture. Since 2000, she has been involved in George Town World Heritage listing application as an Application Committee member assisting in compiling of the nomination dossier and preparation of evaluation by Icomos assessor in 2007. In 2003-2005, she was appointed as honorary conservation consultant by Penang Teochew Asoociation and spearheaded physical restoration and conservation of intangible heritage of the Han Jiang Ancestral Temple of Penang Teochew Asosication, She submitted dossier of the above project, which was, accredited Unesco Asia-Pacific Awards for Culture Heritage Conservation in 2006. In 2010, she held the position of Conservation Consultant for restoration of Sun Yet Sen Penang Base at 120, Armenian Street and Yi Oi tong project at 81-83, Penang Street.
introduction: George Town and Malacca were jointly listed on the UNESCO World Cultural Heritage List in 2008, but how many people know why George Town applied for a World Heritage Site and why it jointly applied with Malacca? What is the certificate for George Town to be inscribed on the World Heritage List? What are the challenges faced after being added to the list of heritage sites? Lim Gaik Siang is here to decode it one by one with us.

In 2003-2005, she was appointed as honorary conservation consultant by Penang Teochew Asoociation and spearheaded physical restoration and conservation of intangible heritage of the Han Jiang Ancestral Temple of Penang Teochew Asosication, She submitted dossier of the above project, which was, accredited Unesco Asia-Pacific Awards for Culture Heritage Conservation in 2006. In 2010, she held the position of Conservation Consultant for restoration of Sun Yet Sen Penang Base at 120, Armenian Street and Yi Oi tong project at 81-83, Penang Street.
translations.introduction: George Town and Malacca were jointly listed on the UNESCO World Cultural Heritage List in 2008, but how many people know why George Town applied for a World Heritage Site and why it jointly applied with Malacca? What is the certificate for George Town to be inscribed on the World Heritage List? What are the challenges faced after being added to the list of heritage sites? Lim Gaik Siang is here to decode it one by one with us.

translations.title: 乔治市世界文化遗产
translations.name: 林玉裳
translations.bio: 林玉裳是著名本土文化遗产保护及中华文化的热衷推手。自2000年以来，她一直参与在乔治市列入世界遗产名录的申遗委员会成员，协助编制提名和准备2007年国际古迹遗址理事会（ICO_x0002_MOS）评审员对参与在乔治市列入世界遗产名录的评价。她在2003年至2005年被任命为槟榔屿潮州会馆名誉保护顾问，参与复原复修韩江会馆。上述项目过后也获得联合国教科文组织亚太2006年文物古迹保护奖。2010年，她担任复原槟城孙中山纪念管和仁爱堂等多个项目。
translations.introduction: 乔治市与马六甲于2008年联合登录联合国教科文组织世界文化遗产名录，但有多少人知道为什么乔治市要申遗，为什么要跟马六甲联合申遗？乔治市入遗的凭证是什么？入遗之后所面临的挑战又是什么呢？林玉裳在这里和我们一一的解码。

title: Mamak 档：文化尽在一杯热拉茶
name: Ser Shaw Hong
bio: SER Shaw Hong earned his MA in Cultural Management from Chulalongkorn University, Thailand, and a BFA in Arts and Design from the University of Tasmania, Australia. He has broad teaching and educational management experience in arts and cultural studies (undergraduate and graduate levels) within the higher education institutions in Asia. In February 2013, his received Honor Award from King Mongkut’s University of Technology Thonburi (Thailand) on Outstanding Professor AwardSince July 2013, he was invited by KDU University College (Malaysia) to be the Head of School for the School of Communica_x0002_tion and Creative Arts.
introduction:
What's it like to be a Malaysian? Malaysia is truly a melting pot society, and with this uniqueness, we have our own identity. All you need to know about our culture, is in a glass of 'Teh Tarik'. 
Ser Shaw Hong beautifully sums this in his eighteen minutes talk on Malaysian culture and identity.

event.title: Connecting Dots
event.description:
In life’s journey, we come across with a myriad of situations, cross roads, and we meet many people. Some of them left an indelible footprint into our lives; some just fade away like the morning dew after the sun rises. If we see it on a different view, these are like Dots, dots that connect us along our own journey of our Life. The experience, moments and memories that some people leave us with, these are the kind of stories or ideas that ‘Connecting Dots’ is all about for this year’s theme. We have invited a group of outstanding individuals, all are prominent in their own field to come together and connect their dots with us. 

We hope their moments; their experiences will open up your own eyes, move your heart and soul. Let these ‘dots’, connect you to re-ignite your passion, dreams and inspire you to connect the dots of your own life.

人生中某些时刻，所遇到的人和事，看似微不足道，然而有可能这些点和滴其实正在影响着我们的一生。在我们人生旅程不论是顺是逆，遭遇
是甜是苦，那都是人生求之不得的宝贵经验，而带来启发与觉悟，换化成生命的养分。今年我们就以点滴串联（Connecting Dots）作为年度
主题，邀请来自不同领域热爱这片土地的讲者，分别跟我们分享他们的生活态度，对这片土地的关系如何共创共生。是时候了，让我们一起寻
回共有的感动。

translations.title: Mamak 档：文化尽在一杯热拉茶
translations.name: 徐肇鸿
translations.bio: 肇鸿先生毕业于马来西亚专艺美术学院（广告与平面设计文凭）澳洲塔史玛尼亚亚大学（纯美术学士，主修艺术设计理论），泰国珠拉隆宫大学（文化管理学硕士，主修艺术于博物馆管理学）。徐肇鸿先生在文化与艺术教育及管理拥有丰富的经验，他曾任教于亚洲多所高等教育学府。2013年，他获得泰王拉玛四世科技与工艺大学（泰国）颁发杰出教师奖。同年七月他获马来西亚KDU大学学院邀请出任传播与创意艺术学院院长。
translations.introduction: 年过半百的马来西亚，创造了多元种族与文化和谐的交融，在这个充满着热情的国度里，我们共同创造了一个新文化奇迹。文化，它可以那么地简单，就在你与我家门口的街口巷头里，存在于我们共享一杯热拉茶之茶叙间。

title: 深度旅游，掀开国内旅游的新篇章
name: Chok Yen Hau
bio: Founder of ‘My Road Planner’, author and photographer. He is a columnist for internation_x0002_al and local dailies and magazines. Yen Hou aims to bring travel to a deeper level, and his tours aren’t focus on ‘Touristy’ type of traveling and locations. He is involved extensively in promoting ‘Discovery Malaysia’ - promoting unexplored venues and hidden natural treasure trails that our country is full of. His trips have made many headlines internationally as he paved a new kind of adventure and discovery for our country.
introduction: The moon in foreign countries is rounder? In fact, Malaysia is beautiful! When it comes to tourist attractions in Malaysia, do you only think of Malacca, Ipoh, and Penang? In fact, there are still many interesting, beautiful, and local-flavored niche attractions in Malaysia that have not yet been discovered. This time, let us follow Yen Hou’s footsteps and explore them!

translations.title: 深度旅游，掀开国内旅游的新篇章
translations.name: 卓衍豪
translations.bio: My Road Planner创办人。文字与影像创作者，同时为国内外报章丶杂志供稿及照片。衍豪在马来西亚推广的深度旅游以及他的新着《发现大马》，都为马来西亚国内旅游开启了新的篇章，透过他的文字和影像作品，我们看到了马来西亚尚有许多未被发掘或推广的景点丶路线；这些藏在旧路丶小镇上的宝藏，除了是马来西亚的骄傲，更是推动国内旅游的最佳原动力。这次，衍豪会在Tedx和我们分享如何善用我们的先天优势，将马来西亚打造成一个旅游大国。
translations.introduction: 外国的月亮比较圆？其实马来西亚就很美！说到马来西亚的旅游景点，你是否只能想到马六甲、怡宝、槟城？其实马来西亚还有很多很有趣、很漂亮、很有本土风味的小众景点未被发掘，这次就让我们跟随衍豪的脚步前去探索吧！

title: 街头哲学（粤语演说）
name: MC Bee
bio: MC Bee is one of the members of ManhanD, his style is freestyle Rap genre. He is a Lyri_x0002_cist, Freestyle rapper, composer and songwriter. ManhanD or 慢行 (Slow walk) comprises of Five multi-talented individuals. They are MC Bee, MC Toy, Von, Daeren and DJ Point. They are considered to be Malaysia’s first Chinese Hip-Hop and Rap Group. They gained Popularity through the local Hip-Hop underground movement and have performed in many venues nationwide. To date they have released five albums and their latest is entitled ‘Life goes On and On’. ManhanD has been invited to many local performances and events. They have also been invited as guest performers in Hong Kong and China.
introduction: Both of them born from different family backgrounds, but also grew up in the city, the same inside the concrete jungle to see all the light and darkness of the reality of society, interspersed with the survival of the fittest, the strongest and the weakest, the two-faced personality, the struggle for profit, lies all over the street, and self-taught a set of thinking skills, observation and then the combination of music with the words, rapping out the streets of the unknown or forgotten facts, to observe from multiple perspectives, independent thinking, they are what we call rappers, but they like to call themselves street observers or street philosophers. Thinking independently, they are what we call rappers, but they like to call themselves street observers or street philosophers. Hour Tan and Manhand's MC Bee are here to share the culture of Chinese Hip Hop in Malaysia.

event.title: Connecting Dots
event.description:
In life’s journey, we come across with a myriad of situations, cross roads, and we meet many people. translations.title: 街头哲学（粤语演说）
translations.name: 彭义秦
translations.bio: 彭义秦是ManHanD其中一个成员，专长于作词，作曲，主持，即兴饶舌. ManHanD 这团名里的【Man】 所指的并非别，而是一种独特的个性，当中涵义象征着坚毅的精神和对人的一份尊重【Respect】！！【Hand】则代表了创造力及喻意着积极追求与实践的态度，想做什么就动手吧！他们是一班对音乐充满触觉的年轻人, 只想做好音乐,没有艺人架子。慢行有5位成员:MC_Bee ,MC_Toy,Von,Darren & DJ_Point，可说是阵容庞大的嘻哈组合.慢行被认为是马来西亚的第一个中文嘻哈和饶舌的团队，通过在地的地下嘻哈活动得到普及，并在海外及全国各地展开进行演出，迄今为止慢行已经发布了五张专辑。
translations.introduction: 两位来自不同的家庭环境背景出生，但同样在城市成长，同样在这个石屎森林里面看尽现实社会的光与暗，穿插于适者生存，弱肉强食，双面人格，利益斗争，谎言遍布的街道上，而自学了一套思考能力，观察后再以文字结合音乐，说唱出这个街头不为人知或被遗忘了的事实，以多角度观察，独立去思考，他们就系大家所称呼的饶舌歌手，但他们就喜欢自称为街头观察者或街头哲学家。Hour Tan 陈俊豪和Manhand 的MC Bee在这里一起分享大马中文嘻哈（Hip Hop）文化。

title: 街头哲学（粤语演说）
name: Hour Tan Choon Hou
bio: By day, a landscape artist, at night he moonlights as Hour Tan, Rap singer, composer and writer. Hour Tan’s passion for rap begin while sitting in his lorry, He discovered that Rap is a genre that is easily appreciated by younger generations, and he has ideals which he wishes to share, With that note, he began to immerse in Rap and wrote songs concerning today’s issues faced by himself and the younger generation. His music and lyrics appeal to the younger market and this was his platform to share, and educate the masses about the misconception of Rap and Hip Hop music. Rap and Hip Hop is not about ‘Gangs’ and living a vice lifestyle. It’s about voicing out dissatisfaction with the world, with oneself, and how does one overcome these obstacles. Hour Tan is one of the members of Mobeat, it comprises of three multi-talented individuals, they are Hour Tan, Kydd and Lance-C.
introduction: Both of them born from different family backgrounds, but also grew up in the city, the same inside the concrete jungle to see all the light and darkness of the reality of society, interspersed with the survival of the fittest, the strongest and the weakest, the two-faced personality, the struggle for profit, lies all over the street, and self-taught a set of thinking skills, observation and then the combination of music with the words, rapping out the streets of the unknown or forgotten facts, to observe from multiple perspectives, independent thinking, they are what we call rappers, but they like to call themselves street observers or street philosophers. Thinking independently, they are what we call rappers, but they like to call themselves street observers or street philosophers. Hour Tan and Manhand's MC Bee are here to share the culture of Chinese Hip Hop in Malaysia.

translations.name: 陈俊豪
translations.bio:
白天为景观设计师，晚上是著名的中文饶舌创作歌手。俊豪年轻时就热衷饶舌，工作时也不忘于唱说，他认为饶舌比较能表达时下的不满，歌词信息直接传达给听众。然而，他认为要当饶舌创作人就要超越口号，突破肤浅。写好作品，需要有扎实的基础、充足的知识及社会意识。而目前大马缺乏的，就是鞭鞑社会、针砭时政、具深度的音乐作品，俊豪目前正在引领这个风气。
俊豪是MõBeat的队长，组员为Hour Tan, Kydd Choong 和Lance-C。“MõBeat” 意为
1) 直译广东口音“无Beat” 
2) 代表了任何节奏情况下也有本质地表答歌词含义
3) 无重量节奏感音乐.
translations.introduction: 两位来自不同的家庭环境背景出生，但同样在城市成长，同样在这个石屎森林里面看尽现实社会的光与暗，穿插于适者生存，弱肉强食，双面人格，利益斗争，谎言遍布的街道上，而自学了一套思考能力，观察后再以文字结合音乐，说唱出这个街头不为人知或被遗忘了的事实，以多角度观察，独立去思考，他们就系大家所称呼的饶舌歌手，但他们就喜欢自称为街头观察者或街头哲学家。Hour Tan 陈俊豪和Manhand 的MC Bee在这里一起分享大马中文嘻哈（Hip Hop）文化。

title: Man & God（英文演说）
name: Joseph Foo
bio: Began his journey in the creative industry as a graphic designer. Co-Founder of 3nity & 3X and art4soul, an active speaker and panelist, he has spoken at design seminars, work_x0002_shops and dialogues held in and out of Malaysia and his work has been rewarded in both local and international competitions. Joseph is currently serving in the Council of Design 360°, a concept and design magazine in China and Editorial Committee of Asia-Pacific Design Annual. Joseph works on Man+God’, a visual feast that explore the relationship between Man and God through the eyes and ideas of creative minds of different faiths and various cultures. It re-examines the ancient questions of God in a new way at a crucial time.
introduction: "Man + God" is Joseph's latest project. It is a visual representation with art installations which explores the relationship between man and God, a visual journey and study of Man's interpretation, understanding and acknowledgement of God through different faiths and cultures.

event.title: Connecting Dots
event.description:
In life’s journey, we come across with a myriad of situations, cross roads, and we meet many people. Some of them left an indelible footprint into our lives; some just fade away like the morning dew after the sun rises. If we see it on a different view, these are like Dots, dots that connect us along our own journey of our Life. The experience, moments and memories that some people leave us with, these are the kind of stories or ideas that ‘Connecting Dots’ is all about for this year’s theme. We have invited a group of outstanding individuals, all are prominent in their own field to come together and connect their dots with us. 

We hope their moments; their experiences will open up your own eyes, move your heart and soul. Let these ‘dots’, connect you to re-ignite your passion, dreams and inspire you to connect the dots of your own life.

translations.title: 點滴串聯
translations.description:
人生中某些时刻，所遇到的人和事，看似微不足道，然而有可能这些点和滴其实正在影响着我们的一生。在我们人生旅程不论是顺是逆，遭遇
是甜是苦，那都是人生求之不得的宝贵经验，而带来启发与觉悟，换化成生命的养分。今年我们就以点滴串联（Connecting Dots）作为年度
主题，邀请来自不同领域热爱这片土地的讲者，分别跟我们分享他们的生活态度，对这片土地的关系如何共创共生。是时候了，让我们一起寻
回共有的感动。

Joseph is currently serving in the Council of Design 360°, a concept and design magazine in China and Editorial Committee of Asia-Pacific Design Annual. Joseph works on Man+God’, a visual feast that explore the relationship between Man and God through the eyes and ideas of creative minds of different faiths and various cultures. translations.title: Man & God（英文演说）
translations.name: 胡智义
translations.bio: 胡智义从平面设计师开始了他的创意旅程，分别是3nity和3X的合伙创办人，art4soul创办人。他非常活跃在本地及国外的艺术及创意界，常参加各个不同的研讨会，演说和工作坊，作品得到国内外的认可及赞赏！目前担任设计360°杂志的理事会，而“人+神’是他近期一个视觉表现暨装置艺术的项目，它旨在探讨人与神之间的关系，通过眼睛和想法展现不同信仰和不同文化的创意思维。在这个关键时刻以崭新的方式来重新审视人类远古对神的思考方式。
translations.introduction: “人+神”是约瑟夫的最新项目。它以艺术装置的视觉表现形式，探索人与神之间的关系，通过不同的信仰和文化，将人类对神的诠释、理解和认可进行一次视觉之旅和深入研究。

title: This Thing Called Change 改变
name: Dato’ Ambiga Sreenevasan
bio: Human Activist, Public speaker and Professional lawyer, most noted for her unyielding cause to have a clean and fair Malaysian General Election. Dato’ Ambiga is also a social worker, having participated in numerious social activities and causes, her distinguished work as a lawmaker has garnered her role as a public figure for ‘Bersih’ a movment that advocates a clean and fair Election for Malaysian people. Awards : Recipient of the U.S. Secretary of State’s “International Women of Courage” Award, on 11 March 2009 and Conferred an Honorary Doctorate of Laws (Hon LL.D.) by the University of Exeter, on 21 July 2011.
introduction: What makes a person change? How does one change? Let Dato' Ambiga take you on her journey that made her change her world and her life. Daring to be different, let her story inspire you to change yourself to be a better you.

translations.title: This Thing Called Change 改变
translations.name: 安美嘉
translations.bio: 马来西亚著名的人权律师、社运份子，曾领导及参与一些马来西亚国内的社会运动，其中最受瞩目的有由净选盟发起的净选盟2.0人民集会。她所参与的维权运动涵盖范围很广，涉及宗教自由、女性权利、原住民权利、知识产权等等。2009年，安美嘉获美国国务院颁发“国际妇女勇气奖”。2011年，安美嘉因其在专业领域和社会活动上的杰出表现而获得母校英国埃克塞特大学颁发荣誉法学博士学位。
translations.introduction: Dato' Ambiga 认为在这大时代袖手旁观不是一个选项，而当我们在寻找改变的当刻它会让我们远离舒适地带（Comfort Zone）因而使我们克服我们的恐惧。当每个人想要有所改变时，是否先内在改变进而影响外界呢？我们应该献身参与改变的壮行或者还在等那关键时刻?

title: 穷食年代之穷知识
name: Lim Kim Cherng
bio: Graduated from the National Cheng Kung University (Mechanical Engineering) in Taiwan. He is celebrated Culturist, a creative branding consultant, a poet, food columnist and Gourmet food documentary consultant specializing in local Malaysian cuisine. 《知食份子·人文空間》
introduction: Let us go back to our roots to discover the way which we lived that influenced us on the food that we nourish and nurture ourselves and our future generations. Lim Kim Chern shares his passion for food since his childhood days and explore the many facets of food as it evolve n our lives, from a simple meal to a gourmet cuisine. Discover the palate and culture.

translations.title: 穷食年代之穷知识
translations.name: 林金城
translations.bio: 吉隆坡人，毕业于台湾成功大学机械工程系，现职品牌创意顾问、《知食份子·人文空间》策划总监、诗人、美食专栏作家、电视美食节目顾问等。
translations.introduction: 食物面前，我们究竟穷甚么？在食物安全上，我们不可能都具备高深的专业知识，但绝不可以没有生活的常识！林金城将与大家分享自己对食物的热情，并探索食物在我们生活中的方方面面，从简单的一餐到美味佳肴，带您一同探索味觉与文化。

title: Journeys without a map
name: Vancelee Teng
bio: With a resume well-adorned with over 200 creative awards, Vancelee Teng is one of the most outstanding Malaysians to have established himself in the creative advertising world. However, as many people have remarked, neither is he a workaholic, nor is he a person who does not appreciate better living. He is perceptive and yet entrepreneurial. He possesses wisdom derived from the streets of USA, United Kingdom, France, Italy, Greece, Turkey, Morocco, Egypt, Sri Lanka, India, Nepal, Tibet, China, Myanmar, Thailand, Laos, Cambodia, Vietnam, Singapore, Malaysia, Indo_x0002_nesia, Australia, Korea, Japan, Hong Kong, Macau, Brunei, Phil_x0002_ippines, Monaco, Taiwan, Vatican, Sikkim, Peru, Argentina, Chile, Uruguay, Holland, Spain, Portugal, Maldives, Jordan, Germany, Hungary, Austria, Czech Republic, Slovakia – countries he has stepped upon and written about, for creative and cultural purposes.
introduction: Winner of numerous creative awards, Vancelee Teng will give us his own set of "Traveling Without a Map" with his unique personal creative thinking. With a keen eye for different cities, societies and people, he has traveled all over the world. He has been observing people's behaviors, manners and lifestyles, and integrating what he has learned from his travels into his specialty: creative advertising.

event.title: Refine
event.description:
In 2014, as an extension to the symbol and logotype the previous year, the new design echoes the theme Refine; Redefine attempting to map our journey in discovering the new.
Anchoring on the concept of ink diffusion in Chinese calligraphy, Chinese characters从心 diffuse into a new typeface for the Chinese characters 重新, signalling a new perspective towards local Chinese culture.

translations.title: Refine
translations.description:
In 2014, as an extension to the symbol and logotype the previous year, the new design echoes the theme Refine; Redefine attempting to map our journey in discovering the new.

translations.title: 從心
translations.description: 自我们2013年之点滴串联主题后，今年大会将从心体会我国的一切，并用新视角重新看待、创新事物。从点点滴滴串联在一起的墨，到晕开了的墨痕，重新转化成新字体之意象，将是我们团队的主要推动力。该图像是由马来西亚设计团队三一工作室给TedxPetalingStreet的精心杰作。设计图像之寓意：大会是马来西亚人沟通的主要桥梁， 从心感觉墨的行书， 到重新发掘新华文字体代表了马来西亚华人心连心，互助的精神。

translations.title: 不带地图的旅行
translations.name: 丁一
translations.occupation: 大马之子∙泰国广告创意鬼才
translations.bio:
在广告创意的专业领域里，马来西亚的丁一是个佼佼者，荣获超过两百多个創意奖项。在生活中，他也是一个轻松且慢条斯理的生活达人。持着平常心，他在世界各地漫步旅游，并摄取经验，丰富了他的人生观，也让他在广告创作上能展现源源不断地创意。对不同的城市、社会以及人文有敏锐洞察力的他，脚步遍布世界各地（如美国、英国、法国、意大利、土耳其、希腊、摩洛哥、埃及、印度、斯里兰卡、西藏、尼泊尔、中国、缅甸、泰国、寮国、柬埔寨、越南、新加坡、马来西亚、印尼、澳洲、韩国、日本、香港、澳门、文莱、菲律宾、摩纳哥、台湾、梵蒂冈、锡金、秘鲁、阿
根廷、智利、乌拉圭、荷兰、西班牙、葡萄牙、马尔代夫、约旦，德国，奥地利，捷克，匈牙利，斯洛伐克。）丁一细心观察不同人民的言行举止以及生活作息，並将旅游生活所得融汇于广告创意之中。
translations.introduction: 得过无数创意奖项的丁一将以独特的个人创意思考，给我们讲解他自己一套《不带地图的旅­行》。对不同的城市、社会以及人文有敏锐洞察力的他，脚步遍布世界各地。丁一一直都细心观察不同人民的言行举止以及生活作息，并将旅游生活所得融汇于他的专业­：广告创意之中。

title: One pedal at a time
name: Jeffrey Lim
bio: Born 1978 in KL. Currently the principal designer of studio 25, based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. Practising design, photography, cycling advocacy & other social art projects. Communication designer Jeffrey Lim’s journey in formulating his creative direction originates from the spokes of wheels from bicycles. They are forms in which his designs, photographies and art projects take inspiration from; from techniques involved in making new concept bicycles, to recycling used parts in bicycles into new products; from the art of photography to the physical transformation of cameras from bygone eras to the present, Jeffrey is at the forefront of recycling materials from objects of passion. An avid commercial photographer, his photos have provided basis for making his communication design work more documentary, laced with stories within. From 2004 to 2012, travelling from Southeast asia to Europe, he has photographed almost everything culturally significant, making his works a historical visual documentation of items of historical value. Another, Jeffrey Lim’s single art project involving encouraging social communities to cycle -- attempting to rediscover the most basic of human transportation -- is testament of his determination in bringing the simple and yet multifaceted activity back in the human consciousness, as a form of transporation, a form of leisure, a form of sporting activity. He recently published Kuala Lumpur’s city’s cycling map, debunking the idea that cycling is not possible along the city’s roads.
introduction: Jeffrey Lim share to everyone his effort to develop the first ever cycling map for Kuala Lumpur's cyclist, what he discovered and idea behind it.

Communication designer Jeffrey Lim’s journey in formulating his creative direction originates from the spokes of wheels from bicycles. An avid commercial photographer, his photos have provided basis for making his communication design work more documentary, laced with stories within. From 2004 to 2012, travelling from Southeast asia to Europe, he has photographed almost everything culturally significant, making his works a historical visual documentation of items of historical value. Another, Jeffrey Lim’s single art project involving encouraging social communities to cycle -- attempting to rediscover the most basic of human transportation -- is testament of his determination in bringing the simple and yet multifaceted activity back in the human consciousness, as a form of transporation, a form of leisure, a form of sporting activity. He recently published Kuala Lumpur’s city’s cycling map, debunking the idea that cycling is not possible along the city’s roads.
translations.introduction: Jeffrey Lim share to everyone his effort to develop the first ever cycling map for Kuala Lumpur's cyclist, what he discovered and idea behind it.

translations.title: 每一刻，踩一行
translations.name: 林猷进
translations.occupation: 吉隆坡脚车地图策划人
translations.bio: “每一刻，一踩一行”包含的不仅是脚踏车为运输工具的基本功能， 而是脚踏车为旅程中所承载之意义。身为广告平面设计专业的林猷進， 设计灵感来源可由最根本的元素开始， 如脚车的轴； 轴之设计图形， 抑或是其他任何架构， 都能成为他在摄影、平面与立体设计、艺术企划里的灵感； 从建构新之概念脚车， 到利用旧脚车的零件来重新建构新产品； 以及利用摄影艺术和旧时代的照相机来拍摄出新观点，也让旧相机有了新的面貌。林猷進不愧是旧物再利用的专家。热爱摄影艺术，他秉持着摄影为一项记录真实故事，极富社会意义之信念，于2004年至2012年，踏遍了东南亚以及欧洲等地，拍摄了许多社会现象，并将这些珍贵的照片结集成历史记录。他目前正在推广一项大型、回归纯朴生活之骑脚踏车社会运动，鼓励人们重新认识与使用脚车为交通工具。最近，他发表了吉隆坡市脚踏车地图与指南。这地图与指南将让马来西亚人对吉隆坡市区为骑脚踏车之佳地重新充满信心。
translations.introduction: 林猷进与大家分享了他为吉隆坡自行车爱好者绘制首张自行车地图所做的努力、他的发现以及背后的想法。

title: Beyond rhythm
name: Bernard Goh
bio: In 1997, Bernard Goh founded Hands Percussion (HANDS). Although a graduate of the Malaysian Institute of Arts (MIA); he developeddeep interest and passion in percussive music. 6 years as a multi-award winning instructor trained him well, not to mention cultivated his love for percussion. Under the tutelage of Mr Tan Fui Choong – the founder of 24 Festive Drumming (a unique drumming technique developed in Malaysia) – in shigu drumming, Bernard founded the Malaysian drumming company. For 17 years, he has successfully led the group to become one of the leading percussive groups in the world. Intercultural in practice, Bernard Goh has also collaborated with many music artists, including The Actors Studio, River Grass Dance Theatre, Nyoba Kan, Judimar Hernandez and many others. Together with his company HANDS, since 2005, he has performed at various international art festivals and events in The Netherlands, Belgium, Greece, France, Australia, Hawaii, Qatar, Turkmenistan, Dubai, Taiwan, Hong Kong, Korea, China, Vietnam, Singapore, Thailand, Indonesia, to name a few. In 2009, HANDS was commissioned by the French Government to tour and perform in several cities in France. Notably Bernard won his first Cammy in the 2nd BOH Cameronian Art Awards for Rashomon (2003) by The Actors Studio. It was for Best Music & Sound Design for the Theatre category, together with Deborah Tee. In 2011 and 2012, he won the “Best Musical Direction” for his productions “Dreams in November” and “Knocking” at the 8th and 9th BOH Cameronian Arts Awards respectively.
introduction: From [designer] to [drum musician], Bernard Goh has continuously walked on the art road. Because of his teacher's words, he has the value that "creation should not be framed by the inherent", and he believes that the [Drum Ensemble] must have its own voice, make local sounds, and sound out the rhythm of representative elements. Therefore, we are looking forward to more of his future works that go beyond drumming, such as body percussion, pants, and so on. That's how Bernard Goh is still a real designer.

event.title: Refine
event.description:
In 2014, as an extension to the symbol and logotype the previous year, the new design echoes the theme Refine; Redefine attempting to map our journey in discovering the new.
Anchoring on the concept of ink diffusion in Chinese calligraphy, Chinese characters从心 diffuse into a new typeface for the Chinese characters 重新, signalling a new perspective towards local Chinese culture.

translations.title: 從心
translations.description: 自我们2013年之点滴串联主题后，今年大会将从心体会我国的一切，并用新视角重新看待、创新事物。从点点滴滴串联在一起的墨，到晕开了的墨痕，重新转化成新字体之意象，将是我们团队的主要推动力。该图像是由马来西亚设计团队三一工作室给TedxPetalingStreet的精心杰作。设计图像之寓意：大会是马来西亚人沟通的主要桥梁， 从心感觉墨的行书， 到重新发掘新华文字体代表了马来西亚华人心连心，互助的精神。

translations.title: 节奏以外
translations.name: 吴圣雄
translations.occupation: 手集团创办人及艺术总监
translations.bio: 手集团创办人及艺术总监，毕业於马来西亚艺术学院（MIA）美术设计系，吴圣雄是二十四节令鼓创办人已故陈徽崇老师於外州的第一代得意门生，亦是马来西亚第2支二十四节令鼓队队长，并将南方狮鼓从“街头节庆表演”发展成“剧场艺术表演”。1997年，他创办了手集团，17年来不仅专注於舞台表演，更致力於鼓艺推广及教育活动，包括举办中小学二十四节令鼓队观摩及公演、《响宴》全国击鼓培训营、《随鼓唱游》下乡打鼓活动、《大手牵小手，走进艺术殿堂》跨文化体验教育活动系列等等，多年来走访过17个国家与地区参与国际艺术节及大型演出，包括荷兰、比利时、希腊、法国、澳洲、卡塔尔、夏威夷、土库曼斯坦、杜拜、台湾、香港、韩国、中国、越南、新加坡、泰国、印尼等。2003 年凭《罗生门》荣获BOH金马崙艺术大奖－最佳原创音乐；2011年凭《梦无界》荣获第8届BOH金马崙艺术大奖－最佳音乐指导；2012年凭《叩》荣获第9届BOH金马崙艺术大奖 － 最佳音乐指导。
translations.introduction: 从［设计师］到［鼓乐师］，吴圣雄不间断的走在艺术路上。因为老师的一句话，他有了“创作不该被框在固有中”的价值观，他认为［鼓乐团］必须要有自己的声音，发出本土的声音，响出代表性元素的音律。所以，我们更期待他未来更多的击鼓以外，如身体敲击、裤管等等的佳作。也就这样，吴圣雄其实依然还是一位名副其实的——设计师。

title: From a dream, to an Epoch
name: Lee Swee Seng
bio: 21st Century The Prestigious Brand - Winner of Prestigious Cultural Achievement Award. Lee Swee Seng is a Business Administration graduate from IGM, Malaysia and Southern University College. He is the founder, artistic director and wushu director of Lee Wushu Arts Theatre and Lee Wushu Arts Workshop and also a collaborator of martial arts and dance. Between 1994 and 2001, Swee Seng participated in several wushu competitions in Malaysia and won gold and silver medals in the All Johor State Wushu Championship and National Wushu Tournament. He also participated in Beijing International Wushu Competition and won the 4th prize, regarded as one such outstanding wushu sportsman in Malaysia. Swee Seng choreographed series Wushu and Dance performance since 2001, one of his classic work Farewell, My Concubine–The Movement of the Martyr received rave reviews and was invited to perform at the 7th Johor Bahru Arts Festival, Hong Kong Dance Festival 2010, London International Youth Arts Festival 2012 and 30th FACP Annual Conference Asian Gems in the Arts at Solo, Indonesia.
introduction: To have a dream and know exactly what you should do is to fulfill your dream! Lee Swee Seng from the age of 11 began to study martial arts, explore the skills from [fitness] to [self-defense], from [physical] to [honor] breakthroughs, found that [martial arts ＋ art] is spontaneous, set up a martial arts dance art workshop - the skills combined with the art, moved to the stage, the theater. What martial arts teaches people is: the truth of being a human being. 18-year-old dream, leading Lee Swee Seng through the [career - career - professional], words like lightning strikes with a flashing fist, sentences straight to the heart, inspiring, stimulating awareness, on the stage of TEDx, the person stepped on the is another peak of [comprehensive field].

translations.title: 从一个梦想到一个时代
translations.name: 李劲松
translations.occupation: 武术与舞蹈艺术创作人
translations.bio: 21世纪成功品牌精英榜-至尊文化成就奖得主。结业于马来西亚IGM与南方大学学院联办企业管理课程，李劲松武艺坊及武舞艺术坊创办人、艺术总监与武术总监，也是武与舞艺术概念结合者。1994至2001年，曾荣获马来西亚全国及全柔多项武术锦标赛冠、亚军，北京国际武术邀请赛刀术第4名，是马来西亚近代武坛上杰出的武术运动员。2002年至2009年，多次前往中国四川、广州、广西专业武术队进修，并于2010年代表马来西亚参加第8届香港国际武术节，荣获集体武舞金牌。自2001年创作多部武舞系列作品，其中的经典钜作《霸王别姬─ 殉道者的乐章》更深受国际舞台认同，先后受邀于马来西亚第7届新山艺术节、香港舞蹈节2010、伦敦国际青年艺术节2012及印尼梭罗第30届亚洲文化推展联盟(FACP)国际会议等演出。并于2010年荣获第22届全国华人舞蹈节最佳创作奖，更入围第9届BOH Cameronian Arts Award 2011的五项提名，并荣获“最佳服装、发型及化妆设计”与“Kakiseni观众票选最受欢迎舞蹈作品”。其另一佳作《动静五行》也受邀前往新加坡滨海艺术中心演出。
translations.introduction: 有梦想的人，清楚知道自己该做些什么，就是完成你的梦想！李劲松从11岁开始学习武术，探究该技能由［健身］到［防身］，从［体能］到［荣誉］的突破，发现［武术 ＋ 艺术］是自发的，成立了武舞艺术坊——把技能结合了艺术，搬到舞台、剧场。武术教会人的是：做人的道理。18岁的梦想，带领李劲松走过［职业——事业——专业］，话语有如闪拳雷击，句句直通心扉，鼓舞人心，激发意识，在TEDx的舞台上，此人踏上的是［综合领域］的另一高峰。

title: Original flavours surprises
name: Sum Leong
bio: Sum Leong found her true calling in coffee some 15 years ago. The founder of Typica Café has been involved in different aspects of a coffee business – she has helped starting up a café, opened her own coffee house and published a coffee magazine. These endeavours culminated in a coffee brand, Typica, in 2009. Typica Coffee is about going back to the basics – it traces coffee to its origin to bring out the truest taste of coffee. Determined to think out of the box, she has successfully established a unique brand in the world of coffee.
introduction: Sum Leong is determined to use local coffee beans to brew coffee that is truly Malaysian; this is not only the mission of Douwon Café, but also a place for Malaysians to learn more about the Malaysian coffee culture. In addition, she is also active in organizing coffee appreciation classes for coffee lovers to learn with her and get to know more about coffee.

translations.title: 原味的惊喜
translations.name: 梁文心
translations.bio: 梁文心， 豆原创办人， 做了1 5 年咖啡， 帮别人开咖啡馆， 自己开咖啡馆， 做咖啡杂誌， 最后一件关於咖啡的决定是2 0 0 9 年创办豆原咖啡馆。决定从这个品牌开始， 从源头开始做咖啡， 还原咖啡， 跳脱一般思维，做出自己的风格。寻找源头的过程中开始认识原材料，发现大地深藏的力量，意识到本土有许多被遗忘的美味；如咖啡豆、班兰叶、香茅、芒果和樱桃番茄等等，开始将所有味道当成游戏来调配，过程中发现马来西亚自家种植的Liberica咖啡豆，经过豆原的细心处理后会带来味觉上的冲击与惊喜，重新以趣味的角度看待被遗忘的咖啡，也重新认识“原味”的各种面貌。
translations.introduction: 梁文心立志用本地咖啡豆来泡制真正属于马来西亚的咖啡；这不止是豆原咖啡馆的使命，该空间也是一个让马来西亚人能多了解马来西亚咖啡文化之场所。另外，她也积极开设咖啡鉴赏班，让咖啡爱好者们能与她一起学习，并认识咖啡之种种。

title: The gourmet and food remnants
name: Agnes Chee
bio: Agnes Chee is a Malaysian food columnist, biographer, travel writer, screenwriter and television script writer. Her works grace major medias in China, Hong Kong, Singapore and Malaysia. They are Elite Traveller, Revolution, Hong Kong Economic Journal, Marie Claire, Elle, Lianhe Zao Bao, Nu You, Sin Chew Jit Po, to name a few. She has also authored two books : Kissing Me from Toes Up and Who Says I am Alone. She currently resides in Hong Kong.
introduction: Agnes Chee, a media personality who combines food and writing, lives the life of a gourmet and eats all kinds of food around the world, but savors her self-inspired [Leftover Life] reflections in the industry model. From the subject of food, she skillfully changes her perspective and guides the viewers to follow her as she [peeps into the burden of the earth], [reflects on resource allocation], [impeaches the division of responsibility] and other world issues. In addition to satisfying the infinite desires of the tongue, no one thinks about the infinite accumulation of food waste, but these problems have been effectively dealt with by Agnes Chee's ideas on how to dispose of food waste. Through her sharing, we have seen how the world handles food waste and oil consumption, refining them into environmentally friendly resources and utilizing them to their fullest potential. Through her sharing of the food chain of a conscientious garden, we are also amazed that food can be recycled. In this regard, we call on you to utilize the small universe in your heart and add the creativity of leftover living to the world. The world needs more [environmentally friendly] and [renewable energy] art creations.

translations.title: The gourmet and food remnants
translations.name: Agnes Chee
translations.bio: Agnes Chee is a Malaysian food columnist, biographer, travel writer, screenwriter and television script writer. Her works grace major medias in China, Hong Kong, Singapore and Malaysia. They are Elite Traveller, Revolution, Hong Kong Economic Journal, Marie Claire, Elle, Lianhe Zao Bao, Nu You, Sin Chew Jit Po, to name a few. She has also authored two books : Kissing Me from Toes Up and Who Says I am Alone. She currently resides in Hong Kong.
translations.introduction: Agnes Chee, a media personality who combines food and writing, lives the life of a gourmet and eats all kinds of food around the world, but savors her self-inspired [Leftover Life] reflections in the industry model. From the subject of food, she skillfully changes her perspective and guides the viewers to follow her as she [peeps into the burden of the earth], [reflects on resource allocation], [impeaches the division of responsibility] and other world issues. In addition to satisfying the infinite desires of the tongue, no one thinks about the infinite accumulation of food waste, but these problems have been effectively dealt with by Agnes Chee's ideas on how to dispose of food waste. Through her sharing, we have seen how the world handles food waste and oil consumption, refining them into environmentally friendly resources and utilizing them to their fullest potential. Through her sharing of the food chain of a conscientious garden, we are also amazed that food can be recycled. In this regard, we call on you to utilize the small universe in your heart and add the creativity of leftover living to the world. The world needs more [environmentally friendly] and [renewable energy] art creations.

translations.title: 美食家与剩菜生活
translations.name: 谢嫣薇
translations.bio: 谢嫣薇，马来西亚人，美食专栏作家、人物专访&旅游专题特约、电影编剧。作品常见于中国、香港、新加坡和马来西亚各大媒体，如《当代旅游》、《芯动》、《信报》、《Marie Claire》、《Elle》、《联合早报》、《女友》、《星洲日报》等。著有专栏结集作品《从我脚尖吻我》和都市情感短篇《谁说我寂寞》。目前定居香港。
translations.introduction: 谢嫣薇，一位结合美食和写作的媒体人，过着美食家的生活，吃尽全球各地美食，却在行业模式中，品尝出自我启发的［剩菜生活］大反思。她从美食课题，巧妙的换了一个角度，引导观众随她［窥探地球负担］，［反思资源分配］，［弹劾责任分割］等的世界课题。在满足舌头无限欲望之外，没有人惦记着无限囤积的厨余，但这些问题都被谢安焉提出有效的厨余处理点子。透过她的分享，我们看过了个世界对于厨余和费油的处理方式，提炼成环保资源，物尽其用，发挥得淋漓尽致。也透过她分享的良心园地的食物链，我们也惊叹：原来，食物也能回收。就此呼吁各位发挥心中的小宇宙，为世界添上剩菜生活的创意。世界需要更多的［资源环保］与［再生能源］的艺术创作。

title: The future of Farming
name: Ng Tien Khuan
bio: Upon graduating from the University of Malaya in Physics in 1999 and spending three years teaching in TARC College and a counsellor with the Live Line Association, in 2006, Ng Tien Khuan has decided to embark on an experiment to establish and manage an organic farm. He named it Terra Organic Farm. Two years later, he took courses in New Zealand and Australia in a farming technique called Bio Dynamic Farming. After two to three years in learning the ropes and familiarising with the new farming technique, he implemented the said farming technique fully across his farms, in 2010. From then on, he responsibly uses appropriate machines to level the land. Nestled in the quiet Cameron Highlands, Terra Organic Farm is a place for urbanites to get close to nature. For the luxurious fresh air and scenic view offered, travellers are encouraged to take their own time, to slow down their pace, to breathe in the fresh air and enjoy the breath-taking view of the forest and hills. He also constructs his own tree-houses for visiting guests.
introduction: Ng Tien Khuan, known as the Divine Farmer, has built an earth house in Cameron, devoting himself to natural planting, specializing in organic cultivation, and also offering city dwellers the service of living on a farm to experience the sensation of the original forest. Through his sharing of the depths of the natural world, we are alerted to the extent to which hardening of the land can affect the world, and in this age of technological advancement, we seem to be far removed from science, violating the wisdom of the science of cultivation. Through Shennong's pictures, we can understand the response of "Bio-Dynamic Agriculture" to balance the survival mode of the earth. It turns out that planting does not need fertilizers, but only [vitality], so that the technology of [natural farming] can replace [chemical fertilizer agriculture], and we can see that there is a bright road in the future. Listening to you is better than reading a hundred years of books.

translations.title: 未来的农业
translations.name: 黄田环
translations.bio: 自1999年毕业于马来西亚大学物理系后，黄田環曾在马来西亚拉曼学院担任三年的讲师，也在马来西亚生命线协会任辅导员一职；直到2006年，他愿意重新来过，创办了有机公司。两年后，他也赴澳洲以及纽西兰学习一门新艺术 Bio Dynamic活力農耕法，并创办了Terra有机农场，全面使用该有效，并没有以任何化学工料的培养的菜园。2010年后，他用正确的机器来耕耘土地。在宁静的金马伦高原上，Terra有机农场是都市人放松的好地方，放慢脚步，细细品味大自然美。黄田环也亲自建筑树屋，供来访者静心享受天然气息之用。
translations.introduction: 黃田環，被誉为神农，在金马伦建造土屋，投入于天然种植，专研有机培育，也为城市人提供住在农场的服务，去体会原始森林的感悟。透过他对自然界博大精深的分享，我们警觉土地硬化能够影响世界的幅度甚广，在这科技进步的时代，我们仿佛却远离了科学，违反了种植的科学智慧。透过神农的图片显示，我们可以了解到 『活力農耕（Bio-Dynamic Agriculture）』的应对方案，达到平衡地球的生存模式，原来，种植不需要肥料，只需要［活力］，这样[自然农耕］的技术，可以取代［化肥农业］，我们看见未来有道光明的路。听君一席话，胜读百年书。

title: Nature is filled with surprises
name: Calvin Soh
bio: In addition to helming Nesh MARKETING SDN BHD’s product development arm, Calvin Soh is also the president of the Society of Wilderness Malaysia. His aim is to build a genuine connection between innovation and nature. He is also a fervent photographer capturing the natural sceneries of the Malaysian rainforests – an asset which he proudly attempts to conserve through education and awareness programmes. Malaysian rainforest has been severely depleted in recent years due to the country’s emphasis on economical development. For a rainforest to become an oil palm plantation it takes only ten years; however for a full rainforest to achieve full bloom, it takes centuries. Calvin Soh’s effort in continuously driving this important message ,amid Malaysia’s pursuit in rapid economic development, should not go unnoticed.
introduction: Calvin Soh, with his pure and simple voice, awakens the public to recognize the preciousness of life, not only human life, but also animal life and even plant life, because he firmly believes that [nature has the best sound, as well as the most beautiful picture]. The universe provides for man, and man has nothing to offer in return. The world's oldest tropical rainforest is in Malaysia, but most of the country's people have never been there to see it. So Calvin Soh used valuable pictures to discover that the wisdom around us links human [creativity] from [imagination], that [imagination] from [where]? The natural laws of the world are all interlocked, the call for awakening, the need for human awakening, we have to sigh the rhythm of the world coexistence, in addition to not killing, but also must be resurrected. For there is not a single thing in nature that is useless - this is the law that the world uses to balance the world. Human [creativity] comes from [imagination], and that [imagination] is from [nature]!

translations.title: 大自然充满惊喜
translations.name: 苏添益
translations.occupation: 马来西亚荒野保护协会主席
translations.bio: 身兼NeSH MARKETING SDN BHD产品研发总监和马来西亚荒野保护协会会长，苏添益坚信研发与环保可并存。喜爱把自然风光捕捉入镜头内的他，为马来西亚所拥有的最古老雨林感到自豪，并透过教育和宣传活动提升大众对雨林的认识，学习欣赏大自然的真善美。雨林被开发成油棕园只需约10年的时间，而一座茂盛雨林的形成则需好几个世纪。因着国家的经济发展需求，马来西亚的雨林在近年来遭受严重破坏，再过个几十年，或许一切的自然美景已不复存在。眼看大自然受到如此极大的威胁，苏添益深感遗憾之余，也穿上全副军装当个“守护雨林的勇士”，尽己所能抵挡经济发展的洪流，把爱护与欣赏大自然的信息传达到众人心中。
translations.introduction: 苏添益，用那把纯朴的声音，唤醒民众认知生命可贵，不知是人类的生命，还到动物，甚至植物的生命，因为他坚决的相信［大自然有最好的声音，以及最美好的画面］。宇宙万物以供人，人无一物以报恩。世界最古老的热带雨林就在马来西亚，但多数本国人没到过其中见识。所以蘇添益用了宝贵的图片去发现，我们身边的智慧链接人类的［创意］是来自［想像力］，那［想象力］来自［哪里］？世界的自然法则都是环环相扣的，醒觉的呼吁，需要人类的觉醒，我们要叹息世界共存的节律，除了不杀生，更必须要复生。因为大自然没有一个东西是没有用的——这是世界用以平衡世界的规律。人类的［创意］是来自［想像力］，那［想象力］就是来自［大自然］！

title: Medley of five classic chinese songs
name: 16 Strings String Quartet
bio: 16 Strings String Quartet, formed in 2012 comprises of 1st violinist Lisa Chia, 2nd violinist Amy Lim, violist Ling Liyen and cellist Chong Eugene. All former members of the Malaysian Philharmonic Youth Orchestra, they decided to pursue their lifelong passion of chamber music that led to the formation of the quartet. From wedding gigs to corporate functions, Sixteen Strings are actively involved in various live performances all over Malaysia, skilled with working in a variety of genres. In November 2013 the quartet made their recital debut in Kuala Lumpur at Damansara Performing Arts Centre DPAC. Shortly after, in December 2013, 16 Strings String Quartet received an invitation as a resident guest artist to participate in Kota Kinabalu’s first ever String Festival. They have embarked on a performance journey across Malaysia.
introduction: The 16 Strings String Quartet presents the beautiful music of Western classical instruments combined with Eastern classical masterpieces.

translations.title: 五个经典华语组曲
translations.name: 十六弦乐四重奏
translations.bio: 创办于2012，古典乐团十六弦乐四重奏目前是由 第一小提琴 lisa chia, 第二小提琴 amy lim,中提琴 ling li yen , 大提琴chong eugene 组织而成的。离开马来西亚青年管弦乐团后，他们决定要朝室内乐进军，并创立了该乐团。他们余音绕梁的音乐，曾在不同的婚礼与商业活动留下了印记。2013年，自Damansara Performing Arts Centre首演后，12月间，他们也被邀请到东马来西亚亚庇弦乐节演出；从此巡演马来西亚各州。
translations.introduction: 十六弦乐四重奏为大家呈现西方古典乐器与东方经典名曲结合的美妙音乐。

title: In honour of languages
name: Ooi Kee How
bio: Since returning home to Malaysia from China 4 years ago, Kee How has been hot on his heels in contributing to Malaysian culture and heritage through his research and preservation of local Penang Hokkien language for the Malaysian state. His love for languages and cultures has been his sole motivator in this meaningful quest to promote linguistic diversity. He at present works as the theatre manager of Performing Arts Centre of Penang.
introduction: What Ooi Kee How really wants to promote is the idea that language is not only a cultural heritage, but also a survival ability. Speak your own dialect, don't let it disappear, and learn to accept and respect all kinds of languages in the world with an open mind, so that you can look at things without prejudice and have a broader vision.

translations.title: 语有荣焉
translations.name: 黄启灏
translations.occupation: 地方语言维护及推广者
translations.bio: 啟灝于 2010 年末离开服务了 11 年的跨国企业，从中国返回马来西亚另谋发展。其热忱与理想多年来一直周旋于艺术、文化边缘，因此担任檳城表演艺术中心经理一职，除了得以在这领域投身贡献外，更有幸日常中得以结识富有创意想法的年轻人。他坚信隐藏在不同语言中的奥妙和魅力，其最大兴趣便是致力于接触、参与一切和发展檳城福建话有关的事物。
translations.introduction: 黄启灏真正想要推广的理念是：语言不只是文化传承，也是一种生存能力。说自己的方言，别让方言消失，学会敞开心胸接受并尊重世界上的各种语言，让自己在看待事情时不带偏见、有更广阔的视野。

title: Be our truth self
name: Hoong Jia Hui
bio: It has never been a doubt that Jia Hui possesses a talent with her voice. Since age 19, she has been working as a professional host full time, an emcee, a DJ and voice talent, to name a few. Hosting as a mainstay, she is often heard as a live DJ in major malls, a host in concert tours involving renowned artists, an emcee reading citations at awards ceremonies, introducing brands at corporate events, running her own talk segments on radio station and TV programmes, not to mention a voice-over talent for a variety of commercials. Her life took a turn at the age of 35, when she had an enchanting encounter with Spiritual teacher and astrologist Master Terry Hu. She was initiated into the world of astrology and spiritual awakening. Since then, she has devoted herself into the process of deepening spiritual understanding and awareness. Her work has gradually shifted to behind-the-scenes, providing spiritual counselling and voice training to those who aspire to improve themselves.
introduction: You know, you have as many question marks about your life as there are obstacles. You don't want to think that this is the Divine: "You have a lot of questions, come on, I'll give you a test." It's not, because, it's actually the beginning of our personal growth.

event.title: Refine
event.description:
In 2014, as an extension to the symbol and logotype the previous year, the new design echoes the theme Refine; Redefine attempting to map our journey in discovering the new.
Anchoring on the concept of ink diffusion in Chinese calligraphy, Chinese characters从心 diffuse into a new typeface for the Chinese characters 重新, signalling a new perspective towards local Chinese culture.

translations.title: 從心
translations.description: 自我们2013年之点滴串联主题后，今年大会将从心体会我国的一切，并用新视角重新看待、创新事物。从点点滴滴串联在一起的墨，到晕开了的墨痕，重新转化成新字体之意象，将是我们团队的主要推动力。该图像是由马来西亚设计团队三一工作室给TedxPetalingStreet的精心杰作。设计图像之寓意：大会是马来西亚人沟通的主要桥梁， 从心感觉墨的行书， 到重新发掘新华文字体代表了马来西亚华人心连心，互助的精神。

Since age 19, she has been working as a professional host full time, an emcee, a DJ and voice talent, to name a few. translations.title: 成为真实的自己
translations.name: 洪嘉惠
translations.bio: 从19岁开始就是一个全职声音工作者。参与工作性质以主持为主，由广场DJ， 小型巡回演唱会主持，企业舞台颁奖礼，到电台与电视主持。除外，也参与广告幕后配音工作。35岁那一年因缘巧合下上了胡因梦带领的占星以及身心灵课程，从此投入大量时间于身心灵的学习。目前，工作性质渐渐走向幕后，除了依然活跃于舞台主持外，主要是从事心灵咨询工作，以及声音培训方面的工作。
translations.introduction: 你知道吗，你对你的人生有多少的问号，就会有多少的障碍。你不要以为这是上天：“你有很多问题，来，我给你考验。”其实不是，因为，它其实就是我们个人成长的开始。

title: musical theatre
name: Onn San
bio: Onn San is an award-winning composer, arranger & music director who graduated with an MFA in musical theater writing as a composer at the New York University, Tisch School of The Arts, Graduate Musical Theatre Writing Program. He is the first Malaysian composer to graduate and received the Dean’s Fellowship Award from the program. Nominated 5 times for the Kakiseni’s Boh Cameronian Arts Awards (Malaysia’s most prestigious arts awards) and won 3 including “Best Original Music” (Everworld, 2013), “Best Musical Director” (Everworld, 2013) and “Audience Choice Award (Marrying Me, 2014) His musical, MARRYING ME was recently selected by the New York Theatre Barn Concert Series and was performed at the DLounge Theatre in New York City in September 2014. His orchestration credits include: KING DAVID (Off-Broadway). The New York Times commented on Onn’s orchestrations as “...lushly orchestrated”, while Backstage, NY said it was “...seductively lilting.” JOSEPH AND THE AMAZING TECHICOLOR DREAMCOAT (Miracle Theatre presents) His musical directing credits include: Mel Brook’s THE PRODUCERS (PAN Production presents, 2013) & RUBY MOON (KLpac presents, 2012) His debut album, “EPOMANIA - an epic soundtrack by Onn San” was launched in September 2011 and is available on iTunes.
introduction: A full-time career in music is not something that everyone has the courage to try, but for multi-instrumentalist Onn San, it is the most important thing in his life. From film to television to music theater, Rong Anh has been able to perform in a number of moving and Malaysian-inspired compositions.

translations.title: 音乐之势：在电影、电视与音乐剧场内影响我们The power of music: How music influences us as used in film, TV &
translations.name: 辛荣安
translations.occupation: 作曲、编曲、音乐总监集一身的艺术家
translations.bio: 辛荣安是一名得奖无数，作曲、编曲、音乐总监集一身的艺术家。毕业自美国纽约大学Tisch School of The Arts 音乐剧创作课程，他可是该大学里第一个荣获校长奖学金的学生。曾被5次被马来西亚Cameronian艺术奖提名，及曾以最佳原著音乐、最佳音乐总监以及最佳公众挑选奖挂冕。他所创作的音乐剧 Marrying Me与今年9月已被受邀 到纽约剧场Barn演奏会系列演出，地点为DLounge剧场。被纽约时报誉为“备具魅力的合奏”，也被杂志Backstage称为“轻轻摇晃般地摄人魅力”之美称连连，荣安百老汇制作包括Mel Brook’s THE PRODUCERS(PAN Production presents, 2013) & RUBY MOON (KLpac presents, 2012)等 。2011年，他也出版了个人首张音乐专辑《EPOMANIA - an epic soundtrack by Onn San》
translations.introduction: 全职从事音乐工作不是每个人都有勇气去试的，但是对多元音乐家辛荣安而言，却是他人生中最重要的事情。从电影到电视，以至音乐剧场，荣安都能加以胜任，创作了许多动人以及极富马来西亚风味的曲调。

title: How to design life?
name: Nini Andrade Silva
bio:
Nini Andrade Silva is one of the most prestigious interior designers in the world. Born in Funchal, Nini graduated in Design at the Institute of Visual Arts, Design and Marketing (IADE) in Lisbon, and simultaneously pursued her academic and professional experience abroad, where she studied and worked in New York, London, Paris, South Africa and Denmark. Her work has international recognition, having put the name of Portugal alongside the biggest and best designers in the world, being the creative mind behind multiple hotels members from the Design HotelsTM chain. With an impressive work across the world, Nini have seen several times her work distinguished and becoming a constant presence in prestigious publications worldwide. Nini is also an international consultant for IADE, thus integrating the panel of guest lecturers to the School of Design, and received IADE CAREER AWARD
2010. As a result of this recognition, last June 2011, Nini Andrade Silva was distinguished by the Portuguese Government with the Honored Title “Grau de Oficial da Ordem do Infante D. Henrique”, by her rendered outstanding service to Portugal, within and abroad. Recently she was appointed as Cultural Ambassador by Guimaraes 2012 - European Capital!
introduction: NINI ANDRADE SILVA, a world renowned interior designer, share her thought with us about life.Be creative, everyone is different, everyone is special. Believe in yourself and be yourself. When you decide to be something, lets go ahead, and explain to people why you want to do, and sometime, you have to be deaf!

translations.title: 如何设计生活？
translations.name: Nini Andrade Silva
translations.occupation: 葡萄牙籍名室内设计师
translations.bio: 世上有谁能真正堪称自己并没有事业，而是拥有一个生命企划？ 葡萄牙籍 Nini Andrade Silva就是这一位出众的名室内设计。毕业于里斯本视觉艺术、设计、以及行销学院（IADE），并步行海外的她，历经纽约、伦敦、巴黎、南非以及丹麦进行设计创作，被受国际瞩目，也将葡萄牙与世界顶尖的设计师聚集一堂。她是世界顶尖主题酒店连锁 Hotels TM Chain 的主要设计，设计蓝图被许多著名的室内设计杂志报道。Nini 也为她母校 IADE世界设计顾问，将学校里的老师与世界设计先进相结合，也于2010年荣获IADE企业奖。2011年6月，Nini 被葡萄牙政府赐封为“Grau de Oficial da Ordem do Infante D. Henrique”（Grand Officer of the Order of Prince Henry）; 2012年，她也是欧洲首都文化大使。
translations.introduction: 世界著名室内设计师 NINI ANDRADE SILVA 与我们分享了她对生活的思考。相信自己，做自己。当你决定做某件事情时，让我们继续前进，向人们解释你为什么要这么做，有时，你必须充耳不闻！

title: In love with wood and sound
name: Ong Ket Wei
bio: Being Malaysia’s one and only luthier -- the violin maker -- and the only Malaysian who has been trained in this skill, Ong Ket Wei is a proud alumnus of the acclaimed the international school of violin making named Stradivarius School in Cremona, Italy. He has done his teacher Maestro Massimo Negroni proud by bringing the technique of violin making rooted in the traditional classical cremonese style, coupled with the unique reddish amber with brown and antique colored varnishing to Malaysia. He aspires to promote the art of Italian violin making in Malaysia. Ket Wei’s passion in violin making comes from his music training in classical and jazz guitar, under the guidance of Juan Pablop De Zubiria Rueda. Coupled with double bass, his passion was brought to another level, under the mentorship of Mr.Foo Yin Hong and Mr.Joesph Pruesser, with whom the Malaysian Philharmonic Orchestra (MPO) has nurtured. Currently, Ong Ket Wei professionally plays the double bass in a variety of genres, from contemporary music to jazz, with the Malaysian Philharmonic Youth Orchestra (MPYO), National Symphony Orchestra (NSO) and the Orchestra Radio Televisyen Malaysia (ORTM). He also frequently plays with the Penang Symphony Orchestra (PSO).
introduction: Ong Ket Wei, an Italian-trained violinist and the only violin maker in Malaysia, shares with us today the relationship between wood and music. He tells us in a few minutes about the process of making a violin with simple pictures, and Kiwei's love and professionalism for violin making goes beyond the [interest] of ordinary people. This luthier, who listens with his heart and mixes with his hands, can be called the doctor of the violin, who tunes the soul of the player with his life, and this kind of delicate spirit towards life is called an expert.

translations.title: 木与音之恋
translations.name: 王祺伟
translations.occupation: 经意大利训练之大马小提琴师父
translations.bio: 身为马来西亚唯一的职业提琴制作师傅，也是唯一一位在克雷蒙那受过意大利传统手工艺训练的马来西亚人，王祺伟就读于国际著名提琴制作学校，意大利的 Stradivarius School in Cremona。至今，他已经将老师Maestro Massimo Negroni的真传 -- 传统克雷蒙那风格的小提琴 -- 带入了马来西亚。他立志要将这意大利传统的手工艺推广到马来西亚各地。造琴之热忱来自他爵士与古典吉他训练，师承Juan Pablop De Zubiria Rueda。另外，王祺伟也非常热爱低音提琴，师承马来西亚爱乐乐团团员 Foo Yin Hong （胡英鸿） and Joesph Pruesser。目前，他是个当代古典音乐与爵士的乐手，参与的乐团有马来西亚爱乐乐团、马来西亚青年爱乐乐团，国家交响乐团、以及马来西亚电视广播乐团。
translations.introduction: 王祺伟是意大利受训过的小提琴手，也是马来西亚唯一的小提琴制造师，今日和我们分享［木头和音乐的关系］，他以几分钟简单的用图片讲述琴的制造过程，祺伟对制琴的热爱与专业，超乎了一般人所停留在的［兴趣］。这位用心聆听，用手调配的琴师，可称为小提琴的医生，用生命调出琴手奏出来的灵魂，这种对生命细腻的精神，就叫专家。

title: With own hands
name: Chin Yoon Khen
bio: Chin Yoon Khen studied information technology at Kolej Damansara Utama (KDU), Penang, and then worked as a systems analyst with Intel. In 2011, he founded a small company, Cekap Media, and practices as a documentary photographer and website developer. At the same year, he walked along the shaded five-foot ways or narrow alleys alone to document the manufacturing process for more than 60 traditional trades of Penang, concentrating on those trades are traditionally associated with its diverse local communities. The documentary journey took him for 2 years. He has developed innovative platforms for presenting his findings, such as e-books and websites. In 2014, he got funding from Think City to publish his first book in September, named as Traditional Trades of Penang. He has highlighted the people, processes and products that make the historical trades of the various traditional communities so unique. He is currently a Project Program Management Advisor in Dell.
introduction:
Most of the older generation believe that young people are reluctant to listen to their stories, let alone those that have something to say about their lifelong industry. With this simple and loving belief, Chin Yoon Khen has traveled all over Malaysia to hear the stories of the old tradesmen and experience the sorrows of these old tradesmen.

In 2011, he finished his job as an engineer in a technology company and was ready to leave Penang for Singapore. Originally, he just wanted to get to know the town before he left, but he didn't realize that his trip to Penang on foot would let him see the moving but soon to be forgotten images of the town, and he decided to stay and do what he had to do at the moment, listening to his heart and mind.

His sharing is telling us that this land needs more of him.

translations.title: 從心
translations.description: 自我们2013年之点滴串联主题后，今年大会将从心体会我国的一切，并用新视角重新看待、创新事物。从点点滴滴串联在一起的墨，到晕开了的墨痕，重新转化成新字体之意象，将是我们团队的主要推动力。该图像是由马来西亚设计团队三一工作室给TedxPetalingStreet的精心杰作。设计图像之寓意：大会是马来西亚人沟通的主要桥梁， 从心感觉墨的行书， 到重新发掘新华文字体代表了马来西亚华人心连心，互助的精神。

translations.title: With own hands
translations.name: Chin Yoon Khen
translations.bio: Chin Yoon Khen studied information technology at Kolej Damansara Utama (KDU), Penang, and then worked as a systems analyst with Intel. In 2011, he founded a small company, Cekap Media, and practices as a documentary photographer and website developer. At the same year, he walked along the shaded five-foot ways or narrow alleys alone to document the manufacturing process for more than 60 traditional trades of Penang, concentrating on those trades are traditionally associated with its diverse local communities. The documentary journey took him for 2 years. He has developed innovative platforms for presenting his findings, such as e-books and websites. In 2014, he got funding from Think City to publish his first book in September, named as Traditional Trades of Penang. He has highlighted the people, processes and products that make the historical trades of the various traditional communities so unique. He is currently a Project Program Management Advisor in Dell.
translations.introduction:
Most of the older generation believe that young people are reluctant to listen to their stories, let alone those that have something to say about their lifelong industry. With this simple and loving belief, Chin Yoon Khen has traveled all over Malaysia to hear the stories of the old tradesmen and experience the sorrows of these old tradesmen.

In 2011, he finished his job as an engineer in a technology company and was ready to leave Penang for Singapore. Originally, he just wanted to get to know the town before he left, but he didn't realize that his trip to Penang on foot would let him see the moving but soon to be forgotten images of the town, and he decided to stay and do what he had to do at the moment, listening to his heart and mind.

His sharing is telling us that this land needs more of him.

translations.title: 一手造成
translations.name: 陈永健
translations.bio: 陈永健毕业于马来西亚槟城伯乐大学资讯科学系，就业与美国科技公司Intel。2011年，他创办了小型企业 Cekap Media，提供记录摄影以及网页发展服务。同年，他也独步录下了超过60个槟城里的制造业的生产过程。他所关注的是在地社群的行业。这个影像记录路程为期两年；他也将记录成果出版成电子书与网站。2014年，他获得Think City之赞助与支持，与9月发表他的新书（槟城老行业）。目前，他是Dell电脑公司的企划管理顾问。
translations.introduction:
大多数老一辈人都认为年轻人都不愿意听他们说故事，更何况是有关于他们终身行业的点点滴滴。陈永健就凭这个充满爱心的单纯信念，走遍了马来西亚各地听取了许多老行业的故事，以及经验这些老行业人的辛酸。

2011年，他结束了在科技公司的工程师工作，准备离开槟城，往新加坡发展。原本只想要在离开前,好好认识这座城镇,却没想到那趟徒步槟城之旅,让他看见了动人却即将被遗忘的城镇画面，他听心从心，决定留下来做这件当下非做不可的事。

他的分享是在告诉我们，这片土地还需要更多个他。

title: Different abilities, one passion!
name: Florence Chan
bio:
Florence Chan began her entrepreneurial journey in 2009. She took over the bakery training facility of the rehabilitation complex under Tung Wah Group of Hospitals and turned it into a social enterprise achieving both business and social missions. iBakery -- a bakery and catering business employing people with disabilities -- was founded in 2010. With continuous expansion over the last 4 years, it has become a reputable and award winning social enterprise, with 7 shop outlets operated by a team of 60 staff members, consisting of different physical and mental abilities. Apart from creating employment for people with disabilities, Florence has also built a strong network of passionate volunteers relevant expertise to support the development of iBakery. She also actively took part in community education activities, promoting ideas of social enterprising and social inclusion to over 1400 local and
overseas visitors. Before venturing into social business, she had worked for several NGOs, including the Hong Kong Christian Service, the Hong Kong Council of Social Services, Hong Kong Red Cross, serving the needy in the community. Florence obtained her Bachelor of Social Science Degree from the Chinese University of Hong Kong, and was graduated from INSEAD Social Entrepreneurship Programme.
introduction: Originally from Hong Kong, Florence Chan set up iBakery in 2010 to provide training and create employment opportunities for people with disabilities. It's not been an easy journey, from starting her own business in 2010 to today's 60-strong workforce, seven stores, and a wide variety of breads and pastries, which makes her feel that all the hard work has been worth it. She hopes that society will give equal opportunities and treatment to people with disabilities.

translations.title: 不同能力，同一热爱
translations.name: 陈佩珊
translations.occupation: 东华三院赛马会复康中心副院长
translations.bio: Florence陈佩珊于2009年开始涉足社会企业创立，负责将东华三院属下的烘焙生产训练单位，转化为营运及社会目标兼备的烘焙社会企业。她在2010年成立了专门聘用残疾人士的iBakery，主要业务包括烘焙及餐饮。过去四年，业务不断扩展，目前iBakery拥有七家分店，聘请了60位不同能力的雇员，并获得社会及业界多个奖项和认同。除了为残疾人士创造就业机会，她也为 iBakery建立了强大的义工网络，同时积极参与社区教育，与过千名本地及海外访客分享社企营运经验及iBakery的共融理念。Florence过去一直在社会福利界工作，曾服务於不同的非政府机构工作，包括香港基督教服务处、香港社会服务联会及香港红十字会。她在香港中文大学取得社会科学学士学位，亦毕业於INSEAD Social Entrepreneurship Programme.
translations.introduction: 来自香港的陈佩珊在 2010 年成立了专门聘用残疾人士的 iBakery，为残疾人士提供训练，创造就业机会。一路走来不易，从 2010 年的创业，到今天的 60 人工作团队，七家店铺，各式各样的面包以及西饼类，让她觉得一切的努力是值得的。她希望社会应该给予平等的机会与对待，给残疾人士一个机会。

title: Right from the heart
name: Jan Chia
bio: Having graduated from a TV and film specialization, Jan Chia has been performing at pubs. She is also a translator. In 2012, she met with an accident. She was severely crippled. Later, while on physiotherapy, she decided to continue into translation full-time. She obtained her professional translation qualification in 2014, becoming a translator in the world. She appreciated every moment since her miraculous recovery and is determined to preserve, living positively till the end.
introduction:
Jan Chia, a serious car accident two years ago, caused a comprehensive fracture, triggering spinal injury and total paralysis, resulting in an inability to connect the mind and bodily functions, not only unconsciousness, but also illusions. But how did this fighter for life come out on the occasion of a cruel attack of fate?

Under the battle between dreams and reality, she flowed with a fountain of inspiration and found hope out of despair. With her determination to start from the heart, the word [nothing] inspired the idea of self-healing her nerves and initiated the hope of breaking through life and finding infinite possibilities for her world. Starting from the heart, starting over.

translations.title: 从心出发
translations.name: 谢宛芊
translations.occupation: 攀过自身障碍的音乐人
translations.bio: 毕业于广播电视电影系， 毕业后是民歌餐厅驻唱歌手，也经担任过翻译、特约采访记者，和网页内容作者。最后，选择以全职驻唱为生。《海螺》餐厅，是宛芊成为驻唱歌手的出发点，和很多驻唱歌手一样，驻唱足迹亦遍布整个吉隆坡地区。2012年4月28日，非常不幸地，表演回家途中发生严重车祸，脊椎损伤和综合性骨折导致严重瘫痪。之前， 除了复诊与物理治疗、坐/ 睡在家里， 宛芊要求家人开通网络，并开始向外界提供翻译服务，赚取经费，然后报考专业翻译。今年2014年正式毕业，文凭由马来西亚国家语文局（DBP）认证。如今为世界各地的翻译社/客户提供翻译。从鬼门关来回一趟后，宛芊珍惜着让她存活下来的每一点滴幸运，未来的挑战，不会因此而结束，也不会因为她的过去而变得更容易。宛芊，已有所准备。
translations.introduction:
谢宛芊，两年前一场严重的车祸，引起综合性骨折，引发脊椎损伤，全身瘫痪，导致头脑和身体机能无法联系，不但没有知觉，而且也产生错觉。但在残酷的命运袭击之际，这位生命斗士是如何走出来的呢？

她在梦境与现实的搏斗之下，流动起灵感的泉源，从绝望中找到希望。在她从心出发的决心下，一个［无］字，启发了她自愈神经的点子，也启动了突破生命的希望，为自己的世界找到无限可能的机会。从心出发，重新出发！

title: Innovate Tradition
name: 萧斐弘
occupation: Original creator of high pile lion dance
bio: He started participating in the lion team in the 1970s. In 1992, because he had the same philosophy as the leadership of Kuan Seng Palace in Muar, he decided to work with a group of like-minded behind-the-scenes promoters to carry forward Malaysia’s unique high-pile lion dance culture and push it to the international stage.
introduction: You know the art of lion dance, but do you understand the cultural meaning behind it? Lion dance is not a competition of skills, but also a reflection of deeper culture. It comes from the heart and is the most beautiful.

event.title: The Path
event.description:
This year, TEDxPetalingStreet bring you
'The Path'. The Path explores the foot prints
of Life. Re-look into the imprints of those who have traversed ahead. The road less traveled by many, only to those who dared to believe, with their hearts, and made their dreams come true.
‘The Path' is a journey. It's a journey of self reflection, of discovery, of curiosity, to go where you may be afraid or uncertain.Discover what lies ahead of you. Take the
first step towards the future. Let our speakers take your hand and walk – 'The Path’.
Let's walk together, this November 14th 2015.

first step towards the future. Let our speakers take your hand and walk – 'The Path’.
Let's walk together, this November 14th 2015.

translations.title: 行跡
translations.description:
当风起而过，遗留一路落叶
当船行航过，拖曳出一抹水浪波纹
当蛇行蜿蜒迂迴，在沙堆土壤留下痕迹
当蚂蚁群跟着头蚁东奔西走，依然步履如一
当篮球大帝Jordan的时代远去，James的时代来临
当Tyson在台上被击倒，拳王神话不再，全盛之路宣告终结 当孙燕姿开腔天黑黑，开启了一个时代的声音
今年大会主题:“行跡”，表达人生行迹走过的烙印，每一脚步的能量，都蕴涵再前进的反思，静默真心，聆听内在，淬炼自我，关爱这片土地。
路，永在前方,我们并肩同行！

translations.title: 从传统到创新
translations.name: 萧斐弘
translations.bio: 70年代开始参与狮队 ，1992年因与麻坡关圣宫领导层理念相同 ，决定与 一群志同道合的幕后推手，把大马本土独特的高桩舞狮文化发扬光大 ，推向国际舞台。
translations.introduction: 你知道舞狮技艺，但你了解背后的文化意涵吗？舞狮，不是技艺的比武，也是深层文化的体现。由心而发，最美。

title: Oh! So this is what Fashion is about!
name: Eric Choong
occupation: Founder of high-end custom wedding dress brand Eric choong and men’s ready-to-wear brand Freedom by Eric choong
bio: Graduated from the Hong Kong Institute of Fashion Design in 1986 and returned to Kuala Lumpur in 1990, aiming to integrate Malaysian traditions and Asian elements into avant-garde fashion design concepts to promote globally. He has won multiple fashion design awards and has been invited to participate in many exhibitions and exhibitions. International Fashion Week; designed dresses for several late superstars
introduction: People rely on clothes, the right clothes, give people a better taste, let people regain confidence; life is the same. The designer's mind, in the raw material take and take, give people design clothes; at the same time, also for their own life edited a set of unique, insightful clothing.
