translations.title: 服装原来就是那回事
translations.name: 宗柏伸
translations.occupation: 高级客制婚纱品牌Eric choong与男装成衣品牌—Freedom by Eric choong 的创始者
translations.bio: 1986年于香港服装设计学院毕业 ， 1990年回到吉隆坡，旨在将大马传统与亚洲元素融入前卫时尚的设计理念向全球推广，他荣获多项服装设计奖项，更受邀参与多地展览与国际时装周 ；曾为几位已故巨星设计礼服。
translations.introduction: 人靠衣装，恰到好处的衣服，给人更好的品味，让人重拾信心；生命亦同。设计师的心思，在原料取舍中，给人设计出衣裳；同时也为自己生命编辑了一套属于自己独特、有见地的服饰。

title: Being Human
name: Wong Chee Hong
occupation: One of the founders of Jingxue Academy
bio: Graduated from the Chinese Department of Nanjing University in China in 2009 with a master's degree, studying under Professor Cao Hong. The master's thesis "Dongpo Water View" written in ancient Chinese has been well received by professors inside and outside the school.
introduction: What does the long history of Chinese culture have to do with you? Culture embodies life, life undergoes change, and with all the changes in the timeline, what have we learned and what have we lost? To "live and learn" means to keep on learning and to have a decent attitude. It's not hard to be a decent human being.

translations.description:

'The Path'. The Path explores the foot prints
of Life. Re-look into the imprints of those who have traversed ahead. The road less traveled by many, only to those who dared to believe, with their hearts, and made their dreams come true.

translations.title: 行跡
translations.description:
当风起而过，遗留一路落叶
当船行航过，拖曳出一抹水浪波纹
当蛇行蜿蜒迂迴，在沙堆土壤留下痕迹
当蚂蚁群跟着头蚁东奔西走，依然步履如一
当篮球大帝Jordan的时代远去，James的时代来临
当Tyson在台上被击倒，拳王神话不再，全盛之路宣告终结 当孙燕姿开腔天黑黑，开启了一个时代的声音
今年大会主题:“行跡”，表达人生行迹走过的烙印，每一脚步的能量，都蕴涵再前进的反思，静默真心，聆听内在，淬炼自我，关爱这片土地。
路，永在前方,我们并肩同行！

translations.title: Being Human
translations.name: Wong Chee Hong
translations.occupation: One of the founders of Jingxue Academy
translations.bio: Graduated from the Chinese Department of Nanjing University in China in 2009 with a master's degree, studying under Professor Cao Hong. The master's thesis "Dongpo Water View" written in ancient Chinese has been well received by professors inside and outside the school.
translations.introduction: What does the long history of Chinese culture have to do with you? Culture embodies life, life undergoes change, and with all the changes in the timeline, what have we learned and what have we lost? To "live and learn" means to keep on learning and to have a decent attitude. It's not hard to be a decent human being.

translations.title: 人
translations.name: 黄智鸿
translations.occupation: 敬学书院的创办人之一
translations.bio: 2009年自中国南京大学中文系硕士毕业，师从曹虹教授。以古文撰写的硕士毕业论文 《东坡水观》， 深获校内外教授好评。
translations.introduction: 渊源流长的中华文化，它跟你有著什么关系？文化体现生活，生活经历变革，时间轴上的千变万化，我们学会了什么，丢失了什么？「活到老，学到老」就是持续学习，像样的态度。一个像样的人，不难。

title: Traditional children's game is Life itself
name: 郑锦华
occupation: One of the founders of Wujiaoji Children’s Playhouse,is a lecturer of Zheng Jin Hua Yi Xue course,spiritual construction course lecturer and folklore worker
bio: Since 2001, he has been actively promoting traditional Nanyang games from the 1960s and 1970s in Northern Malaysia and cultivating young people to participate. The children's play team led by him has been invited to participate in Penang temple fairs, cultural garden fairs, carnivals hosted by the Tourism Bureau, etc.
introduction: How much of your childhood games do you remember? Do you understand the wisdom of the metaphors? Childhood games are not only a way to kill time, but they are also a way to promote the wisdom of the world and nourish us invisibly.

translations.title: 童玩人生
translations.name: 郑锦华
translations.occupation:
五脚基童玩馆创办人之一，
郑锦华集易学课程讲师，
心灵建设课程讲师与民俗工作者
translations.bio: 自2001年始 ， 他积极在北马推广60 、70年代南洋传统游戏 ， 并培育年轻人参与 。他率领的童玩团队曾受邀参与槟城庙会 、文化园游会 、旅游局主办的嘉年华等 。
translations.introduction: 儿时的生活游戏中，你还记得多少？你暸解间中喻意的处世智慧吗？童玩不单消磨时光，它更承载促进人生智化处世的养分，无形滋养著我们。

title: Soring into the Sky
name: Lim Khoy Hing
occupation: Former civil aviation pilot who started his flying career in the Royal Malaysian Air Force
bio: Joined Malaysia Airlines in 1979 and AirAsia in 2006, then switched to AirAsia long-haul service until his retirement in 2011.
introduction: You often fly abroad, but how much do you know about airplanes and aviation? It's not as complicated as you might think. Instead of worrying, it is better to understand and feel at ease.

translations.introduction: You often fly abroad, but how much do you know about airplanes and aviation? It's not as complicated as you might think. Instead of worrying, it is better to understand and feel at ease.

translations.title: 冲上云霄
translations.name: 林钜兴
translations.occupation: 前民航飞机师，在大马皇家空军开始他的飞行生涯
translations.bio: 1979年加入马航 ，2006年加入亚航， 随后转为亚航长途服务，直至2011年退休。
translations.introduction: 你经常出国飞行，但你对飞机、飞航瞭解有多少呢？航行中大小事，没想像中复杂难解。与其忧心，不如了解而安心。

title: You · Me · The Ocean Story
name: 颜铭亨
occupation: Committed to participating in private sector environmental impact assessment projects
bio: Originally from Bangkok, after obtaining a diploma in fisheries from the University of Putra, he continued to study for a degree in aquaculture technology and studied marine botany at UMT Terengganu. Conducted in-depth research on seaweed and seagrass ecosystems in coastal areas of the Malay Peninsula
introduction: The life of the oceans is so far away and so close to you. The ocean occupies 3/4 of the earth and we know very little about it. Understanding it begins with seaweed, the concept of symbiosis, and then the protection of the environment, which is a common problem for you and me, a problem that we share and solve together. Environmental sustainability should be action.

translations.title: 你。我·海洋的故事
translations.name: 颜铭亨
translations.occupation: 致力于参与私人企业的环境影响评估项目
translations.bio: 来自邦格岛， 考取博特拉大学渔业文凭后，继续攻读水产养殖技术学位，于登嘉楼UMT钻研海洋植物学领域 。曾就马来半岛沿海地区海藻和海草生态系统进行深入研究。
translations.introduction: 海洋的生命，跟你关系即远，又如此的近。海洋占据地球的3/4，而我们对它的了解是非常的少。了解它，从海藻开始，了解共生的概念，进而看到环境的保护，是你我共同的问题，共同承担、共同解决的问题。环境永续应是行动。

title: Glamorous Moment of Theatre
name: Emiko Ten
occupation: The artistic director of the theater company
bio: She switched from producer to director in 2010. His work "Falling in Love with the Bastard" won the 11th Drama Award for Best Drama, and was shortlisted for Best Screenplay of the Year and Best Director of the Year. Since 2013, we have planned and promoted Theatersports Malaysia, promoted it on campus in a transparent way, and shared it with the public. She is good at performance production and event planning, and has served as a stage play producer and college drama instructor for many times.
introduction: Sunrise and sunset, life is on and off the stage, without any modification of layout, real presentation, laying out the day. In addition to the pre-determined order of the stage, there is a possibility of improvisation, reacting according to the intuition of the moment and giving real feedback.

translations.title: 舞台魅力
translations.name: 邓宇雯
translations.bio: 她在2010年从制作人转向编导工作 。其作品 《恋上王八蛋》  曾获第11届戏炬奖最佳戏剧 ， 入围年度最佳编剧与年度最佳导演 。2013年始， 策划与推广马来西亚Theatresports ， 以走透透形式在校园推广，向大众分享 。她个人擅长演出制作与活动策划， 多次担任舞台剧演出制作人和大专学院戏剧指导老师。
translations.introduction: 日出日落，人生一幕一幕上映下档，不经修饰布局，真实呈现，舖陈一天。舞台除了预设的顺序上演，有著一种可能：即兴演出，按照当下直觉做出反应，给予真实的反馈。

title: Maker Movement
name: 陈咏潼
occupation: One of the founders of a 30-person company that develops and produces various robotic components
bio: He once represented the University of Technology and won the National Robot Competition for College Students, so he represented Malaysia in the Asia-Pacific Robot Competition (Robocon). He believes that robot education should be cultivated from an early age, so he developed a simple teaching application package to allow 10-year-old children to easily assemble a robot.
introduction: How long has it been since you accomplished something with your hands? Creativity, a trend and a return to the essence of life, hand made departures.

translations.title: 创客运动
translations.name: 陈咏潼
translations.occupation: 一家拥有 30 人的公司的创始人之一，该公司开发和生产各种机器人组件
translations.bio: 曾代表工艺大学赢得全国大专生机器人大赛 ， 因此代表大马出征亚太机器人比赛 (Robocon) 。他相信， 应从小培养机器人教育 ， 因此开发简易教学应用组合 ，让10岁的孩子轻易组装一台机器人 。
translations.introduction: 你多久没动手完成一件事了？创客，是一个趋势，也是回到生活的本质，手做出发。

title: The Beauty of Unmanned Aircraft System
name: Ong Jiin Joo
occupation: Concurrently serves as chief technical director
bio: A scholarship recipient from the Singapore Economic Development Board, his interest in robotics started when he was building a computer mouse at Hwa Chong Junior College and continued in university. Although he is a software engineer, he is involved in building and implementing large-scale systems, managing marketing of telecommunications and SaaS products; leading the Singapore ICT industry in response to government plan proposals
introduction: When a new technology is invented, apart from solving the original problem, it can also be utilized to explore its potential new functions and make it more attractive. Drones, in addition to aerial photography, are the solution to many industrial problems, as they replace people in accomplishing difficult tasks at a lower cost.

first step towards the future. Let our speakers take your hand and walk – 'The Path’.
Let's walk together, this November 14th 2015.

translations.title: 行跡
translations.description:
当风起而过，遗留一路落叶
当船行航过，拖曳出一抹水浪波纹
当蛇行蜿蜒迂迴，在沙堆土壤留下痕迹
当蚂蚁群跟着头蚁东奔西走，依然步履如一
当篮球大帝Jordan的时代远去，James的时代来临
当Tyson在台上被击倒，拳王神话不再，全盛之路宣告终结 当孙燕姿开腔天黑黑，开启了一个时代的声音
今年大会主题:“行跡”，表达人生行迹走过的烙印，每一脚步的能量，都蕴涵再前进的反思，静默真心，聆听内在，淬炼自我，关爱这片土地。
路，永在前方,我们并肩同行！

translations.title: The Beauty of Unmanned Aircraft System
translations.name: Ong Jiin Joo
translations.occupation: Concurrently serves as chief technical director
translations.bio: A scholarship recipient from the Singapore Economic Development Board, his interest in robotics started when he was building a computer mouse at Hwa Chong Junior College and continued in university. Although he is a software engineer, he is involved in building and implementing large-scale systems, managing marketing of telecommunications and SaaS products; leading the Singapore ICT industry in response to government plan proposals
translations.introduction: When a new technology is invented, apart from solving the original problem, it can also be utilized to explore its potential new functions and make it more attractive. Drones, in addition to aerial photography, are the solution to many industrial problems, as they replace people in accomplishing difficult tasks at a lower cost.

translations.title: 无人机的美
translations.name: 王瑾瑜
translations.bio: 新加坡经济发展局奖学金得主，他对机器人技术的兴趣是从华中初级学院时建置电脑鼠开始，持续到大学。虽为软件工程师，他涉足构建和落实大型系统 、管理行销电信和saas产品；应政府计划提案 ，引领新加坡ICT行业。
translations.introduction: 新颖的科技被发明，除了解决原先的问题，同样的，它也可以被发掘其潜在的新功能，让它更具魅力。无人机，除了高空拍摄；更解决许多产业待解决的问题；因为它以较低的成本代替人去完成一些艰钜的任务。

title: A Classical Crossover Sharing
name: The Duos
bio: Born in 2014, it is composed of two young vocalists, Joseph N. and Edward Blue. It is a group that combines pop singing and bel canto singing to perfectly interpret world-famous popular songs spanning more than half a century. The two young people used their unique and almost perfect voices to perform classic old songs and original new songs to bridge the gap between pop and classical music.
introduction: You must have heard different kinds of vocal music, but have you ever heard a combination of multiple interpretations of famous songs at one time? There are no boundaries in music, the gap lies in the fusion, the injection of new creative elements through, to make it complete.

translations.title: 游走在古典与流行之间
translations.name: The Duos
translations.bio: 于2014年生， 由Joseph  N. 及EdwardBlue两位年轻声乐家组成 ， 是一 支融合流行唱法和美声唱法 ，完美诠释横跨半个多世纪世界流行名曲的组合 。2位年轻人用他们各具特色而又近乎完美嗓音演绎的经典老歌和原创新歌 ， 将流行与古典音乐间的缺口弥平 。
translations.introduction: 你一定听过不同的声乐，但可曾一次听到多种诠释的名曲组合？音乐，没有疆界，缺口在于融会，注入新创元素贯通，使之完整。

title: Social thinking and practice of Architecture
name: Teoh Chee Keong
occupation: Assistant Professor, Department of Architecture, UCSI University
bio: Adjunct lecturer at the Department of Landscape Architecture, Chung Yuan University, Taiwan. In my senior year, I retaken "History of Western Architecture" and developed an interest and new understanding of history. He has been involved in the preservation of historic sites since 1999. In addition to teaching, he also participates in the promotion of domestic historic site preservation and cultural conservation education. He is the author of "Kuala Lumpur during the British Participation Period", "The Disappearing Kuala Lumpur", etc.
introduction: The space in which we live, the connection between the interior and exterior, and the connection between people, needs to be skillfully arranged and precisely designed. There are many buildings that do not have a fancy dress, but the beauty of the building comes out of it. Have you ever noticed the beauty of these buildings?

translations.title: 建筑的社会思想与实践
translations.name: 张集强
translations.bio: 台湾中原大学景观建筑系兼任讲师 。大四重修《西洋建筑史》而对历史产生了兴趣与新解。自1999年起参与古迹保存工作 ，教学之余亦参与国内古迹保存及文化保育教育的推广 。著有《英参政时期的吉隆坡》、《消失中的吉隆坡》 等。
translations.introduction: 我们生活的空间，内外牵引与人的联结，是需要经过巧思安排、和精密设计。许多的建筑，没有华丽「衣裳」，但它的美，油然而生。你可有留意间中的奥妙？

title: The Power of Small
name: Hamdan Abdul Majeed
bio: After obtaining a degree in economics and management from the University of London, he first worked as a capital market consultant. He was also occasionally concerned about the development of Malaysian civil society, the third world and the Islamic political and economic system. After joining Khazanah Nasional Bhd, under his leadership, the team explored the forward-looking development of the Northern Malaysia region and formulated investment strategies to keep George Town, which has applied for UNESCO World Heritage, as an urban vitality. In addition, he also continued to regenerate Penang and add conditions for sustainability. His contributions in urban policy guidance and creative application were recognized and he was awarded the Youth Leadership Award.
introduction: Many may wonder, How The Power of Small can be transformational and create a strong impact'. Hamden Abdul Majeed explores the idea about how collective small efforts and beliefs can start a movement to transform defunct areas of a City.

translations.title: 小市民成就大都会
translations.name: 韩丹阿都玛吉
translations.bio: 考取伦敦大学经济管理学位的他 ， 先任资本市场顾问， 间中也关心大马公民社会、第三世界与伊斯兰政经体系的发展 。加入国库控股公司后，团队在他带领下探讨北马区域优渥成长的前瞻性并拟定投资策略方案， 让向联合国教科文组织申遗的乔治市保有城市活力 。此外 ， 他也继续让槟城再生， 增添永续的条件 。他在城市政策引导 、创意应用等方面的付出受到肯定 ， 并受颁青年领袖奖。
translations.introduction: 许多人可能会问："'小'的力量如何能够带来变革并产生强大的影响"。韩丹阿都玛吉（Hamden Abdul Majeed）探讨了集体的微小努力和信念如何能够掀起一场运动，改变一个城市的落后地区。

title: Creativity changes the city
name: SK Lam
occupation: Creative Director and Curator of ARR Creative Studio
bio: Actively communicate and cooperate with creative people from all over the world, focusing on T Make things new!" From 2014 to 2015, he planned the "1600 Panda Tour Hong Kong. Creativity Panda Charity Art Exhibition "am Here"; curated "Rubber Duck World Tour: Hong Kong Station" in 2013
introduction: Creating new ideas, inside and outside of the framework, to control the time and place of the people, to play the appropriate, that is, it can be a very good show, think outside the box, creativity combined with the amazing elements, can be the topic of fever, to form a stream of consciousness, but also allows people to produce more new possibilities that can not be imagined.

translations.title: 创意 ， 为城市带来新意!
translations.name: 林树鑫
translations.occupation: ARR创意工作室创意总监及策展人
translations.bio: 积极与世界各地创意人士交流与合作 ， 重视 T Make things new !   」 2014-2015年间 ，与法国艺术家paulo Grangeon 策划 「 1600熊猫游香港.创意 X 保育」展 ， 2014年初与英国艺术家Lawrence Argent  策划全球最大型熊猫慈善艺术展 《 am Here》 ；2013年策划  「橡皮鸭游世界 ： 香港站」。
translations.introduction: 创造新意，在框架内外，将人事时地物完好掌控，发挥适当，即可以是一场很好的show。跳脱即定模式思考，创意结合让人惊叹的元素，可以把话题延烧，形成一股意识，也让人产出更多预想不到的新可能。

title: Musical World
name: Joanne Yeoh
bio: Chairman of the Music Department of Boda University. She first studied music at UCS, graduated from Meade University in the UK in 1998, and then completed her master's degree at Leeds University. Immediately after graduation, he was hired as a lecturer by BoDa University. At the same time, he was admitted to the Asian Youth Orchestra and performed in various countries. He also served as a guest violinist in the world concerts of Jacky Cheung, Tao Zhe and Alan Tam.
introduction: Heart-wrenching songs, paired with virtuoso techniques, will make you hear the oil in your ears as well as mesmerize you with the notes. The music of life is so familiar; paired with interactive performances, it is uplifting and resonates even more.

translations.title: 音乐生活
translations.name: 杨佩丝
translations.bio: 博大音乐系主任 。她先在UCS念音乐，1998年毕业自英国米德社大学 ，接着在里兹大学修完硕士 。毕业即获得博大聘为讲师 ，同时考入亚洲青年管弦乐团前往各国表演； 曾担任张学友 、陶喆与谭咏麟世界演唱会小提琴手的演奏嘉宾 。
translations.introduction: 扣人心弦的歌曲，搭配精湛技巧，让你听出耳油，也让人沉醉在音符里。生活中的音乐，如此熟悉；搭配互动式的演出，让人振奋，更引起共鸣。

title: We Media, we control?
name: Tan Chia Yong
bio: CEO of Ouye Cultural and Creative Industries. Graduated from the Journalism Department of National Chengchi University in 1996. He has served in Malaysia’s Sin Chew Daily, 988 Radio, Hua FM, Southern College, The Voice Academy; Taiwan World Magazine; Singapore MediaCorp TV, 958 City Channel and other units, and is currently actively involved in broadcasting , voice training and cultural creativity work.
introduction: What is the role of human beings in the process of generating, transmitting, and influencing messages? From the mass media in the past to the present day, where everyone is an individual disseminator of information, is there more diversity, or are there different forms of presentation? Are we capable of analyzing this?

event.description:
This year, TEDxPetalingStreet bring you
'The Path'. The Path explores the foot prints
of Life. Re-look into the imprints of those who have traversed ahead. The road less traveled by many, only to those who dared to believe, with their hearts, and made their dreams come true.
‘The Path' is a journey. It's a journey of self reflection, of discovery, of curiosity, to go where you may be afraid or uncertain.Discover what lies ahead of you. Take the
first step towards the future. Let our speakers take your hand and walk – 'The Path’.
Let's walk together, this November 14th 2015.

translations.title: The Path
translations.description:
This year, TEDxPetalingStreet bring you
'The Path'. The Path explores the foot prints
of Life. Re-look into the imprints of those who have traversed ahead. The road less traveled by many, only to those who dared to believe, with their hearts, and made their dreams come true.

first step towards the future. Let our speakers take your hand and walk – 'The Path’.
Let's walk together, this November 14th 2015.

translations.title: 行跡
translations.description:
当风起而过，遗留一路落叶
当船行航过，拖曳出一抹水浪波纹
当蛇行蜿蜒迂迴，在沙堆土壤留下痕迹
当蚂蚁群跟着头蚁东奔西走，依然步履如一
当篮球大帝Jordan的时代远去，James的时代来临
当Tyson在台上被击倒，拳王神话不再，全盛之路宣告终结 当孙燕姿开腔天黑黑，开启了一个时代的声音
今年大会主题:“行跡”，表达人生行迹走过的烙印，每一脚步的能量，都蕴涵再前进的反思，静默真心，聆听内在，淬炼自我，关爱这片土地。
路，永在前方,我们并肩同行！

translations.title: We Media, we control?
translations.name: Tan Chia Yong
translations.bio: CEO of Ouye Cultural and Creative Industries. Graduated from the Journalism Department of National Chengchi University in 1996. He has served in Malaysia’s Sin Chew Daily, 988 Radio, Hua FM, Southern College, The Voice Academy; Taiwan World Magazine; Singapore MediaCorp TV, 958 City Channel and other units, and is currently actively involved in broadcasting , voice training and cultural creativity work.
translations.introduction: What is the role of human beings in the process of generating, transmitting, and influencing messages? From the mass media in the past to the present day, where everyone is an individual disseminator of information, is there more diversity, or are there different forms of presentation? Are we capable of analyzing this?

translations.title: 自媒体时代，你能自己吗？
translations.name: 陈嘉荣
translations.bio: 偶也文创执行长 。1996年毕业於台湾政治大学新闻系 ， 曾在马来西亚星洲日报 、988电台 、哗FM 、南方学院 、The voice Academy；    台湾天下杂志；  新加坡新传媒电视台、958城市频道等单位服务， 目前积极投入广播 、声音培训及文化创意的工作 。
translations.introduction: 讯息的产生、传递，到影响；人在整个过程中是扮演着什么样的角色？过去的大众媒体，到如今人人是消息散布的个体，更多元面向，还是不同呈现形式？我们是否有足够的能力剖析？

title: Rethinking Hijacked Thinking
name: Kong Keen Yong
bio: Senior Lecturer in NLP (Neuro-Linguistic Programming). At the same time, he has a hypnotist certificate and is also a freelance lecturer in traveling companies. He studies the theory of influence, which involves some gray areas of human nature. The market gave him the name "Jiang Mo".
introduction: Are your decisions the result of your own thinking, or the influence of others? Thinking allows cognizing the world. Broadening your mind is an ability to make decisions and to get back on the path of thinking again.

translations.title: 从骑劫思考中反思如何思考
translations.name: 江健勇
translations.occupation: 神经语言程式学高级讲师
translations.bio: NLP   (神经语言程式学)    高级讲师 。同時有催眠师专证 ，也是游走企业自由讲师 。他研究影响力学说，因此涉及- 些人性的灰色地带 ， 市场给他取了 「江魔」 的名号 。
translations.introduction: 你的决定是自己思考，还是别人影响的结果？思考可以认知这个世界。拓宽思路，是一个能力，也是重新回到思考的路上，做出决定。

title: The Gift of Fear
name: George Lee Eng Geap
bio: After living in the UK for 20 years, Li Yongye resolutely returned to Malaysia and served as a senior consultant doctor at the University of Malaya Hospital. His research fields mainly focus on the principles and mutations of cell receptors. He specializes in endourology, prostate diseases and andrology. He has published a large number of articles in many leading peer-reviewed journals such as "Journal of Biological Chemistry".
introduction: What would the heart be thinking at the last moment? Fear or gratitude? By truly facing the end-of-life choice and facing it head-on, one realizes that many things can be let go and treated as gifts of life.

translations.title: 恐惧的礼物
translations.name: 李永业
translations.bio: 旅英20年後 ，李永业毅然回返大马， 并在马大医院担任高级顾问医生 。研究领域主要集中在细胞受体原理和突变 ， 擅长腔内泌尿外科学 、前列腺疾病以及男科方面的研究， 并在 《生物化学杂志》 等多家领先的同行评审期刊上发表过大量文章 。
translations.introduction: 心在最后一刻，会是在想什么呢？恐惧还是感恩？真正面对人生结束的抉择，正视它，方知道许多东西可以放下，当成生命的礼物。

title: Be Happier is a choice
name: Tan Yee Ming
occupation: Happy Coach, co-founder of Ripple Foundation
bio: Born in Malaysia, he has lived in Hong Kong and Taiwan for a long time. He has a master's degree in positive psychology from the University of Pennsylvania in the United States and is committed to bringing positive psychology to the Chinese. Her diverse roles have allowed her to develop a passion for life and practice work.and-life integration to lead a happier life. Good at combining Western psychological concepts and methods with Chinese culture. In addition to organizing Happier Retreat to provide basic experience, we also established a "Happier Café" in Taipei to provide a space for mutual communication.
introduction: Tan Yee Ming believes that living a happy life is a set of pathways to learn to operate after skillful arrangement and acceptance of reorganization. Being happy also includes how you deal with your emotions in times of sadness, allowing yourself to learn and return to a happy life.

translations.title: 快乐是一种选择
translations.name: 陈郁敏
translations.occupation: 快乐教练，涟漪人基金会共同创办人
translations.bio: 生于大马 ，长期在港台生活；美国宾州大学正向心理学硕士，致力将正向心理学带给华人。多元角色让她对生活品味的热情，实践工作与生活整合(work.and-life integration)的更快乐生活 。善于借鉴西方心理学概念和方法与华人文化结合 。除了举办更快乐营(Happier  Retreat)提供基础体验，也在台北创立  「更快乐café 」  提供相互交流空间 。
translations.introduction: 陈郁敏认为开心生活，是一套经过巧思安排、接纳重整后，学习经营的途径。快乐也包括你怎么在悲伤时处理情绪，让自己学习和回到开心的生活中。

title: Have You Picked The Right Outfit?
name: Monica Mong
bio: Once collaborated with various world’s top fashion designers, celebrities and models, Monica Mong is regular guest to international fashion events. Graduated in Bachelor of Communication program with a major in journalism from University of Science, Malaysia,then pursued Fashion Styling and Fashion Photography in renowned Central Saint Martins in London, Monica Mong first cut her teeth as an intern and freelancer for two years at Cittá Bella Magazine, before moving to V MAGAZINE Malaysia to be a fashion writer and a fashion stylist. In NUYOU Malaysia for eight and half years, she has honed her eye for fashion sense with the opportunity as the Fashion Director.
introduction: Are you wearing the right clothes? How do you dress right? Maybe Monica Mong's speech can make you have a new understanding of "fashion".

event.title: Momentum
event.description:
Like eagles flying over the mountainous peaks, the aspiration and
yearning to soar freely lies in the exertion of the momentum to fly
higher. As one crosses the finish line, the determination to stay ahead,
pushing your chest forward to touch the line is that same momentum.
This raw energy drives us dare to think out of the box and dream big.
It let us to persevere, and strive to overcome obstacle like the last
man standing on ground zero. These are the Momentum we seek.
Spreading ideas is the core belief of TEDxPetalingStreet. We then
initiate this platform, striving to bridge the gap and garner the ideas
of creative and passionate Malaysian Chinese individuals to our mutual
learning. In this event, these speakers will share their realised ideas
and every momentous experiences they took, these are the aspiration
energy for our community.
The power of momentum is the inertia for our dream to exert and
accomplish. Thus we will exert with our momentum to achieve high!
Let us keep the Momentum and be inspired!

translations.title: 敢动
translations.description:
当苍鹰飞过颠峰，那仰望自由翱翔的初心，
正是盘旋高空不休的敢动。
当双脚冲过终点，那追逐征服胜利的初心，
在於迈开脚每一步的敢动。
敢动，是初心的力量，让人的眼光穿越狭隘的限制，放飞梦想！
敢动，是初心的力量，让人凝聚力量坚持一步一印，跨越困难！
分享，是 TEDxPetalingStreet 由始至终的初心，
敢动，正是搭建这个信念平台的动力，
把大马华人精英的智慧与努力成果，
汇集一堂共同学习；
短短18分钟，展现无限宽广的梦想，
叙述梦想源头初心的力量—敢动！
见证台上初心的力量，
让内心梦想在实践的契机与落实中，
一起感动，一起敢动！

translations.title: Have You Picked The Right Outfit?
translations.name: Monica Mong
translations.bio: Once collaborated with various world’s top fashion designers, celebrities and models, Monica Mong is regular guest to international fashion events. Graduated in Bachelor of Communication program with a major in journalism from University of Science, Malaysia,then pursued Fashion Styling and Fashion Photography in renowned Central Saint Martins in London, Monica Mong first cut her teeth as an intern and freelancer for two years at Cittá Bella Magazine, before moving to V MAGAZINE Malaysia to be a fashion writer and a fashion stylist. In NUYOU Malaysia for eight and half years, she has honed her eye for fashion sense with the opportunity as the Fashion Director.
translations.introduction: Are you wearing the right clothes? How do you dress right? Maybe Monica Mong's speech can make you have a new understanding of "fashion".

translations.title: 你穿对了吗？
translations.name: 蒙如蕊
translations.bio: 曾与多名世界时尚设计师，名人和模特儿合作，蒙如蕊是国际时尚活动的常客。毕业于马来西亚理科大学，主修新闻系，附于伦敦著名的圣马丁学院进修时尚造型和时尚摄影，曾在《都会佳人Citta Bella 》杂志以自由业者实习两年，后来在V Magazine Malaysia 撰写时尚专栏和担任时尚造型师。在《女友NUYOU》杂志的八年半，更是借着担任时尚总监的机会，磨练自己的时尚品味。
translations.introduction: 你，穿对了吗？究竟怎么穿才叫“对”？或许蒙如蕊的演说能够让你对“时尚”产生新的领悟。

title: The Leap of Momentum
name: Dr. Koh Doh Tat
occupation: Deputy Director of Oriental Art and Cultural Association
bio: Born in Kuala Lumpur in the year of 1974, Dr. Koh Doh Tat endeavours in advocating on aesthetics and museum works. As a graduate in Chinese studies from Nanjing University, he holds the Doctorate in Aesthetics & Cultural Studies and the Master of Arts Theory in Nanjing Institue of Arts. In the past, he organised various arts and cultural activities, for instance, Kuala Lumpur Cultural Avenue project, conservation & preservation workshop and exhibition, creative arts industries workshop, rhythm of Nanyang-guqin exhibition and arts gallery trip, etc. Currently, he is the founder of YYG Studio. He lectures classes in regards of Aesthetics studies and Arts history nationwide, meanwhile propelling the concept of museum administration, arts martketing and cultural strategies and management. He believes in beauty as that is the part and parcel of our contemporary daily life.
introduction: How do culture and beauty mix? Dr. Koh Doh Tat tells you how important "beauty" is in modern life with the topic of "The Leap of Momentum".

translations.bio: Born in Kuala Lumpur in the year of 1974, Dr. Koh Doh Tat endeavours in advocating on aesthetics and museum works. As a graduate in Chinese studies from Nanjing University, he holds the Doctorate in Aesthetics & Cultural Studies and the Master of Arts Theory in Nanjing Institue of Arts. In the past, he organised various arts and cultural activities, for instance, Kuala Lumpur Cultural Avenue project, conservation & preservation workshop and exhibition, creative arts industries workshop, rhythm of Nanyang-guqin exhibition and arts gallery trip, etc. Currently, he is the founder of YYG Studio. He lectures classes in regards of Aesthetics studies and Arts history nationwide, meanwhile propelling the concept of museum administration, arts martketing and cultural strategies and management. He believes in beauty as that is the part and parcel of our contemporary daily life.
translations.introduction: How do culture and beauty mix? Dr. Koh Doh Tat tells you how important "beauty" is in modern life with the topic of "The Leap of Momentum".

translations.title: 跳脱的敢动
translations.name: 许斗达
translations.occupation: 东方人文艺术馆副馆长
translations.bio: 美学和博物馆工作者与推动者。许斗达博士毕业於南京大学中文系,南京艺术学院美术史论硕士及西方美学与文化研究专业博士。曾经策划筹办如“千禧不打烊”、“吉隆坡文化街计划”、修复保护工作坊与展览、文化创意产业工作坊、《蕉风琴韵》古琴展与《爱上美术馆之旅》等文艺活动。《迂野阁》工作室创办人,并在全马各地教授美学与艺术史课程,推动博物馆行政、艺术行销和文化策略。他相信美,是现代生活中非常重要的环节。
translations.introduction: 文化与美如何相融？许斗达博士以“跳脱的敢动”为题，告诉你“美”在现代生活中究竟有多重要。

title: Know Thyself Through Observation
name: Jess Teong
occupation: Managing Director and Producer of The Three Production
bio: She has acted in five (5) drama series and two (2) movies, then decided to undertake the role of back scene. Jess has participated in numerous movies production, “Paper Moon” etc. In year 2015, the movie ‘The Kid From The Big Apple’, which written and directed by Jess has won several best awards at the 7th Macau International Movie Festival. This opportunity has earned her a few invitations to film festival in Japan. She has been a while in overseas and realised the alienation in people’s interaction after her return. This idea has prompted her to produce a movie for all with her personal experience, perspective and value.
introduction: Observation, is not only a mere stimulus of our senses, but more importantly, it is an enabler of self-realization. Vice president of Chinese Film Association of Malaysia (CFAM), Jess Teong shares that everything that we are experiencing around us is a rich source of inspiration for film making. For every matter that is presence in life, brings about significant meaning and impact.

translations.title: 敢动
translations.description:
当苍鹰飞过颠峰，那仰望自由翱翔的初心，
正是盘旋高空不休的敢动。
当双脚冲过终点，那追逐征服胜利的初心，
在於迈开脚每一步的敢动。
敢动，是初心的力量，让人的眼光穿越狭隘的限制，放飞梦想！
敢动，是初心的力量，让人凝聚力量坚持一步一印，跨越困难！
分享，是 TEDxPetalingStreet 由始至终的初心，
敢动，正是搭建这个信念平台的动力，
把大马华人精英的智慧与努力成果，
汇集一堂共同学习；
短短18分钟，展现无限宽广的梦想，
叙述梦想源头初心的力量—敢动！
见证台上初心的力量，
让内心梦想在实践的契机与落实中，
一起感动，一起敢动！

translations.title: 我来自观察
translations.name: 张爵西
translations.occupation: 三人行电影工作室执行与环形制作人
translations.bio: 曾演出五部电视剧及两部电影,后投入电影幕后工作至今。张爵西亦参与多部电影制作,如《纸月亮》等。2015年,首度自导自编《我来自纽约》,并于第 7 届澳门国际电影节荣获多个奖项,也让她有机会到日本参与多场电影节。多年来常居国外,回国后发现人与人之间的相处变得格外疏离。从生活中俯拾各种创作灵感,希望藉由自身经历、角度以及价值观,拍出适合一家大小观赏的电影。
translations.introduction: 观察，除了是感官上的体悟，更是心灵上的领悟。大马新晋导演张爵西的电影题材与内容灵感均源于生活周遭的人事物，因为这些人事物的出现与发生都有其存在的一定意义。

title: The Way Home
name: Tan Ean Nee
occupation: Social Worker and Senator of Sungai Buloh Leprosy Hospital
bio: Ean Nee was an ex-Mandarin news reader at NTV7, host of “Edisi Siasat” for current affairs, and an ex-programme producer “Galeri Perdana Mandarin”at Radio Televisyen Malaysia (RTM). She is now the founder of Care & Sharen Circle and headed the Oral History of Sungai Buloh Team.She is active in preserving Sungai Buloh leprosy settlement via an online museum project and re-establishing family ties of former leprosy patients and their descendants. She is often invited to provide talks on the emotional world of former leprosy patients and the children of Sungai Buloh at  universities, colleges and schools to create public aware- ness towards issues regarding the leprosy community, the history of the Sungai Buloh settlement and the life of former leprosy patients. She is also the author for The Way Home, Pertemuan Di Pusara, and The Valley of Hope Pictorial History Book.
introduction: She actively promotes the Shuangxi Maonuo Network Heritage Museum project to preserve the history and artifacts of the leprosarium community, and is currently the general coordinator of the Shuangxi Maonuo Oral History Task Force, a field researcher, and a community volunteer.

translations.title: 回家
translations.name: 陈彦妮
translations.occupation: 双溪毛糯麻风病院参议员兼社区志工
translations.bio: 曾任 NTV7 华语新闻主播、《追踪档案》主持人、TV2《前线视窗》专题节目制作人,陈彦妮现为 Care & Share Circle 创办人,双溪毛糯口述历史工作队总协调。她积极推动保存麻疯病院社区历史与文物的双溪毛糯网络文物馆计划,长期协助麻疯病患康复者及后代的家庭关系重建,并受邀到各大专和中小学演讲,让大众了解麻疯病与社区变革的历史,康复者及后代集体被隔离的情感世界。著作有《回家》、《The Way Home》、《Pertemuan Di Pusara》、《The Valley of Hope Pictorial History Book 》 等。
translations.introduction: 她积极推动保存麻疯病院社区历史与文物的双溪毛糯网络文物馆计划，目前为双溪毛糯口述历史工作队的总协调、田野研究员兼社区志工。

title: Lesson Taught by Figures
name: Leow Wee Jonn
bio: He was once the Co-Founder /Managing Director of Zalora Malaysia and headed the Marketing, IT and customer care departments. Under his supervision, ZALORA Malaysia’s brand presence, site traffic and revenue growth was the fastest growing of all Zalora’s regional operations. Between 2008 and 2012, he served as a Consultant at Bain & Co and gained the experience of company due diligences,merger and acquisitions, business turnarounds, profit improvement and growth strategies. He holds BSc in economics from London School of Economics and his current goal is to have the growth, initiatives ranging from geographic expansion to expansion of channels, with the aim of making Photobook Worldwide a global photo product company.
introduction: Leow Wee Jonn, who has been associated with numbers all his life, will talk about what "numbers" have taught him with his personal experience and rich experience. And what inspiration does his story bring to us?

translations.title: 数目教会我的故事
translations.name: 廖以淳
translations.bio: 曾是大马 Zalora 联合创办人及董事总经理的廖以淳,任内掌管市场营销、资讯工艺和客户服。在他领导下,Zalora 的品牌知名度、网站流量和收入增长都在区域内保持领先。2008至2012年,他曾担任贝恩策略顾问,累积丰富经验,包括公司审查评鉴、整倂收购、营运周转、利润提升和公司成长策略等。拥有伦敦经济学院经济学学士的他,现有的业务目标,就是从地域扩展到管道扩张,让 Photobook Worldwide成为全球性相片产品公司。
translations.introduction: 一生都与数字挂钩的廖以淳以亲身经历与丰富经验，来与大家一同谈谈“数目”究竟教会了他什么？而他的故事又会给我们带来什么启发呢？

title: Artificial Intelligence Sweet Dream of Nightmare?
name: Dr. Chan Chee Seng
occupation:
Senior Lecturer at the Faculty of Computer Science & Information
Technology (FCSIT), University of Malaya
bio: Chan Chee Seng received his Ph.D from University of Portsmouth, UK in 2008. He is currently an avid researcher, his current project is in computer vision and fuzzy qualitative reasoning, with a focus on image / video content analysis long with human-robot interaction. He is also the founder chairperson for the IEEE, Computational Intelligence Society (CIS) Malaysia chapter and a recipient of the young Scientist Network-Academy of Sciences Malaysia (YSN-ASM) in 2015. He was received into the Hitachi Research Fellowship in 2013 and awarded the Young Engineer award by the Institution of Engineering & Technology (Malaysia) in 2010. He is a senior member of IEEE, a chartered engineer and a member of the Institution of Engineering & Technology (IET).
introduction: Dr. Chan's team is currently working on projects such as face pass recognition, face recognition for bill payment, big data and customer profile analysis, etc. With his superior computer engineering skills and rich experience, he shared with us whether artificial intelligence is a dream or a nightmare.

translations.name: 陈志胜
translations.occupation: 马来亚大学电脑科学与资讯工艺系资深讲师
translations.bio: 自英国朴茨茅斯大学 (University of Portsmouth) 完成博士学位,陈志胜长期研究电脑视觉和模糊定性推理,主攻图像 / 视频内容的分析和人机互动。他是IEEE电脑智能学会 (CIS) 马来西亚分会创始人与高级会员,曾荣获工程技术 (马来西亚) 青年工程师奖丶日立研究奖学金,并授予马来西亚科学院—青年科学家的荣誉(YSN-ASM)。目前,他是特许工程师和工程技术学会的会员 (IET)。
translations.introduction: 陈博士的团队目前钻研的项目包括人脸通关辨识，人脸辨识付帐，大数据和客户概况分析等，他以其过人的电脑工程技术及丰富的经验，向大家分享了人工智能，究竟是美梦还是噩梦？

title: In Seeking of Chinese Dialectic Heritage at its Vanishing Era
name: Chong Keat Aun
occupation: The collector of Chinese Dailect Folksongs
bio: A graduate of Mass Communication and Film, Chong Keat Aun is now with multiple roles with the RTM Ai FM radio programme planner and host, action artist, community Art Project preserver, Petaling Street Art House curator and writer. In year 2005, he has been enthusiastically involved in the collection of all Chinese dialect folksongs and heritage across nationwide in Malaysia at his own cost for the Chinese dialect folksong radio programme, including the collate of Minnan Folksongs. He is also the author for few books on Chinese dialect folksongs. In year 2011, his radio programme has won him the “Seri Angkasa National Award”, Best Male Radio DJ, and he is the first Chinese broadcaster to obtain this honour in the Malaysian history.
introduction: Chong Keat Aun is a multi-tasker who has made many positive contributions to Malaysian traditional culture and local accent. In this age of silence, what is the significance of "searching for the local accent"? We believe that the spirit of Chong Keat Aun will touch the hearts of every Chinese Malaysian.

event.title: Momentum
event.description:
Like eagles flying over the mountainous peaks, the aspiration and
yearning to soar freely lies in the exertion of the momentum to fly
higher. As one crosses the finish line, the determination to stay ahead,
pushing your chest forward to touch the line is that same momentum.
This raw energy drives us dare to think out of the box and dream big.
It let us to persevere, and strive to overcome obstacle like the last
man standing on ground zero. These are the Momentum we seek.
Spreading ideas is the core belief of TEDxPetalingStreet. We then
initiate this platform, striving to bridge the gap and garner the ideas
of creative and passionate Malaysian Chinese individuals to our mutual
learning. In this event, these speakers will share their realised ideas
and every momentous experiences they took, these are the aspiration
energy for our community.
The power of momentum is the inertia for our dream to exert and
accomplish. Thus we will exert with our momentum to achieve high!
Let us keep the Momentum and be inspired!

translations.title: 敢动
translations.description:
当苍鹰飞过颠峰，那仰望自由翱翔的初心，
正是盘旋高空不休的敢动。
当双脚冲过终点，那追逐征服胜利的初心，
在於迈开脚每一步的敢动。
敢动，是初心的力量，让人的眼光穿越狭隘的限制，放飞梦想！
敢动，是初心的力量，让人凝聚力量坚持一步一印，跨越困难！
分享，是 TEDxPetalingStreet 由始至终的初心，
敢动，正是搭建这个信念平台的动力，
把大马华人精英的智慧与努力成果，
汇集一堂共同学习；
短短18分钟，展现无限宽广的梦想，
叙述梦想源头初心的力量—敢动！
见证台上初心的力量，
让内心梦想在实践的契机与落实中，
一起感动，一起敢动！

translations.title: 消声时代，乡土寻音
translations.name: 张吉安
translations.bio: 大传与电影系毕业,张吉安为【乡音考古】计划发起人、具有社区保育工作、茨厂街社区艺术计划发起人、行动艺术、专栏作者、Ai FM广播人等多重身份。自2005年起投入乡音考古,不惜自掏腰包,行走大马老社区,采集失传的籍贯乡音、歌谣、文献、老人的口述历史等。 出版有 《乡音考古:行为采集•民俗演祭》、《乡音回家》、《八府巡按•八音乩童》等。2011年获国家新闻与文化部“安卡沙国家广播大奖”最佳男播音员,为我国首位获奖的华裔广播人。
translations.introduction: 张吉安身兼多职，为大马传统文化与乡音做出许多积极贡献。在这个消声时代，“乡土寻音”的意义为何？相信张吉安的精神能够深深感动每一位大马华人。

title: Joy of Being
name: Jason Yeoh
bio: A TV producer. With simple and down to earth approach, Jason’s TV programmes have touched on the essence of life such as Axian’s Food Adventures, followed by Taste with Jason and Food Moments which awaken the common memory shared between man and earth, and Jason Tastes Asia to distinguish the Asian cuisines. His accolades include winning the Best TV Talk Show and Best Lifestyle Programme in the Malaysia and Asian TV Awards, thus earning himself a prominent name in the competitive Asian TV market. In year 2009, he founded “Full Time Living” production team, begins to record indigenous lifestyle via a humanistic approach, to get the people closer. He has ventured, with his sincerity and genuine, an exquisite humanistic journey for TV programmes in Malaysia.
introduction: If you're a regular viewer of Astro, I'm sure you're no stranger to Jason Yeoh. What impact has his decision to organize his own "full-time life" had on him? Read on to find out how much he and his team have contributed to the human landscape of Malaysia.

translations.title: 全职快乐
translations.name: 杨佳贤
translations.bio: 电视工作者。杨佳贤作品风格质朴平实,含探触生命本质的《贤途有你》;紧扣饮食与人生,唤醒人与土地共同记忆的《阿贤人情味》、《阿贤贪吃路线》与《在地食光》;梳理亚洲饮食脉络的《阿贤亚洲好食光》等等,作品曾获大马和亚洲电视大奖最佳清谈节目与最佳生活休闲节目等殊荣。2009年自组“全职生活”电视制作团队,以人文关怀记录庶民生活,让陌生的心更为靠近,为大马电视节目开拓另一道珍贵的人文风景线。
translations.introduction: 常看Astro的你相信对杨佳贤并不陌生，自组“全职生活”的决定对他而言到底带来了哪些影响？而他与团队对马来西亚的人文风景又带来了多大贡献，看完就有答案了。

title: Revisitng our Forgotten Lullabies
name: The Teng Ensemble
bio: The critically acclaimed TENG Ensemble bridges the traditional and  contemporary, the East and West, and the old and new. Their sound is current, innovative, visionary and urban, and is guided by Asian aesthetics. Their works take inspiration from Singapore’s heritage and are presented in a way that is accessible and representative of Singaporean culture and a Southeast Asian musical language.
introduction: The background music for the video was composed by the orchestra's resident composer Chow Jun Yi (Malaysia) and arranged and produced by orchestra member Huang Peh Linde (Singapore).

translations.title: 追溯；儿歌
translations.name: 鼟乐团
translations.bio: 广受好评的鼟乐团,以亚洲文化为向导,透过现代的音效技术、创新的视野和富有城市色彩的声音,巧妙的搭建传统与现代间的桥梁。鼟乐团的音乐主轴来自新加坡文化的传承,因而展现具有新加坡及东南亚特色的音乐语言。
translations.introduction: 录影中的背景音乐由乐团的常驻作曲家赵俊毅（马来西亚）谱曲、乐团团员黄佩琳（新加坡）担任编排与制作。

title: Designer, What do you do?
name: Bc Ang
bio: Architect and urban designer BC Ang asks: “How to build under durian trees?” and “How to build above MRT lines?” Founded WHBC Architects with his wife Wen Hsia Ang, the practice constantly finds the right question to ask for each project. They believe design is an intricate balancing act of utility, technology and emotions. Their recent works include a house crafted from old telegraph poles, a dog hotel, a durian collecting shed and a communal bath for the indigenous people.The curiosity and tireless experiment have won them international awards and had their works exhibited in South East Asia, Australia and the United States.
introduction: WHBC Architects partner Bc Ang, who has both creative and drawing skills, used a light-hearted and humorous approach, citing three case studies to illustrate that his main job is to analyze the problem, find out where it lies, and rack his brains to complete an excellent piece of work with a limited budget and without destroying the historical context and the client's expectations.

translations.title: 设计师，你是做什么的？
translations.name: 洪武聪
translations.occupation: 武霞建筑事务所合伙人
translations.bio: 建筑与城市设计师,洪武聪问“如何在榴莲园中盖房子?”以及“如何在捷运线上建设?”与妻子洪雯霞成立武霞建筑,每一个新项目,他们都寻找最核心的问题和方案。对他们而言,设计是在实际用途,技术和情感的平衡中创作。近期作品包含木电灯柱的房子,狗度假屋,榴莲之屋舍以及原住民的浴室。不断地创新与实验让他们的作品在国内外得奖,东南亚,澳洲以及美国均有作品展。
translations.introduction: WHBC建筑事务所合伙人洪武聪具备创意与画图技术，以轻松幽默的方式，列举三个案例说明其主要工作是分析问题、找出问题的所在，绞尽脑力，以有限的预算、在不破坏历史背景、客户期望等状况下完成一件优秀的作品。

title: The Mind Battle of Selfishness and Suspicious
name: Beh Leong Kee
bio: Beh Leong Kee, who holds several advisory post of corporate operation negotiation in local and overseas firms, also a newspaper columnist. In year 2007, he has experienced a life threatening moment as he went through a high risk brain surgery due to bacterial infections in his brain. Over the years, he has been actively assisting non-profit organisations on external mediation and that has won him the fame of “Generous Consultant”. The past 20 years experiences in the negotiation field has allowed him to share his skill and experience on TV and radio programme. In view of his minimal “mis-judgement”, the speaker association insiders has honored him as “Beh-the-Genius”. In year 2016, he was hired by SEGI College in Malaysia as an Industrial Advisor for Degree in Psychology Programmes.
introduction:
With over 20 years of experience in the negotiation field, he has earned a reputation as a "conscientious advisor" by actively and voluntarily assisting non-profit organizations in their external mediation efforts. He has been invited by many radio and television stations to share his practical experience.

To be a "peacemaker", one needs to be sensible and clear-minded, as well as logical and quick to adapt. His experience in negotiating with different arguments, bargaining chips and resources will surely inspire you to learn how to solve difficult problems when you encounter them in your life.

translations.title: 敢动
translations.description:
当苍鹰飞过颠峰，那仰望自由翱翔的初心，
正是盘旋高空不休的敢动。
当双脚冲过终点，那追逐征服胜利的初心，
在於迈开脚每一步的敢动。
敢动，是初心的力量，让人的眼光穿越狭隘的限制，放飞梦想！
敢动，是初心的力量，让人凝聚力量坚持一步一印，跨越困难！
分享，是 TEDxPetalingStreet 由始至终的初心，
敢动，正是搭建这个信念平台的动力，
把大马华人精英的智慧与努力成果，
汇集一堂共同学习；
短短18分钟，展现无限宽广的梦想，
叙述梦想源头初心的力量—敢动！
见证台上初心的力量，
让内心梦想在实践的契机与落实中，
一起感动，一起敢动！

translations.title: The Mind Battle of Selfishness and Suspicious
translations.name: Beh Leong Kee
translations.bio: Beh Leong Kee, who holds several advisory post of corporate operation negotiation in local and overseas firms, also a newspaper columnist. In year 2007, he has experienced a life threatening moment as he went through a high risk brain surgery due to bacterial infections in his brain. Over the years, he has been actively assisting non-profit organisations on external mediation and that has won him the fame of “Generous Consultant”. The past 20 years experiences in the negotiation field has allowed him to share his skill and experience on TV and radio programme. In view of his minimal “mis-judgement”, the speaker association insiders has honored him as “Beh-the-Genius”. In year 2016, he was hired by SEGI College in Malaysia as an Industrial Advisor for Degree in Psychology Programmes.
translations.introduction:
With over 20 years of experience in the negotiation field, he has earned a reputation as a "conscientious advisor" by actively and voluntarily assisting non-profit organizations in their external mediation efforts. He has been invited by many radio and television stations to share his practical experience.

To be a "peacemaker", one needs to be sensible and clear-minded, as well as logical and quick to adapt. His experience in negotiating with different arguments, bargaining chips and resources will surely inspire you to learn how to solve difficult problems when you encounter them in your life.

translations.title: 私心和疑心的心战
translations.name: 马梁旗
translations.occupation: 马来西亚讲师协会总会长
translations.bio: 担任多家本地与海外企务谈判顾问的马梁旗,也是报章专栏作者。2007 年因脑部细菌感染,需要进行高风险的脑部手术,与死神擦肩而过。多年来,他活跃于义务协助非盈利组织进行对外的调解工作,赢得“良心顾问”的美誉。在谈判场域经验超过 20 年的他,也常受邀在电台与电视台分享其实战经历。由于甚少“误判”,行内人替他取名 “马神”。2016 年,他受聘于马来西亚世纪学院(SEGi College),担任“心理学系职场顾问”。
translations.introduction:
在谈判战场打滚超过20 年的他，活跃并义务协助非盈利组织进行对外的调解工作，赢得“良心顾问”的美誉。不少电台及电视台，也常常邀请他分享实战经验。

要成为「和事佬」，除了具备理智与清晰的思路，还有逻辑与快速的应变能力。他以过往的不同论调、筹码、资源等条件下谈判经验的分享中，一定可以启发各位，在人生路上碰到难题时，学习如何迎刃而解。

title: A Perfect Engine for Learning Languages
name: Stuart Jay Raj
bio: Stuart Jay Raj holds a degree in Cognitive and Applied Linguistics from Griffith University, meanwhile having extensive experience in simultaneous interpreting and even hosting a TV programme on Thai Channel 5. He is a polyglot who specializes in the languages and dialects spoken in South East Asia and China. With his background knowledge of Sanskrit, Khmer, Lao and various Chinese dialects and minority languages enables him to present a fascinating and unique perspective on how to learn the languages of the region, which makes everything fall logically into place. His skills in language and international relations have allowed him to develop industry specific knowledge and skills in several domains, where he works on the ground across Asia bridging cultures through crisis management and training.
introduction: Mastering a new language not only enhances communication skills, it also open doors to better understand new cultures and traditions. Polyglot, Stuart Jay Raj reminds us the importance of learning the Chinese language as the Chinese speaking mind is a perfect engine for learning languages.

translations.title:
中文开通语言巧妙之门 
The Chinese Speaking Mind-
translations.name: 王怀乐
translations.bio: 持有格里菲斯大学认知与语言应用学位的王怀乐,擁有廣泛的同步翻译經驗并在泰国第五电视台主持节目。精通东南亚及中国多国语言与方言,加上对梵语、高棉语、寮国语、各种华人方言,以及少数民族方言都有一定的知识背景,致使他拥有自成一派的语言学习法。精通语言与国际关系能力,让他在不同专业领域中学习不同专业知识,也扮演高层与基层的联系角色,透过危机管理、培训,并利用当地的语言,培训基层干部来桥接不同文化人才。
translations.introduction: 学习并掌握一个全新的语言，除了能让你有多一项沟通技巧之外，也能让你对该文化有更进一步的认识与瞭解。语言专家王怀乐提醒你，掌握中文，是打开语言之门的捷径。

title: Maths Raise Me Up
name: Teoh Poh Yew
bio: Teoh Poh Yew inspires students to approach this “dreaded” subject with confidence and enthusiasm. With 20 years of training experience, she transforms Mathematics into a tool to develop creativity, enhance mathematical thinking and sharpen problem solving abilities through her fun workshops across 17 countries. Published with three (3) books on mathematical magic and founded “Creative Maths” (a licensed programme, available in Malaysia, Singapore and Australia), she appears regularly on TV and radio to share her experiences. She imbues joy and creativity in learning, while leading the education with wisdom.
introduction: Positive and optimistic, she makes education not just an indoctrination but a guidance full of wisdom. Her sharing will make you truly believe that learning is no longer just a task, but a journey full of joy and creativity.

translations.title: 数学创心高
translations.name: 张宝幼
translations.bio: 以创意与魔术培训风格闻名,张宝幼在创新领域、数学教育界和讲师培训领域有 20 年丰富的培训经验,她热忱、积极并充满创意;走遍东南亚、中国、保加利亚、丹麦、美国、德国、台湾、印度等 17 个国家讲课,曾出版三本数学魔术书籍;经常被国内外电台、电视台、报章及杂志邀请分享创意教学法。也是“创意数学”课程创办人的她,总是让学习充满快乐和创意,引导智慧启发的教育学习。
translations.introduction: 积极乐观的她，让教育不在只是一种灌输，而是充满智慧的引导。她的分享，将让你确实相信学习不再只是一种任务，而是充满快乐和创意的旅程。

title: The Refurbished Life
name: Dr. Eric Leong
occupation: Principal of The One Academy Penang
bio: After completed his formal education in Johor Bahru,he furthered his studies in Singapore. Dr Eric Leong holds two major qualifications in both Interior Design and Business Studies and in year 2012, a Doctorate of Art from Teesside University, UK. Started his own design studio in year 2001, same year, he launched his first Interior makeover TV show in Malaysia and entitled him the glamour of “Raja Hias” or “Design King” of Malaysia. He is not only a Kuala Lumpur-based international renowned designer, but he is the creative mastermind behind numerous international designer product series. To him, a good and breathtaking design requires not only bold and outstanding, but also up-to-date and stylish.
introduction: Dr. Eric Leong, the "King of Design" in Malaysia, has been deeply engaged in the field of design for a long time. For him, design should be innovative in order to refresh life, and "novelty" and "intention" are indispensable.

translations.title: 刷新人生
translations.name: 梁国铭
translations.occupation: The One Academy 槟城院区校长
translations.bio: 在新山完成正规教育后,梁国铭在新加坡完成他的高等教育,并持有室内设计和商业管理两张文凭,2012年在英国帝赛德大学荣获博士学位。2001年创立个人工作室,同年录制大马第一个有关室内装潢改造的实境电视节目并荣获大马“设计大王”美誉。除了创意总监及策展人,梁博士也是国际知名室内设计师,以及许多国际设计师系列产品幕後的创意操手。他认为,一个出色且成功的设计不仅要脱颖而出,对潮流趋势的掌握更需要与时并进。
translations.introduction: 大马“设计之王”梁博士长期深耕于设计领域，对他来说设计要创新，人生才能刷新，“新意”与“心意”缺一不可。

title: The Lost Voyage
name: Chris Lau
bio: He believes dreams can make this contradicting world a better place, after his first backpacking in the age of 19, Chris ventured into long term news reporting on war zone, human rights and social issues. Like most adolescents nowadays grows mature as time goes by, he faces the dilemma and conflicts of  perception between his dream and reality. Against with the main -stream with his stubbornness and impulsive personality, yet he is persistence on his choice regardless the obstacles. Thus, he encounters the world truthfully from the experience he gained. While his travel to Syria and Afghanistan to cover on the conflicts news reporting three times respectively, he then started a new stage of life after a conversation with an Afghan old man he met en-route.
introduction: A word from a stranger sends Chris Lau on a new journey through life, and this turning point brings a huge shock to his life.

translations.title: The Lost Voyage
translations.name: Chris Lau
translations.bio: He believes dreams can make this contradicting world a better place, after his first backpacking in the age of 19, Chris ventured into long term news reporting on war zone, human rights and social issues. Like most adolescents nowadays grows mature as time goes by, he faces the dilemma and conflicts of  perception between his dream and reality. Against with the main -stream with his stubbornness and impulsive personality, yet he is persistence on his choice regardless the obstacles. Thus, he encounters the world truthfully from the experience he gained. While his travel to Syria and Afghanistan to cover on the conflicts news reporting three times respectively, he then started a new stage of life after a conversation with an Afghan old man he met en-route.
translations.introduction: A word from a stranger sends Chris Lau on a new journey through life, and this turning point brings a huge shock to his life.

translations.title: 迷失的出走
translations.name: 刘忠万
translations.bio: 一直相信炙热梦想可让冲突纷扰的世界变得更好,刘忠万自19岁第一趟背包旅行后,就决定投入战乱、人权和社会议题报导。伴随时间与心灵成长,和时下年轻人一样,游走在梦想与现实中,接受矛盾和观念冲击的洗礼。冲动和倔强个性,让他即使碰壁也仍坚信自己所选,并从经历中学习诚实面对自己和世界。六访战地采访之行(三访叙利亚、三访阿富汗) 中,这些都是来自阿富汗老人的一番话,为他打开行走人生的另一扇门...
translations.introduction: 陌生人的一段话让刘忠万展开了一段新的人生之旅，而这个转折点也给他的人生带来了巨大的冲击。

title: Zero Trash in Life
name: Tin Fong Yun
bio: Aurora Tin is an author, Columnist and Feature Journalist. She was the former intern in The Nature Conservancy Beijing office, working on Fresh Water Programme in China. After her return from abroad, she worked as newspaper Feature Journalist, focusing on environmental reporting. When dealing with enormous environmental problems, she’s always trying to find the easiest solution that everyone can be part of. Inspired by an American family, Fong Yun started her Zero Trash Project in 2016, finding alternatives for every trash that she and her husband have produced only about the volume of 500ml glass jar.
introduction: What can everyone do to protect the environment? Zheng Fengyun will use his own experience to tell you that "zero-waste life" is real.

event.title: Momentum
event.description:
Like eagles flying over the mountainous peaks, the aspiration and
yearning to soar freely lies in the exertion of the momentum to fly
higher. As one crosses the finish line, the determination to stay ahead,
pushing your chest forward to touch the line is that same momentum.
This raw energy drives us dare to think out of the box and dream big.
It let us to persevere, and strive to overcome obstacle like the last
man standing on ground zero. These are the Momentum we seek.
Spreading ideas is the core belief of TEDxPetalingStreet. We then
initiate this platform, striving to bridge the gap and garner the ideas
of creative and passionate Malaysian Chinese individuals to our mutual
learning. In this event, these speakers will share their realised ideas
and every momentous experiences they took, these are the aspiration
energy for our community.
The power of momentum is the inertia for our dream to exert and
accomplish. Thus we will exert with our momentum to achieve high!
Let us keep the Momentum and be inspired!

translations.title: 敢动
translations.description:
当苍鹰飞过颠峰，那仰望自由翱翔的初心，
正是盘旋高空不休的敢动。
当双脚冲过终点，那追逐征服胜利的初心，
在於迈开脚每一步的敢动。
敢动，是初心的力量，让人的眼光穿越狭隘的限制，放飞梦想！
敢动，是初心的力量，让人凝聚力量坚持一步一印，跨越困难！
分享，是 TEDxPetalingStreet 由始至终的初心，
敢动，正是搭建这个信念平台的动力，
把大马华人精英的智慧与努力成果，
汇集一堂共同学习；
短短18分钟，展现无限宽广的梦想，
叙述梦想源头初心的力量—敢动！
见证台上初心的力量，
让内心梦想在实践的契机与落实中，
一起感动，一起敢动！

translations.title: Zero Trash in Life
translations.name: Tin Fong Yun
translations.bio: Aurora Tin is an author, Columnist and Feature Journalist. She was the former intern in The Nature Conservancy Beijing office, working on Fresh Water Programme in China. When dealing with enormous environmental problems, she’s always trying to find the easiest solution that everyone can be part of. Inspired by an American family, Fong Yun started her Zero Trash Project in 2016, finding alternatives for every trash that she and her husband have produced only about the volume of 500ml glass jar.

translations.title: 零垃圾生活
translations.name: 郑凤云
translations.bio: 受到一户美国家庭的启发,郑凤云自2016年展开零垃圾生活实验,为生活中每一个会产生垃圾的行为及物品寻找替代方案。也是专栏作者的她,曾在美国大自然保护协会北京办事处担任实习生,参与中国淡水项目计划;回马后担任报章专题记者,专注撰写环境议题。在庞大的环境议题前,她一直思考:每个人究竟可以做些什么?2016年1月1日至今,她和丈夫两人产生的垃圾总量,仅仅用一个500毫升玻璃瓶就能装下。
translations.introduction: 在环保这条路上，每个人可以做些什么？郑凤云就借用自身的经历来告诉大家，“零垃圾生活”是真实存在的。

title: Endless Smile
name: Jayz Yong
bio: Jayz Yong loves photography due to his great interest in drawing during childhood and he has his compact digital camera with him at his young age. He was once a first aid instructor, meanwhile, he worked in several companies as a marketing position. In year 2010, he founded the photography company, Centre of Picture Creation Sdn Bhd. At the wedding photo session, he was amazed of the genuine feeling that one could have when embraced by simple, joyfulness and happiness. This genuine feeling exposure is the goal that he pursues in photography. Thus, “ To tell your own timeless story that is truly yours ” has become Picture Creation’s core value , principal and belief. In year 2015, Endless Smile project was activated and he went into small town to seize the happiness moment of others via free photo-taking, to spread happiness around, and keep smiling.
introduction: From wedding photography to the community's smile program, for Jayz Yong, what is more important here is to discover the real and priceless life story inside each person.

translations.title: 停不下来的微笑
translations.name: 杨成伟
translations.bio: 童年酷爱画画,尔后爱上摄影。小型数位相机陪伴杨成伟的青涩年代。曾担任急救导师,以及多年营销经验,2010 年成立 Centre of Picture Creation Sdn Bhd 摄影公司,婚摄让他见证人在被幸福围绕时,所呈现出简单快乐的真实情感,而这真实情感一直是他不断追求的摄影目标。所以,“发掘您内心真实无价的故事”成了Picture Creation 的信仰。2015年,他启动“Endless Smile 停不下来的微笑”计划,走进小镇,免费为人捕捉发自真心的微笑,让快乐延续与传递,让微笑停不下来。
translations.introduction: 从婚摄到社区的微笑计划，对杨成伟来说，这里面更重要的是去发掘每个人内心真实且物价的人生故事。

title: The Music of Our Unity
name: Colour of Voices
occupation: Malaysia Crossed Racial A Cappabella Group
bio: Colour Of Voices (C.O.V) is an A Cappella group came into existence in early 2014. The group consists of Asnal as Tenor 1, Ikhwan as Tenor 2, Joe as Baritone, Jaswan as Bass and Tuxbonix (Jeffery) as Beatboxer. They are more than just an A Cappella band, they love to sing in perfect pitch and wish to spread the message to all that they live in a multiracial country with cultural diversity, respecting and accepting each other will bring harmony. They have performed in various occasions; from festivals to corporate events. They are touched to know that their music piece on Internet has received thousands and thousands of click view and support from the netizens. Meanwhile, the  acknowledgement they received from local media has motivated them to bring A Cappella to the public.
introduction: A Malaysian a cappella group formed by five friends from different ethnic groups, Colour Of Voices (C.O.V) is a group of people who love to sing and love music together, regardless of who they are, and thus share the same desire to bring the "color" to people through the human voice in the "auditory" enjoyment. "They are a group of musicians who love to sing, love music, and love each other.

translations.title: 音乐不分你我
translations.name: Colour of Voices
translations.occupation: 大马跨种族阿卡贝拉组合
translations.bio: 成立于2014年,由主音Asnal、男高音 Ikhwan、男中音Joe、貝斯 Jaswan 和口技 TuxBoNic 吴俊利组成。因喜爱音乐,并享受不分你我,让“音色”超越肤色的合唱,体现彼此尊重、包容所带来的和谐与默契。Colour of Voices(C.O.V) 除了在各个大小型的场合表演,互联网上还流传着他们精彩的作品,上千万的浏览量加上报章媒体、电台与电视台的报道,都是激励着他们继续走下去的力量,用无伴奏的合唱艺术,为大众带来更多感动！
translations.introduction: 一个由五名不同族群的好友组成的大马无伴奏合唱团体，Colour Of Voices (C.O.V) 在一起爱唱歌与爱音乐、不分你我，从而志同道合一心想把 “颜色” 通过人声带给人们在“听觉”上的享受。

title: Field Research, From Internet to The Street
name: Luisa Hung
bio: A foreigner spouse from Taiwan, Luisa WanLu Hung used to work as a heritage architect and researcher in Penang. Six years ago, Luisa joined the Urban Sketchers Penang as a way to seek some relief from the burden as a full-time mother. She loves to sketch and write about local cultures and traditions and has been involved in a number of local community projects. She uses print media as well as online social media as a platform to interact with people and reach out to the like-minded. She is keen to communicate with and “faham” (understand) the non-Chinese world using her broken Bahasa Melayu.
introduction: She explores different aspects of the cultural practices and religious events she sees in life and has her own interpretation of them.

translations.title: 田野采集，从网路到马路
translations.name: 洪菀璐
translations.bio: 来自台湾的洪菀璐,早在学生时期就以槟城作为研究基地。来到槟城後,在陈耀威文史建筑研究室从事文史研究与修复工作。婚後度过了四年半的全职妈妈生活,因参与槟城速写重拾画笔。目前是自由研究工作者,从事插画工作, 以常(平)民式图文探讨在地议题,定期在平面媒体和儿童刊物发表,将触角伸入社区,遇上了许多奇人轶事。 《妈妈的田野笔记》是她的第一本书,诠释着她对文化习俗与宗教活动内涵的解读 —「出走华人国,唐番双栖」。
translations.introduction: 她对生活中所看到的文化习俗与宗教活动内涵，遵行不同层面的探索并拥有自已的一套诠释。

title: The Exploration of the Wilderness
name: Ng Seow Kong
bio:
Began running barefoot in the age of 19, his run age has been 35 years. In March 2013, Ng Seow Kong was the first Malaysian to complete the 100 marathons in Malaysia. He is also the first to complete 100 miles (160 km) marathon and completed more than 200 km marathon in India, Australia, Japan, America, South Korea and Britain. In year 2008, he became the first
Asian runner to accomplish the world’s major marathon (including seven continents with Arctic). Being the only Malaysian runner who accomplished the North Pole Marathon and Antarctic Ice Marathon, he has also completed 71 full marathon and 61 ultra-marathon in 66 cities in 33 countries. With his  experience in the variety of complex running track, drastic weather conditions and high altitude marathon, has gained the fame for Malaysia in ultra-marathon.
introduction: Ng Seow Kong sincerely shared his running experience and insights with the audience with his years of experience in many kinds of complicated terrains, extreme weather conditions and high altitude races.

man standing on ground zero. These are the Momentum we seek.
Spreading ideas is the core belief of TEDxPetalingStreet. We then
initiate this platform, striving to bridge the gap and garner the ideas
of creative and passionate Malaysian Chinese individuals to our mutual
learning. In this event, these speakers will share their realised ideas
and every momentous experiences they took, these are the aspiration
energy for our community.
The power of momentum is the inertia for our dream to exert and
accomplish. Thus we will exert with our momentum to achieve high!
Let us keep the Momentum and be inspired!

translations.title: Momentum
translations.description:
Like eagles flying over the mountainous peaks, the aspiration and
yearning to soar freely lies in the exertion of the momentum to fly
higher. As one crosses the finish line, the determination to stay ahead,
pushing your chest forward to touch the line is that same momentum.
This raw energy drives us dare to think out of the box and dream big.
It let us to persevere, and strive to overcome obstacle like the last
man standing on ground zero. These are the Momentum we seek.
Spreading ideas is the core belief of TEDxPetalingStreet. We then
initiate this platform, striving to bridge the gap and garner the ideas
of creative and passionate Malaysian Chinese individuals to our mutual
learning. In this event, these speakers will share their realised ideas
and every momentous experiences they took, these are the aspiration
energy for our community.
The power of momentum is the inertia for our dream to exert and
accomplish. Thus we will exert with our momentum to achieve high!
Let us keep the Momentum and be inspired!

translations.title: 敢动
translations.description:
当苍鹰飞过颠峰，那仰望自由翱翔的初心，
正是盘旋高空不休的敢动。
当双脚冲过终点，那追逐征服胜利的初心，
在於迈开脚每一步的敢动。
敢动，是初心的力量，让人的眼光穿越狭隘的限制，放飞梦想！
敢动，是初心的力量，让人凝聚力量坚持一步一印，跨越困难！
分享，是 TEDxPetalingStreet 由始至终的初心，
敢动，正是搭建这个信念平台的动力，
把大马华人精英的智慧与努力成果，
汇集一堂共同学习；
短短18分钟，展现无限宽广的梦想，
叙述梦想源头初心的力量—敢动！
见证台上初心的力量，
让内心梦想在实践的契机与落实中，
一起感动，一起敢动！

translations.title: The Exploration of the Wilderness
translations.name: Ng Seow Kong
translations.bio:
Began running barefoot in the age of 19, his run age has been 35 years. In March 2013, Ng Seow Kong was the first Malaysian to complete the 100 marathons in Malaysia. He is also the first to complete 100 miles (160 km) marathon and completed more than 200 km marathon in India, Australia, Japan, America, South Korea and Britain. In year 2008, he became the first
Asian runner to accomplish the world’s major marathon (including seven continents with Arctic). Being the only Malaysian runner who accomplished the North Pole Marathon and Antarctic Ice Marathon, he has also completed 71 full marathon and 61 ultra-marathon in 66 cities in 33 countries. With his  experience in the variety of complex running track, drastic weather conditions and high altitude marathon, has gained the fame for Malaysia in ultra-marathon.
translations.introduction: Ng Seow Kong sincerely shared his running experience and insights with the audience with his years of experience in many kinds of complicated terrains, extreme weather conditions and high altitude races.

translations.title: 野性的探索
translations.name: 吴少刚
translations.bio: 19岁开始赤脚跑步的吴少刚,在2013年3月成为大马首位完成100个马拉松的跑者。他也是首位完成100英里 (160km) ;并在印、澳、日、美、韩、英等地完成200km以上赛事的跑者。2008年,他成为首位完成全球大满贯马拉松赛事 (七大洲+北极) 的亚洲跑者。除了身为唯一在南、北极跑过马拉松的大马人,他也一共在33个国家66座城市完成71项全马和60项超马赛事。多年来在多种复杂地形、极限天气及高海拔的赛事经验,成就了吴少刚和大马在超马跑界的知名度。
translations.introduction: 吴少刚以他多年来在多种复杂地形、极限天气条件以及高海拔的赛事经验，与大家真诚分享他的跑步经验和心得。

title: I am, Composer
name: Chang Sang Teck
bio: Chang Sang Teck joined the KlTA Workshop in year 1987 after graduating from the Fine Arts Department of the Malaysian Institute of Art. He founded Halo Cafe in his early years. As one of the important promoters for Malaysian Chinese production, he devoted himself in creating awareness about local music for many years. He is an expert lyricist and music arranger, having a most recognizable voice with various music genres and is celebrated as "The Malaysian Tsung-Sheng Lee" (a Taiwanese renowned music artist). Chang returned to the music scene in January 2016 and started afresh as singer-songwriter, by launching his personal album "l Am Born Fortunate" which amassed positive comments. His representative musical work includes Taiwanese rock band, Power Station's "Xiang Ni Shi Lin Shui Qian De Xi Guan" and Malaysian female singer, Fish Leong's "Mi Lu".
introduction: In seeking Chang Sang Teck's personal strength, it is a blessing and salvation to be able to write his own song. Further leading him to discover, composition does not require any external, it can be done individually by oneself.

event.title: Ripples
event.description: To experience every nuance of positive energy with passion; To challenge our limits and be vigorous in pursuing success; To be a solid rock that is not shaken by the storm, but breaks the silence of the calm water; and create ripples for positive change that resonate beyond our circles. It takes one person to ripple today, to make waves of change tomorrow.

translations.title: Ripples
translations.description: To experience every nuance of positive energy with passion; To challenge our limits and be vigorous in pursuing success; To be a solid rock that is not shaken by the storm, but breaks the silence of the calm water; and create ripples for positive change that resonate beyond our circles. It takes one person to ripple today, to make waves of change tomorrow.

translations.title: 漣漪
translations.description:
缘起一个动念的力量，一份深沉的热爱，一次又一次不甘被束缚的挑战，一股再一股想要寻求突破的冲劲，于是，有人甘心成为一颗投石，打破局限，那激荡起的效应，就是涟漪，继续传递影响的能量，跨越界限，无远弗届。手中那颗小石头投入水中后，你不会知道泛起的涟漪会有多广，影响有多远……
让我们今天微小的涟漪不息，成为明白呼应的潮涌不绝。

translations.name: Chang Sang Teck
translations.bio: Chang Sang Teck joined the KlTA Workshop in year 1987 after graduating from the Fine Arts Department of the Malaysian Institute of Art. He founded Halo Cafe in his early years. As one of the important promoters for Malaysian Chinese production, he devoted himself in creating awareness about local music for many years. translations.title: 我是创作人
translations.name: 张盛德
translations.occupation: 音乐创作人、唱片制作人
translations.bio: 张盛德毕业自马来西亚艺术学院纯美术系，于1987年加入“KITA's激荡工作坊”。早年创立海螺民歌餐厅，是大马中文音乐创作重要推手之一，多年来致力推动本土音乐风气。擅长词曲创作，歌声有极高的辨识度，音乐风格多元，有“大马李宗盛”之美誉。2016年1月，张盛德回归创作歌手身份重新出发，推出个人专辑《我是好命人》，佳评如潮。代表作品有：动力火车《想你是临睡的习惯》、梁静茹《迷路》等。
translations.introduction: 张盛德在发掘自己那把宝刀的同时，觉得能够写自己的歌是一种安慰与救赎。原来，创作是不需要依靠任何外在，依旧可以完全独立完成的事。

title:
我的娘惹之路
My Nyonya Journey
name: Dr. Lee Su Kim
occupation:
Bestselling Malaysian Author, Educator, 
Language Consultant,
Cultural Activist
bio: Dr. Lee Su Kim is a founding member and the first woman President of the Peranakan Baba Nyonya Association of Kuala Lumpur & Selangor. A sixth generation nyonya, she has published ten books of nonfiction and fiction. Her Doctorate in Education from the University of Houston explores the multiple identities and identity constructions of non-native English language speakers. Dr. Lee was an Associate Professor at Universiti Kebangsaan Malaysia where she lectured, researched and published widely on language, culture and identity. Meanwhile, as an invited speaker at the Ubud and Singapore Writers’ Festival, she has given many talks and presentations in the U.S., U.K., Australia and Asia.
introduction: Dr Lee Su Kim, a sixth generation Nyonya, talks about her unique hybrid Peranakan Chinese heritage, how it has inspired her and how we all have our own unique stories and ideas we could use to enrich our world’s cultural legacy.

translations.title:
我的娘惹之路
My Nyonya Journey
translations.name: 李赐金
translations.occupation:
畅销作家、教育家、
语言顾问、文化活动家
translations.bio: 雪隆峇峇娘惹后裔协会创始成员，也是该协会第一位女性主席的李赐金博士，乃第六代娘惹后裔。毕业自休斯顿大学教育系，今为马来西亚国立大学副教授，在语言与文化领域进行了广泛的研究和发表，出版了10部作品。此外，她是乌布和新加坡作家节里受邀请的演讲嘉宾，曾于美国、英国、澳洲和亚洲举行多场演讲。
translations.introduction: 身为第六代娘惹后裔的李赐金博士，在保留自身文化传统的过程中，发现其实每个人都拥有自己独特的故事，能够丰富自己乃至这个世界的文化遗产。

title: Nanyang Style Potehi
name: Ombak Potehi
bio: Ombak Potehi is set up by Ombak Ombak ARTStudio in year 2015, comprising of a group of young people, they learned the art of puppetry, narration and music from the masters of the Beng Geok Hong Puppet Troupe of Penang. They aspire to revitalize the essence of Hokkien Potehi glove puppet theatre. The group has performed 3 stories that were written and produced by the group members themselves, they are The Story of Malek (2015); The Monkey King Adventures (2016) and Kisah Pulau Pinang - The Story of Penang (2017). The latter has combined the local languages, music and glove puppet costume to depict authentic Penang features that belonged to the era of late 19th century.
introduction: Ombak Potehi, a fascinating classic glove puppetry which infused with the local element and interweave the intergenerational arts together at this contemporary era.

It takes one person to ripple today, to make waves of change tomorrow.

translations.title: 南洋风情布袋戏
translations.name: 破浪布袋戏
translations.bio: 破浪布袋戏，前身为成立于2015年的波浪工作坊（Ombak Ombak ARTStudio）。这群不同领域的青年延续布袋戏箇中精髓，向槟城老戏班“鸣玉凤掌中班”学习布偶操纵与其说唱艺术。曾改编传统剧目《路遥知马力之天赐良缘》（2015）与《西游记之观世音收伏红孩儿》（2016）等折子戏，更按槟城历史与文化特色而编写《邂逅槟榔》（2017）。后者结合本土语言、音乐和布偶服饰等，使其更贴近槟城 19 世纪末特色。
translations.introduction: 布袋戏踏上了这片土地交汇出南洋沃土各族背景文化多元性。破浪布袋戏十指弄弦，倥偬流转，双掌控偶演出跨代艺术。

title: New Entertainment Experience: The Illusion
name: Kenny Yek
bio: Kenny Yek has keen interest in Arts and Technology. He has created a wide range of video using various visual style combined with the cinematic aesthetic. His objective is to go beyond the standard format to create new spatial experiences through live audio visual performances and visual art installation that transcend time and space. As a creative director, he discovered a new media movement, Technology + Art, using available technology and incorporate it with programming and coding in the application for large scale projection or LED display for performances, launches and events for mass audience experiences.
introduction: With the combined of technologies and art to project images via hologram in reality. Kenny Yek appears "virtually" on stage to let the audience to witness the power of advancement of technology. What would happen to our life when virtual is brought to reality?

translations.title: 新娱乐体验：全息投影幻境
translations.name: 易家文
translations.bio: 一名对艺术和科技有浓厚兴趣的影视专业者，易家文的作品结合电影美学和视频制作，通过超越时空与空间的视觉表演及艺术来打造新的体验，因此呈现了独特的视觉风格。随着科技的演变，他集技术与艺术为一体，身为一位创意总监，他将两者编成数码或嵌入应用程序中，专门为大型投影或LED显示创造视觉效果，应用于演出、发行和大型活动等。
translations.introduction: 科技与艺术融合，以虚拟呈现真实，科技的演变，让易家文以“虚拟”方式，出现在台上让大家见识科技一日千里的魔力。当把虚拟带入现实，将会为生活添上什么色彩？

title: Press Printing, Is It Alive?
name: Helios Loo
bio: Helios Loo is major in digital media and visual communication, former guest lecturer for the digital photography course at The One Academy. As a contributing photographer for the Corbis Corporation, he published his photos in over 20 countries. In year 2013, Helios and three of his friends founded The Alphabet Press with the purpose to combine traditional letterpress printing with modern aesthetic and handmade uniqueness of printed goods so that more people know about this skill. During lpoh Art Festival in 2015, he developed a letterpress board game, which subsequently won the 2016 Golden Pin Award.
introduction: The skill arts of 600 years history, revive in the contemporary perspective adding in new elements, reposition and restart again. Helios and his team have strived to protect the faded historical skill arts and to ensure its sustainability in this new era.

translations.title: 活版印刷还活着吗？
translations.name: 罗浩庭
translations.bio: 主修数码媒体和视觉艺术的罗浩庭，曾是The One Academy数码摄影客席讲师。作为Corbis合约摄影师，他在二十多个国家授权其摄影作品。2013年，他与三位友人创办了“原字印务”，旨在把传统活版印刷，结合现代美感和手工独特性的印刷商品，让更多人认识这门技艺。2015年怡保艺术节，他以大马多语文化作为蓝本和多年历史的铅字作为游戏载体，发行“众字成城”桌面游戏，因此荣获2016年度《金点设计奖》。
translations.introduction: 600 年历史的技艺，以现在的视角和活用加入新的元素，重新定位，再度出发。罗浩庭与他的团队，极力维护濒临失传的历史技艺，以确保这份技艺在这时代洪流中能够自供自给地活下来。

title:
新媒体
New Media
name: Fred Chong
bio: Fred Chong is an award-winning media entertainment entrepreneur. He started Prodigee Media in year 2005 to focus on the emerging new media industry. By combining his experience in business, entertainment and new technology, he created new business models for the media entertainment industry, and became the pioneer to leverage on social media platforms. He is enthusiastic in combining music and technology. He won the best ringtone creation award by Nokia and became the youngest CEO for a subsidiary of YTL Corporation in year 2002. Currently, he is the Group CEO for WebTVAsia which having more than 1,000 Asia most popular YouTube channels and monthly views more than 1 billion globally.
introduction: The limitless of new media is a platform to promote internet. Multiculture of Malaysia has created our unique DNA which are adventurous spirits and multilingual skill, in addition of endeavours and embracing, for us to be rooted locally and expand internationally.

event.title: Ripples
event.description: To experience every nuance of positive energy with passion; To challenge our limits and be vigorous in pursuing success; To be a solid rock that is not shaken by the storm, but breaks the silence of the calm water; and create ripples for positive change that resonate beyond our circles. It takes one person to ripple today, to make waves of change tomorrow.

让我们今天微小的涟漪不息，成为明白呼应的潮涌不绝。

translations.title:
新媒体
New Media
translations.name: Fred Chong
translations.bio: Fred Chong is an award-winning media entertainment entrepreneur. He started Prodigee Media in year 2005 to focus on the emerging new media industry. By combining his experience in business, entertainment and new technology, he created new business models for the media entertainment industry, and became the pioneer to leverage on social media platforms. He is enthusiastic in combining music and technology. He won the best ringtone creation award by Nokia and became the youngest CEO for a subsidiary of YTL Corporation in year 2002. Currently, he is the Group CEO for WebTVAsia which having more than 1,000 Asia most popular YouTube channels and monthly views more than 1 billion globally.
translations.introduction: The limitless of new media is a platform to promote internet. Multiculture of Malaysia has created our unique DNA which are adventurous spirits and multilingual skill, in addition of endeavours and embracing, for us to be rooted locally and expand internationally.

translations.title:
新媒体
New Media
translations.name: 张捷惟
translations.bio: 媒体娱乐行业中屡获殊荣的企业家。张捷惟在2005年成立葡萄子媒体娱乐制作公司，致力于探索新媒体行业。通过对商业、娱乐及新兴技术的了解，打造了全新商业模式，成为运用社交媒体的先行者。热衷于结合音乐与科技，曾获诺基亚亚洲最佳铃声制作奖，并在2002年成为YTL旗下机构最年轻总裁。目前也是WebTVAsia 集团首席执行官，该平台现拥有一千多个亚洲最受欢迎的YouTube频道，月均观看次数超过10亿次。
translations.introduction: 本无国界的新媒体，是一个网络推广的平台。马来西亚的多元文化造就了我们独一无二的DNA，如冒险精神与语言能力，加上努力与包容，值得深耕本土，拓展国际。

title: Drama Echoes Life
name: Soon Choon Mee
bio: President of ASLl (Persatuan Angkatan Seni Lakon Interaksi, Kuala Lumpur dan Selangor). In year 1988, Soon Choon Mee graduated with a drama and theatre degree from The Chinese Cultural University, Taiwan and she obtained a MA in Performing Arts (Drama) from Universiti Malaya. She has taught drama at the Malaysian Institute of Art at New Era College. She is attached to the latter as a part-time lecturer. She is very committed in promoting community arts education and, in recent years, organised several community arts carnivals. In year 2016, she was invited to join HongJieJie Work station to direct children's theatre, her feature work were <l am found, 2016> and <Singing under the moonlight, 2017>.
introduction: Stage play could let one create many possibilities in constraints, nevertheless it is an performing arts, parents could also further explore the children's inner world. All the world’s a stage and all the men and women merely players. Soon Choon Mee is in the opinion that we are playing different roles be it in reality or theatre stage, however, are we playing it well?

translations.title: 戏塑人生
translations.name: 孙春美
translations.bio: 戏剧联盟主席。孙春美1988年毕业自台湾中国文化大学戏剧系影剧组，加入马来西亚艺术学院戏剧系，引进台湾小剧场创作概念，作品无数。2002年获马大表演艺术计划硕士。曾担任新纪元学院戏剧与影像系主任，今为该系兼职讲师。近年致力推动社区美学教育，策划了多场社区艺术嘉年华。2016年受邀于红姐姐工作室，编导儿少剧场，作品有《找到了》（2016）及《月亮有歌》（2017）。
translations.introduction: 戏剧能够让人在限制当中创造各种可能性，它除了是一门表演艺术，父母也能够通过戏剧让我们探知儿童的内心世界。人生如戏，戏如人生。不管是人生或戏剧，孙春美认为，我们都扮演着不同的角色，问问自己，我们可有忠于自己，把每个角色扮演好？

title: I Am As You Debate
name: Leong Chek Chong
bio: Malaysian debate senior veteran, Leong Chek Chong also known as the debate master. Malaysian well-known debater such as Hu Jianbiao, Chen Xunliang, Xiao Huimin, Yan Jianghan, etc., have been trained and guided by him. He has often been invited to be the judge for debate tournaments in all over the world, that includes the World Mandarin Debate Championship and the International Chinese Debating Competition. According to Leong Chek Chong, who has joined the Catholic High School debate team in his secondary form one, that the debate is best to begin with primary school, as the debate is built on persuasion, meanwhile to face the challenges of the speech topic. He belongs to the strategic mentor, and "a knowledgeable scholar with a senior charisma yet humble", is the debaters’ impression of him.
introduction: There two elements in debates: "out-of-box" analytical debate and "in-the box persuasive". Regardless of opposition or proposition parties, there will be argument, but both parties have to let go emotional restriction, by Leong Chek Chong.
