translations.title: 辩论：你辩故我在
translations.name: 梁泽宗
translations.bio: 马来西亚辩论界资深前辈，亦被称作辩论大师。马来西亚知名辩手如胡渐彪、陈勋亮、萧慧敏、颜江瀚等，都受过他的培训与指导。他常受世界各地举行的辩论之邀成为赛会评审，其中包括：世界华语辩论锦标赛与国际华语辩论邀请赛。初中一加入公教中学辩论队的梁泽宗认为，辩论最好从小学开始，因为这是一个以说服为基础，同时要去面对挑战的演说项目。他属于策略型导师，“学者知识，学长气场，丝毫没有架子”，是辩手们对他的印象。
translations.introduction: 辩论的两个元素：脱框思辩与入框说服。无论是主客方，都必须有论证，摆脱情感束缚，带入情绪切口。梁泽宗深度分析辩论是对人、事、物慎思的方法，多元与多重交织，对信仰与权力体系不合理之处进行批判，让社会往前进步。

title: Strong Bond
name: Craig Au Yeung Ying Chai
occupation:
Comic-strip Artist,
Food & Travel Writer,
Food Curator
bio: Craig Au Yeung Ying Chai is well established as a cross media artist from Hong Kong. Paying close and keen attention to culinary development and trends worldwide. Craig dedicates his time and effort in recording and participating in local food and lifestyle movement, with the special focus on food and creative education for the younger generation. Craig has published over 20 books on design and lifestyle, food and travel. These including best sellers such as "Living Together", "Home, Chinese Home", "Half-Full", "Born to Cook", "Weido Hong Kong", "A Taste of Taipei", "A Taste of Shanghai". He set up Taste library at PMQ Hong Kong in year 2014 and planned the food flea market, launching his first "Craig's half-full kitchen" event at Beijing in year 2015 to provide a rich background and create different occasions for contemporary food and lifestyle.
introduction: Foods is a language for communication. It can be serious or it can be romantic. Craig Au Yeung Ying Chai explores the relationships among season, soil, utensil, environment in order to ensure its unlimited source of food. He has a wish to share the taste of food to the public, he will persevere so long the path is right.

translations.title:
饭饭之交
Home Cooked Meals:
translations.name: 欧阳应霁
translations.occupation:
漫画家、
饮食旅游生活作家、
饮食文化策展人
translations.bio: 欧阳应霁，生于香港，长期关注中港台以及国际生活美学趋势发展，积极投身实践，著有《两个人住》《回家真好 》《半饱 》《天生是饭人 》《香港味道》《味道台北》《味道上海》等生活书写。2014年于香港创立“味道图书馆 ”。隔年，于北京策划“应霁半饱厨房”，为当代饮食美学生活打造不同场景，提供丰富内容。
translations.introduction: 食物是人们交流的一种语言，可以正经严肃，也可以风花雪月。欧阳应霁探索节令、土地、食器、环境与食物的关系，让食物可以源源不绝、生生不息。他希望与大众分享食物味道，只要是对的，就坚持下去，吃出未来。

title: Adieu Asperger
name: Echo Koh Wee Sun
bio: She was enlisted by Sin Chew Daily as 10 most celebrated writers in year 1999. Born in Malacca, Echo Koh Wee Sun was once a reporter and marketing manager after having graduated from HanXing College of Journalism and Communication. As a regular columnist, she has published numbers of articles in several press and magazines. She has written a few books like "Dan Shen Ju Le Bu", "Wu Liao Cai Jie Hun", "Kuai Le Nv Ren", "Zuo Yong You Wei", etc. In year 2002, she returned to her family and became a full-time mother. Thereafter, she has initiated three non-proft organisations, Johor Yellow Flame (JYF), Persatuan Penyayang Kanak-kanak lstimewa Johor Bahru (Special Child Care Association Johor Bahru), and Class 47 respectively for social movement, caring for special-needs child, and parent-child activities.
introduction: No matter how good the parent has taken care of their child, what special need children really need is the acceptance and tolerance from this society and environment. Echo Koh Wee Sun has initiated non-profit organisation for her son in hoping to help those Asperger child’s mothers from undergoing her despair and hopelessness. We are responsible to let anyone who is in need of special help to live gracefully among us.

We are responsible to let anyone who is in need of special help to live gracefully among us.

translations.title: 再见阿斯
translations.name: 许慧珊
translations.bio: 1999年《星洲日报》票选十大最受欢迎本地作家。生于马六甲的许慧珊，毕业自吉隆坡韩新学院新闻系，曾任记者和市场部经理，在多家中文报章与杂志的固定专栏发表作品。已出版著作有《单身俱乐部》《无聊才结婚》《快乐女人》《左雍右为》等。2002年她回归家庭，成为全职妈妈。尔后，她发起了三个非营利组织：柔南黄色行动小组、南马特别孩子关怀协会与47号课室，分别为社运单位、关怀特殊儿单位与亲子成长活动单位。
translations.introduction: 不管父母做得多好，亚斯伯格症孩子也需社会的接纳与周围人士的宽容。许慧珊因为儿子成立了工作室，冀望后来者无需再经过她所经历的挫折与失望。我们每一个人都如有责任让有特别需要的人自在地在我们之间生活。

title: Piano. Narration
name: Clarence Kang
bio: Clarence Kang is an extraordinarily talented young man born with autism. An autistic savant – a pianist and an artist. He is Asia's first pianist with autism that held his own recital concert. He was diagnosed with Autism and ADHD (Attention Deficit Hyperactive Disorder). In his childhood, he easily memorized musical notes, he was able to arrange, transcribe music and analyze complicated chords without having proper education and training. At the age of 10, the young prodigy received formal education in music under the notable musical professor, Dr. Nicholas Ong and Mr. Tay Cher Siang. He is able to play music based on his photographic memory and he has composed a musical piano piece inspired by his life. He uses music to connect with the world and for the world to understand his world better.
introduction: Music heals the soul, makes people feel calm. The lively rhythms from Clarence Kang’s fingers have opened another door for us to enter his passionate inner world.

translations.title: 琴·叙
translations.name: 江政伟
translations.bio: 天才自闭症儿童钢琴家。亚洲第一自闭儿举办个人独奏会，江政伟虽被医学专家确认患有自闭症和过动症，却在音乐和艺术方面展现非凡天赋。儿时没有经过任何正式训练，他全靠超强记忆力，在脑袋中播放乐谱和分析复杂和弦。10岁起，他接受著名音乐教授 Dr. Nicholas Ong 和郑泽相的正式训练，如今只凭其超强记忆力即能演奏，用钢琴谱出自己的生命乐章，也用音乐建立起与世界沟通的桥梁。
translations.introduction: 音乐抚平心灵，让人不再彷徨。从江政伟指尖流传而出的轻快旋律，犹如敞开的大门，一遍遍让人踩着音符进入他热情澎湃的心灵世界。

title: The Detective Diptera
name: Dr. Heo Chong Chin
bio: Dr. Heo Chong Chin from Kuantan, Malaysia is fascinated with insects. He is a Ph.D. holder from the Department of Entomology, Texas A&M University. He obtained the Perdana Scholar Award (Research, Innovation and Publication) in year 2016 and he was an entomology research officer at the Institute for Medical Research, Kuala Lumpur. Since year 2009, he has served as a lecturer of the Faculty of Medicine, Universiti Teknologi MARA. He is the current Assistant Secretary, and was the former Honorary Secretary and Treasurer for the Malaysian Society of Parasitology and Tropical Medicine (MSPTM). He is also an associate member of the North American Forensic Entomology Association (NAFEA)and the European Association for Forensic Entomology (EAFE). Dr. Heo is also a Board-Certified Entomologist (BCE) since year 2016.
introduction: Fly has given a negative impression and it is dirty. However it is important in criminal cases now, it helps forensic pathologists to estimate the death timing, location and its cause. According to Dr. Heo Chong Chin, fly has assisted in agriculture, wound treatment and pollen propagation, playing an important role in the natural nutrient cycle. Fly is an indispensable member in natural ecosystems.

It takes one person to ripple today, to make waves of change tomorrow.

translations.title: 漣漪
translations.description:
缘起一个动念的力量，一份深沉的热爱，一次又一次不甘被束缚的挑战，一股再一股想要寻求突破的冲劲，于是，有人甘心成为一颗投石，打破局限，那激荡起的效应，就是涟漪，继续传递影响的能量，跨越界限，无远弗届。手中那颗小石头投入水中后，你不会知道泛起的涟漪会有多广，影响有多远……
让我们今天微小的涟漪不息，成为明白呼应的潮涌不绝。

translations.title: 苍蝇侦探
translations.name: 丘忠君
translations.bio: 美国德州农工大学昆虫学系博士，关丹人。丘忠君2016年获得大马驻华盛顿大使馆颁发的 Perdana学者奖（研究、创新和出版），曾是吉隆坡医药研究所昆虫研究人员。自2009年起，成为玛拉工艺大学医学院讲师。马来西亚寄生虫与热带医学学会（MSPTM）前名誉秘书和财政，现为该会助理秘书。北美法医昆虫协会（NAFEA）和欧洲法医昆虫学协会（EAFE）准会员，2016年成为美国昆虫学会认证的昆虫学家（BCE）。
translations.introduction: 与肮脏划上等号的苍蝇，如今在刑事罪案上扮演了重要角色，帮助法医推测死亡时间、地点及原因。此外，丘忠君博士也告诉大家苍蝇是有助于农业、伤口处理及花粉传播，在养分循环上扮演重要角色，是大自然生态中不可或缺的重要份子。

title: We Share the Organic Dream
name: Leong Jyh Wen
bio: Founder and Chief Vision Officer of the number one's best lawn and garden brand in Malaysia. Leong Jyh Wen has been actively advocating organic planting for many years. Recently, he has committed to promote and has successfully organised the "Help Malaysia Organic Grow" project, to ensure the sustainable and scalable growth of company, at the same time, to seek balance on environmental vocation. Under his leadership, Baba has covered 80% of the market in Malaysia. They are the first private institution of Organic Certification in Malaysia awarded with Superbrand. With exports to over 30 countries, its trademark is registered in over 30 countries. Their hard work has brought them twice of the awards - SMl Recognition Award Series, Golden Bull Award and Enterprise 50 Award.
introduction: Nice vegetable outlook, in fact is the result of the usage of non-solvent pesticide. We have unconsciously become victim as these pesticide has remained in the food, soil and body. In order to let our soil to be free from pesticide, Leong Jyh Wen encourages farmer to apply organic farming, meanwhile to encourage consumer to change their consumption behaviour to ensure the sustainability of organic farmer. To let our child to have a clean future, do change our behaviour and consumption view.

translations.title: 共同打造有机梦
translations.name: 梁志文
translations.bio: 马来西亚园艺界第一品牌Baba的创始人兼首席愿景官。多年来在马来西亚积极推动有机环保种植，梁志文近年致力于推行《帮助马来西亚更有机》计划，确保公司长远发展的同时，也兼顾环境志业。Baba在他的领导下，在大马市占率逾80%，除了获得超级品牌认证，也是国内第一家获得推动有机认证的民间机构。此外，其品牌拥有超过30个国际注册，产品行销于30多个国家。曾荣获卓越中小型企业奖、百强金牛奖和最佳50强企业大奖。
translations.introduction: 外观完整的蔬菜，其实是因为施用了难以分解的系统性农药。这些农药残留在食物、土地与身体内，让我们在不觉间成为受害者。梁志文鼓励农民采用有机耕种法，让土地恢复干净生命力, 同时也让消费者改变消费观念，以便采取机农耕法的农民能被养活。改变人们的习性与消费观，让孩子有个干净的未来。

title: Blockchain Disruptive Innovations – Travel & Food Applications
name: Darren Wang
bio: Founder and CEO of OwlTing Group, Darren Wang is an entrepreneur, managing businesses in OwlTingMarket, OwlTing Travel, OwlChain (Blockchain solution for business) and OBOOK App. He graduated with a master's degree holder in electrical engineering from Boston University. He specialized in encryption. He has work experience with Google's headquarter and SK Telecom USA as well as years of experience in startups. He also invested in MaiCoin, AMlS, CoolBitx, BlockSeer (Silicon Valley), l.X and other new startups. He hopes to apply his immense network resources to enhance Taiwan's future to ensure Taiwan's startup community is well informed and up-to-date in the industry.
introduction: Application of blockchain is very wide and cover from food safety to trading. Darren Wang has given an example that the application of blockchain on food safety are able to control food safety effectively. It clearly stated every step from breeding to packaging. It is to avoid any unnecessary human error and to ensure safe consumption for consumer.

translations.title: 区块链破坏式创新的产业应用
translations.name: 王俊凯
translations.bio: 奥丁丁集团创办人兼执行长。王俊凯拥有波士顿大学电机工程系硕士学位，专长为密码学，曾服务于矽谷谷歌总部和南韩电信旗下美国公司，累积多年创业经验。此外他投资 MaiCoin、AMIS、CoolBitxBlockSeer（矽谷）、1.X等新创公司，冀能利用自身的网路资源来提升台湾的未来以接轨世界产业。奥丁丁集团旗下有奥丁丁市集、奥丁丁旅行社、奥丁丁区块链溯源系统（OwlChain)、OBOOK买书应用程式等分支事业。
translations.introduction: 区块链的使用从食品安全到买卖交易，范围很广。王俊凯举例：用在食品安全上，就能有效地管制食安问题。从养殖到包装的每一个步骤，都清楚列明，不仅避免了很多不必要的人为疏忽，更让消费者安心食用。

title: A Reminiscent in Handmade Miniatures
name: Lim Pui Wan
bio: Having graduated with a Mechanical Engineer degree in year 2014, Lim Pui Wan is still passionate about Art, especially in miniature art. She became a miniature artist to pursue her passion full time. She believes that miniature art invoked a sense of nostalgia and inspires people to reflect on their memories just as she was inspired by her life's moments. She chose to preserve life's sentimental and monumental moments eternally in form of miniatures because they are etched for eternity. Her motto is to create extraordinary from an ordinary life moment.
introduction: Lim Pui Wan has worked hard to specialize miniature artist in order to keep all her childhood memory. Transforming the items around her during childhood become an artwork, let the memory be able to keep and inherit to the next generation.

translations.title: 袖珍手艺 怀旧记忆
translations.name: 林佩雯
translations.bio: 林佩雯虽毕业自机械工程系，却因为对袖珍艺术不间断的热情而毅然投身全职袖珍模型创作。她认为袖珍艺术通过实在的作品唤起人们的念旧情怀，从中带给人们生命力，犹如她的部分创作反映出她对生活中的记忆。她选择袖珍艺术作为记载生命中某些感性时刻的媒介，因为它真实的存在不会随光阴衰退而淡化原有的情感。她的愿望，是以生活里曾经的平凡，创造出当下的不平凡。
translations.introduction: 林佩雯因为想锁住年少时的回忆，因此努力专研袖珍手艺，把童年时身边的小事物变成艺术品，让记忆得以保留并留存给下一代。

title: Illuminating Dialogues in the City
name: Jun Ong
bio: Jun Ong is an architect and light artist with a Master in Architecture from the University of Westminster, London (2014). He was the first Malaysian to be selected to showcase at iLight Marina Bay in year 2016, Asia's leading light festival in Singapore with his interactive light installation, "Bolt". His lighting installation, "Star" was nominated for World's Best in Spatial Art at the Media Architecture Biennale 2016 (MAB16) in Sydney. He was also commissioned by Goethe-Institut Thailand and Bangkok Arts & Culture Centre (BACC) to produce an urban interactive light installation at Siam Center.
introduction: An aggressive idea and a courage to take challenges are enough to create a miracle. While Jun Ong’s aggressive and innovative thought in light art has made the urbans to stay closer together.

translations.title: 灯光开启城市对话
translations.name: 王俊豪
translations.bio: 王俊豪，伦敦威斯敏斯特大学建筑系硕士（2014），第一位大马人在2016年新加坡灯光节《照亮滨海湾》展出灯光装置艺术作品“闪电”（Bolt）。同年，他的另一份作品“筑星”（Star）则在悉尼举办的第五届国际媒体建筑双年展被提名为“世界最佳空间艺术”。此外，他还受托为泰国歌德学院与曼谷艺术文化中心联合举办的《城市媒体艺术》计划，在暹罗商场中心展出融合现代科技的互动灯光装置艺术作品。
translations.introduction: 一个疯狂的想法，一份敢于挑战的勇气，就能创造一个奇迹。而王俊豪的疯狂想法，则是透过了灯光拉近了城市人之间的距离。

title: Speed. Masterpiece
name: Haze Long
bio: Haze Long is a highly sought after speed painter and muralist. She uses a mixture of mediums from traditional oil paint, pastel to spray paint and pyrography. She is renowned for her post-impressionist murals and produced around a 100 work of mural art. She has performed speed painting for more than 40 events and her fastest record is 3 minutes. She is one of the selected 20 artists who painted a total of eighty 3D murals in the Malaysia's biggest mural project - Atmosphere in Seri Kembangan. She founded Art Misfits in year 2011 and her studio has created many beautiful creative mural and artworks for high-profile clients and won an award for top 5% performer in the Cradle Fund Coach & Grow Programme in year 2014.
introduction: Sketching out one of our speakers, Craig Au Yeung Ying Chai, in 2 min 10 sec, the fast sketch technique of Haze Long is breathtaking.

She founded Art Misfits in year 2011 and her studio has created many beautiful creative mural and artworks for high-profile clients and won an award for top 5% performer in the Cradle Fund Coach & Grow Programme in year 2014.
translations.introduction: Sketching out one of our speakers, Craig Au Yeung Ying Chai, in 2 min 10 sec, the fast sketch technique of Haze Long is breathtaking.

translations.title: 速画艺术
translations.name: 龙妍燕
translations.bio: 龙妍燕，大马最大壁画项目中完成共80幅三维立体壁画的20位艺术家之一。她以壁画和后印象主义艺术闻名，绘制逾100幅壁画作；速画表演超过40 场，最快速画纪录为3分钟。她在2011年创办了Art Misfits，该公司于2014年在摇篮基金推行的培训计划（Cradle Fund Coach & Grow Programme 2014）中成为前5%的最佳表现者。
translations.introduction: 以2分钟10秒的速度在舞台上绘出今天的其中一位主讲者——欧阳应霁，龙妍燕的速画功力让人眼前一亮。

title: Super Memory: Forget About Forgetfulness
name: Hanns Sim
occupation: Pioneer, Expert, and Authoritative Figure in the field of Mnemonics
bio: Hanns Sim is a pioneer, expert, and authoritative figure in the field of mnemonics. He has over 20 years of experience in superior memory research. In 1999, using specific techniques and computational me-thods, Sim managed to remember a staggering 67,053 Pi numbers in 7 months, breaking the world record. The breakthrough of this achievement is the realisation that the same technique can be applied into other disciplines, Since then, Sim has been actively sharing his knowledge and skills with others, creating awareness and hoping to help more people achieve a more effective and faster learning skill in their respective fields. He believed that mankind's knowledge can be greatly expanded using proper techniques to build a strong personal foundation in learning.
introduction: Technique is important, yet we focused too much on learning, without first mastering the techniques of learning per se. Mnemonics expert Hanns Sim pointed out that to accomplish a higher level of thinking, memory and comprehension are equally vital. Effective learning is achieved through repetitive practice so that our mental capacity can be expanded, and hence be applied in various fields.

translations.title: 燃
translations.description: 生命是一把信念的火炬，在时间洪流里，采集勇敢与热忱的火种，引燃斗志，热烈地支撑起内心那份动力，跨越眼前障碍，所向披靡，发光发热。如同每人心中的那头猛虎，驱使你勇往直前，征服困难；哪怕长夜漫漫，只要恒持炽热决心与万丈热情，百折不饶中展现坚毅不拔的精神，冲破黑暗界线。让火焰持续金光炽盛，唯步伐不断砥砺前行。在岁月中激情燃烧自己，天生敢为，真我不藏，你终将在时代的苍穹里绽放属于自己的光芒 。

translations.title: 记忆学习攻略
translations.name: 沈宝翰
translations.bio: 记忆力大师。沈宝翰20年来致力于助记符，是此项领域先驱。1999年，宝翰使用技术与计算模式，以7个月时间记住67,053圆周率数字，打破世界纪录。其重要突破是把相同技术，致用于学习其他学科。为了帮助更多人在各自专业领域达到有效学习，他常传授并分享他所拥有的知识天赋与学习技巧。他推崇以正确有效的学习技巧建立个人学习基础后，就能让人类的知识水平大幅度提升。
translations.introduction: 技巧很重要。我们勤于学习，为何却没有好好学习如何学习呢？记忆力大师沈宝翰点出，记忆力和理解能力同样重要，以达到高层次思维分析。通过复习，增强脑力储存量，并使用在各个领域，才是有效学习。

title: How Powerful is Your Powerpoint?
name: Chan Shao Kang
bio:
While studying law at the University of Malaya, Chan Shao Kang noted on how his professors and fellow classmates would struggle to create effective Power Point presentation slides using standard default templates provided.
This led him to explore the design possibilities of the software through experimentation and by studying exemplary presentation slides from overseas. Chan discovered that there is an art in crafting good presentation slides, which is unfortunately underrated in Malaysia. He created a Facebook page called "Ace Slide Design" in 2017, with the purpose of educating the public about the importance of good Power-Point slide design, and appreciating the details behind it.
introduction: We are used to creating PowerPoint slides, but not designing effective PowerPoint slides. Chan Shao Kang is particularly intrigued by the art of crafting good presentation slides and took his initiative to explore more on his own. He shared his learnings on how typography, images, colours and layout come together to form simple yet effective slides that can be persuasive and conveys the message well

translations.title: 你的PowerPoint够Power吗？
translations.name: 陈劭康
translations.bio: Microsoft PowerPoint （PPT）微软简报设计爱好者。陈劭康毕业于马来亚大学法律系，偶然下因发现大学教授和同学们受限于固有的 PPT设计，而开始探索 PPT设计的可能性，从此之后便与创意和设计领域工作结下不解之缘。劭康从一开始的自我摸索到后来上网观摩国外的优秀案例，逐渐意识到PPT设计是一门独立的设计领域，但在马来西亚却被冷落。2017年10月，他开设马来西亚首个有关 PPT设计的中文脸书专页“Ace Slide Design”，希望借此平台提高我国人民对PPT的重视和审美观。
translations.introduction: 人们惯性操作简报设计，而不是设计简报设计。简报设计爱好者陈劭康通过自身学习，从文字、图片和配色切入，认为懂得从判断排版、配色、字形与字体运用，才能够设计出简单而好看的 PPT。

title: The Colourful World of Colour Blindness
name: Jarod Law Ding Yong
bio:
The founder of a technology company, Jarod is one of the world's top ten important figures for contributing technological wisdom to society.
He was detected with colour vision blindness when he was 9 years old, unable to distinguish litmus test papers, this compromised his dream to become a scientist. In his younger day, his journey was a lost and confused one, with engagement in many temp Jobs. Later he decided to pursue a course in Telecommunication Enginee-ring, without worrying about his colour blind issue. After having overcome numerous hardships, he finally graduated with first-class honours. With the spirit of "one step at a time", he became an engineer proficient in 15 software development languages. He will complete an instant blood seeker and blood donation aid platform soon in this year, and he will make good use of the technology for the cause of charity.
introduction: Systems engineer Jarod Law has been living with colour blindness for over 30 years. Even though he is unable to see colours, he has trained himself to perceive different colours through acute observation, concise communication, and logical thinking. This has enabled him to solve challenges that he encountered on a daily basis that others might take for granted.

translations.title: 色盲创缤纷
translations.name: 刘丁勇
translations.bio: 科技公司创办人兼世界十大科技智慧回馈社会人物。刘丁勇于9岁时被发现患上先天多重色盲，无法分辨石蕊试纸的同时，更遑论圆科学家之梦；其年少旅途迷茫跌撞，从事过多份兼职，后来他决定转修无需辨认颜色的雷达通讯工程系，几经辛苦终于以一等荣誉成绩毕业。之后，他一步一脚印，成为精通15 种软件开发语言的工程师。他将于今年完成一个即时寻血液与捐血援助平台，通过科技方式日行一善。
translations.introduction: 三十多年的色盲生活，让系统工程师刘丁勇通过观察、沟通，从中发掘逻辑思维，纵然看不清颜色，却依然可以分析出颜色，进而解决日常所面对的问题，跨越了障碍，也找回核心价值，创造缤纷人生。

title: Makeup Life
name: Yooyo Keong Ming
bio: Yooyo is a makeup consultant from Andy Creation International Styling Consulting Centre. With 20 years in the industry, Yooyo is active in fashion shows backstage, magazine photo shoots, makeup and styling for artists. He began his journey from Kuala Lumpur, with Shanghai as his creative base. Since 2015, CHANEL China appointed him as guest makeup artist, and designated makeup artist for CHANEL China brand ambassador Zhou Xun. He has worked with many famous photographers, such as Peter Lindbergh, Ellen Von Unwerth, Chen Man, Yu Cong and etc. His precision makeup technique and easy going personality is well recognised in the industry. He is a regular face in photo shooting with magazines such as Weekly, Vogue, ELLE, L'Officiel.
introduction: Systems engineer Jarod Law has been living with colour blindness for over 30 years. Even though he is unable to see colours, he has trained himself to perceive different colours through acute observation, concise communication, and logical thinking. This has enabled him to solve challenges that he encountered on a daily basis that others might take for granted.

translations.title: 彩妆人生
translations.name: 叶强明
translations.bio: Andy Creation国际造型咨询中心彩妆顾问。叶强明入行彩妆界20年，一直活跃于秀场后台、杂志拍摄和艺人彩妆造型。他从吉隆坡出发，以上海为创意基地，也到世界各地展现自己的彩妆才华。自2015年起，中国CHANEL委任他为品牌特约彩妆师，并为CHANEL中国区品牌大使周迅的御用彩妆师。他与许多行内著名摄影师合作，如 Peter Lindbergh、EllenVon Unwerth、陈漫、于聪等。他精准的彩妆技巧和随和的个性，获得业界认可。参与杂志拍摄包括《周末画报》、《Vogue》、«ELLE》、«L' Officiel》 等。
translations.introduction: 彩妆，增添容貌上的美丽。每个人对美都有不同的诠释，而他对美的定义则是不完美，才是最美。不一样的人生阶段，绽放着不同层次的美丽。

title: Data: The Storyteller
name: Kuek Ser Kuang Keng
occupation: Trainer for data driven journalism, freelance writer
bio: Founder of DataN, Trainer for data driven journalism and freelance writer; Kuek Ser was awarded the Fulbright scholarship in 2013 to New York University to pursue a master's degree in journalism. He was a Google Journalism Fellow and Tow-Knight Centre for Entrepreneurial Journalism Fellow. With his past experiences as journalist, the use of data makes it closer to the perspective of understanding the facts of news reports; His design of application software, "What If the Syrian civil war happened in your country", won the Data Journalism Award in 2016. He believes that by building bridges between readers, facts and figures, then factual details would not be cold and raw, instead the secret lies in how to present data in a user-friendly manner.
introduction: Kuek Ser Kuang Keng is a news reporter, but instead of using images and texts, he uses data to tell his stories to the masses. Kuek Ser believes that beneath the perplexing data lies massive insights and patterns that are key resources to solve big problems. He is committed to make data accessible to the public, thus allowing them to improve their standards of living, supervise the government and participate in the implementation of national policies.

translations.name: 郭史光庆
translations.occupation: 数据新闻培训者、自由撰稿人
translations.bio: DataN 创办人、数据新闻培训者兼自由撰稿人。郭史光庆于 2013 年获颁富布赖特奖学金前往纽约大学攻读新闻学硕士学位。光庆曾获选为谷歌新闻学人与陶氏奈特创业新闻中心会员。他凭借过去新闻从业员经验，使用数据让人以更贴近实在角度去了解新闻实事；其设计的新应用软体，“若叙利亚战争在你国家发生”，于2016年获得新闻数据奖项。他认为，若能在读者、事实与数据间筑桥，那事实数据也就不冰冷无情，这秘诀就在于如何把数据以人性化呈现。
translations.introduction: 取代文字和图片，新闻也能透过数据向大众传达。数据新闻从业员郭史光庆将冰冷的数据转化为解决问题的重要资源，让民众提升生活水平，监督国家政府并参与国家政策的实施，因此数据的开放使民众更贴进社会的发展。

title: Silence No More
name: Tan Kim Kiek
bio: A legal advocate, Tan Kim Kiek has been the voice for sexual assault victims and continually fights for the injustices caused by this offence. Driven by her own personal experi-ence, as she realised most victims remained silent in fear of harsh societal judgement. She advocates to increase awareness on sexual violence and seek to break the culture of society's stigma on blaming the victim.
introduction: Driven by her personal experience, lawyer Tan Kim Kiek believes that our society should be better educated to increase awareness towards sexual violence, and advocates for the voices of sexual assault victims to be heard. It is through understanding and acceptance that the culture of victim blaming can be avoided, allowing them to integrate back into society.

event.title: Passion
event.description: The flames of our dreams keep our life lit, carrying this torch we boldly take steps and blaze the trail, moving forward fearlessly. This bright spark and flame powers our hearts, illuminate it and making it invincible so we can overcome the uncertainties and challenges ahead. Without this torch, fear oloak us and we lose our direction in the dark. The flames of these ideas become our passion, we use our passion to go the distance and bravely endure the trials and tribulations before reaching to the other shore and taste the sweet success and it's flavour.

translations.title: 燃
translations.description: 生命是一把信念的火炬，在时间洪流里，采集勇敢与热忱的火种，引燃斗志，热烈地支撑起内心那份动力，跨越眼前障碍，所向披靡，发光发热。如同每人心中的那头猛虎，驱使你勇往直前，征服困难；哪怕长夜漫漫，只要恒持炽热决心与万丈热情，百折不饶中展现坚毅不拔的精神，冲破黑暗界线。让火焰持续金光炽盛，唯步伐不断砥砺前行。在岁月中激情燃烧自己，天生敢为，真我不藏，你终将在时代的苍穹里绽放属于自己的光芒 。

translations.title: 不再沉默
translations.name: 陈金玉
translations.bio: 不再沉默的勇者。陈金玉，一朵铿锵玫瑰，毅然在黑夜里用那坚强的花蕾，绽放出一份特有的美，故事中纵然有泪，可是人生不因此枯萎。成长过程中的爱恨矛盾，交织间让她体认并重新赋予身体应有的认知。性暴力，并不是不能说的秘密，反之更应该打破沉默，勇敢发声；因为比性暴力更令人发指的，是社会无形中建构的性暴力文化，例如：放大审视幸存者的装扮或行为、通过谴责幸存者来为施暴者免责等等的性暴力迷思体现，都足以让幸存者受到二度伤害。她的美丽虽带着痛楚，却给予生活积极的实践。
translations.introduction:
从痛，到懂，再到感动。
执业律师陈金玉从自身经历体悟，社会应该透过更完善的性教育，才能提供正确的性知识，让性侵犯的幸存者藉由社会给予的体谅与接纳，可以凝视曾经，并积极地面对生命。

title: The Power of Humanitarian Work
name: Jason Yip Wai Cheong
occupation: Regional Head of Unit at the government affairs & donor relations division of the International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC)
bio:
Jason Yip is the Regional Head of Unit at the government affairs & donor relations division of the International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC).
He graduated from the University of Hong Kong with a BBA in 2004 and began his career as an analyst at Goldman Sachs. Four years later, Yip continued his study in Japan and became involved in the ICRC. Yip's participation in humanitarian aid and emergency relief include the 2008 Sichuan earthquake, the 2015 migrant crisis in the Andaman Sea, and delegation experience in Palestine, Afghanistan and Myanmar. Yip received a Medal of Honour from the Hong Kong SAR government for his effort and contribution to international humanitarian aid assistance.
introduction: nternational Committee of the Red Cross frontline personnel Jason Yip shares that besides compassion and kindness, a humanitarian aid worker also need to possess patience, neutrality, and the ability to make logistical arrangements under tight time frames. He appeals that the borderless notion of humanitarian aid requires the contribution from all of mankind, and sought to reassure the risks of this career path.

translations.title: 人道的力量
translations.name: 叶维昌
translations.occupation: 红十字国际委员会驻吉隆坡区域市场主管
translations.bio: 红十字国际委员会（International Committee of the Red Cross, "ICRC") 驻吉隆坡区域市场主管。叶维昌于2004年华业自香港大学商学院，随后进入高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）工作。四年后，他辞职并前往日本进修期间，深受前辈影响而决定投身于ICRC。他主要负责动员资源，维持与各国政府和捐赠者的关系，就日内瓦公约的落实给予意见。他曾在巴勒斯坦、阿富汗和缅甸参与救援工作，在2008年到四川地震穴区救灾，2015年到爱达曼海救助从非洲偷渡欧洲的船民。他今年获香港特区政府颁授荣誉勋章，以表扬他在国际人道援助的贡献。
translations.introduction: 红十字国际委员会 (International Committee of the Red Cross, ICRC) 战区前线人员兼人道工作者叶维昌打破世人的刻板印象，告诉大家人道救援人员不光需要同理心和爱心，更需要学习如何以中立的态度与武装组织谈判，在有限时间安排物资调度和安抚家人对其职业的忧虑。中立，不是立场，而是工具。他呼吁，人道主义这个无国界的概念需要世界每个你我一同奉献。

title: New Street Art Changes the World
name: Kenji Chai
bio: Kenji Chai is a street artist. He started his career as a graphic designer, but was soon bored by the insipid nature of the job. Seeking to rediscover his own interest in painting and freedom of expression, Chai turned to graffiti. He has collaborated with Puma and Nippon Paint, and his recent commission - an 87.1m x 20.6m mural on the side of the RED by Sirocco Hotel in KL-received recognition from the Malaysia Book of Records for the Tallest Mural in Malaysia. Chai believes that street art can enliven a place with aesthetic qualities, and if applied in the right context, bestow a place with positive energy.
introduction: Street artist Kenji Chai hopes to shift public perception and misconception towards graffiti by creating artworks with positive energy and message. Instead of an act of vandalism, Kenji believes that street art, if applied in the right context, can enliven a city with aesthetic values and optimism.

translations.title: 街头艺术翻转视界
translations.name: 蔡威勇
translations.bio: 涂鸦艺术家。蔡威勇自幼喜欢绘画，曾从事平面设计工作；惟之后发现这份工作的枯燥乏味让他无所适从，也找不回当初绘画的美好。他希望自己的想法得到更实际的诠释方式，进而开始接触涂鸦。他曾和彪马（PUMA）、立邦漆（Nippon Paint）等知名品牌合作，最近为城中精品酒店 RED by SIROCCO绘出一面高达87.1公尺、宽达20.6公尺的壁画，获得《马来西亚纪录大全》认证，列为“马来西亚最高壁画”。他认为涂鸦赋予一个地方生命力，因此将作品融入大环境中，为这忙碌都市带来一份正能量，也同时起了美化功效。
translations.introduction: 大马街头艺术家蔡威勇坚持于自身的使命，透过创造出一幅幅正能量的画作，来让大家对涂鸦改观，不再认为涂鸦是在破坏公物，甚至影响市容的美观，而是一种艺术。

title: The Creation of Characters
name: Yeo Yann Yann
bio: Yeo Yann Yann is an award-winning Malaysian actress, worked in Singapore and has acted in theatre, television and film. She was awarded 'Best Actress' by Singapore's 'Life Theatre' for her role as Fan Yi (#7) in the drama series-'Thunderstorm' (Ef) in 2007. After returning to Malay-sia, Yeo's work in 'The Iron Lady' (won her the Golden Awards for Best Actress in 2010. She received international recognition for her role as Hwee Leng in llo llo, a Singaporean film for which she received the Best Supporting Actress award in both the 2013 Golden Horse Award and the 2013 Asia Pacific Film Festival, as well Best Actress award at the Mumbai film festivals in India and the Vladivostok film festivals in Russia.
introduction: Yeo Yann Yann chose to be an actress to avoid the spotlight from the public, since it allowed her the comfort of hiding behind the character she is portraying. Now, the Golden Horse Award-winning actress shared how she discovered herself through acting, and hoped to portray her true self and personality in this talk.

translations.title: 角色创造
translations.name: 杨雁雁
translations.bio: 金马奖最佳女配角。杨雁雁演出作品横跨电视、电影与舞台喜剧，多年来坚持于精进自己的演技，建立辉煌的演艺事业。她早期于新加坡发展参与多部电影，凭着戏剧《雷雨》中所饰演的“蘩漪”一角，嬴得「新加坡 Life! Theatre Awards」最佳女演员奖项。回流大马后，2010年凭电视剧《女头家》荣获第一届金视奖最佳女主角。在电影《爸妈不在家》中的精湛演出让她的演艺生涯再造高峰，获颁第50届金马奖最佳女配角，同时拿下亚太影展最佳女配角及在印度和俄罗斯影展获颁最佳女主角殊荣。
translations.introduction: 潜台词，让你沉默中依然可以表达千言万语。曾经为了逃避众人的眼光，所以选择走上演员这条路。透过躲在角色背后的安逸，如今她从角色走出来，金马奖最佳女配角杨雁雁通过演绎观察自己，如今她真实演绎自己。

title: Lessons from Jazz
name: Tay Cher Siang
bio: Jazz Maestro Tay Cher Siang graduated from West Virginia University with a Masters of Jazz Pedagogy. Upon returning to Malaysia in 2007, He taught Jazz and is actively involved in the Jazz scene in Malaysia and Asia region. Having participated in various music productions for albums and concerts. In 2008, he stood out among more than 20 Jazz pianists from 5 countries, and was invited to join Unit Asia Jazz Orchestra. The band members include Japan T-Square Jazz Orchestra drummer Hiroyuki Noritake, guitarist Isao Miyoshi, Thai saxophonist Koh Mr. Saxman. The orchestra gave several concert tours around the world. In 2016, he won the 13th BOH Cameronian Arts Awards Best Solo Performance- Instrumental and Best Original Composition.
introduction: After obtaining his Masters in Jazz Pedagogy in the US, musician Tay Cher Siang formed the jazz ensemble WVC – Malaysian Jazz Ensemble, hoping to incorporate local music elements into jazz music and widen its appeal to a greater range of listeners.

translations.title: 爵士二三事
translations.name: 郑泽相
translations.bio: 爵士音乐家。郑泽相毕业于美国西维吉尼亚大学，爵士音乐教学系硕士。2007年回国，泽相除了从事爵士音乐教育，也活跃于马来西亚和亚洲区域音乐舞台，更参与各顶音乐类型制作，担任专辑与演唱会音乐总监。2008年，他从五个国家二十多位钢琴家甄选中脱颖而出，被邀请加入 Unit Asia 爵士乐团。此乐团成员有日本爵士乐团T-Square 鼓手则竹裕之、吉他手三好功郎、泰国萨克斯风手 Koh Mr.Saxman，于世界各地举行多场巡回演奏。2016年，他个人荣获第13届 BOH Cameronian Arts Awards 音乐组最佳独奏及最佳原创作品奖。
translations.introduction: 马来西亚爵士音乐家郑泽相凭着爵士乐的自由奔放的即兴精神，快乐地游走在生活与音乐世界，他远赴美国主修爵士音乐教学，归国后创办乐团 WVC – Malaysian Jazz Ensemble，将本土元素融入爵士乐，点燃与众不同的音乐火花。

title:
爵士玩乐
Jazz On!
name: WVC - Malaysian Jazz Ensemble
bio: Initiated by Tay Cher Siang, WVC is a Jazz ensemble with bassist A. J, drummer K. J Wong and saxophonist Julian Chan. WVC is committed in creating their own musical language and bringing their music to the world. As a major force behind the local Chinese Jazz, WVC have been involved in several important jazz festivals of the region and collaborating with other musicians in a number of Chinese jazz concerts and recording albums. In the jazz concerts held in June 2015, the interpretation by combining dance, calli-graphy, performing arts and other elements have achieved critical accolade.
introduction: Relive this improvised jazz performance by the Malaysian Jazz Ensemble, which uses musical notes crowdsourced from the audience.

translations.title: 燃
translations.description: 生命是一把信念的火炬，在时间洪流里，采集勇敢与热忱的火种，引燃斗志，热烈地支撑起内心那份动力，跨越眼前障碍，所向披靡，发光发热。如同每人心中的那头猛虎，驱使你勇往直前，征服困难；哪怕长夜漫漫，只要恒持炽热决心与万丈热情，百折不饶中展现坚毅不拔的精神，冲破黑暗界线。让火焰持续金光炽盛，唯步伐不断砥砺前行。在岁月中激情燃烧自己，天生敢为，真我不藏，你终将在时代的苍穹里绽放属于自己的光芒 。

translations.title:
爵士玩乐
Jazz On!

translations.introduction: Relive this improvised jazz performance by the Malaysian Jazz Ensemble, which uses musical notes crowdsourced from the audience.

translations.title:
爵士玩乐
Jazz On!
translations.name: WVC - Malaysian Jazz Ensemble
translations.bio: 马来西亚爵士乐团。WVC-MalaysianJazzEnsemble 由郑泽相发起，成员有贝斯手AJ、鼓手黄俊景（KJ Wong）、萨克斯风手曾庆松 （Julian Chan）。乐团致力于创造属于自己的音乐语汇，再将其音乐带到世界各地。从2007年开始世界年度巡回。身为本地中文爵士乐重要推手，此乐团至今已参与本区域几项重要爵士音乐节，参与合作多项音乐会及中文爵士专辑录制。2015年6月举办的两场纯爵士音乐会中，诠释方式加入舞蹈、书法、表演艺术等元素，好评如潮。
translations.introduction: WVC-Malaysian Jazz Ensemble 让观众即席随机选出一个音符，串成旋律，即兴演奏爵士乐让会场观众听得尽兴同时，也意犹未尽！

title: Find Yourself Through Techno
name: Chen Pooi Chin
occupation: An Avid Enthusiast in the Art of Journaling
bio: Chen Pooi Chin is an avid enthusiast in the art of journaling. She loves stationeries, and enjoys expressing her thoughts and recording memories using old-fashioned ways, such as handwriting and creating crafts on paper. Through journaling, Chen learns how to observe the finer details in everyday life, which are often overlooked due to the sensory overload caused by digital technology. She is known as *PC" in her circle, and has a knack for incorporating words that begin with those initials in her work, such as Postal & Crafts, Private & Confidential, Page Count, and Personal Cheerleader. In 2017, Chen published her first book, Pooi Chin-Love for Journaling,released by Taiwanese publishing house, Yeren.
introduction: An avid journaling enthusiast, Chen Pooi Chin loves to collect stories and records them in her books of journals. Her preferred method of recording is through old-fashioned ways, such as handwriting and by creating crafts on pages to form her narratives. She believes that journaling allows her to relive her memories and adds a layer of warmth to them, teaching her to appreciate the finer details in life.

translations.title: 在手帐里认识自己
translations.name: 陈佩真
translations.bio: 手帐达人。陈佩真年前获台湾野人文化出版社邀约，于2017年出版第一本个人著作《恋手帐》。手帐人称“Pooi Chin”或“PC”，喜欢把与名字“PC”有关的字眼融入创作力，例如 Postal & Craft、Private & Confidential、Page Count、Personal Cheerleader等等。她对文具有一份情意结，也热爱书写与手作，欣赏极简创作，享受没有规划的灵感来源。在感官被数码科技产品日渐麻木的生活里，通过手帐这样实在的记录方式，学会观察日常中的小确幸，真切地感受生命，丰富心灵，珍惜当下，是她在手帐路上的一番领悟。
translations.introduction: 手帐达人陈佩真，乐于收集沿路故事，把途中看到的人物和美景，用手写记录行程，让回忆保存得更久。对笔墨纸和手写持有一份情怀，在重新赋予它们美好的同时，也带给生命不一样的温度；当我们一直在寻找所谓的幸福快乐人生，其实幸福就是如此在生活缝隙之间记录下来，从中学会珍惜。

title: 号外-号内
name: Peter Wong
occupation: Editor-in-Chief and publisher of the Magazine, 'P'
bio: Peter Wong is Editor-in-Chief and publisher of the Magazine, 'P' since 2014 and the art director of "Fang Suo" Bookstore. A graduate from the English Depaniment at the Faculty of Arts, Chinese University of Hong Kong, Wong joined City Magazine in 1988 and was promoted to Editor-in-Chief four years later. He is also co-founder of a design firm, Fill in the Blanks Ltd, and a PR company. Linkage Communications Co Ltd, with his friends in 1994. Wong returned to City Magazine in 1999. He joined the Hong Kong Economic Journal in 2008 and worked on the publication of its bi-weekly attachment magazine, *LifeStyle Journal'. Wong believes that a good magazine should be progressive and able to keep up with the times and societal trends.
introduction: In the digital age where magazines are gradually being displaced, Peter Wong is still fascinated by the charms of the magazine. He set up Magazine P in hope of having a platform to showcase his own culture, identity, and creative lifestyle.

translations.title: 号外-号内
translations.name: 黄源顺
translations.occupation: 香港《MAGAZINE P》文化创意生活杂志出版人兼总编辑
translations.bio: 香港《MAGAZINE P》文化创意生活杂志出版人兼总编辑，现任方所自然力研究所总监。黄源顺毕业于香港大学文学院英文系，1988年加入《号外》杂志，1992年升任为总编辑。1994年离开和友人合组设计公司 Fill in the Blanks Ltd 及公关公司 Linkage Communications Co. Ltd.。1999年重返《号外》出任出版人及总编辑。2008年2月转投香港《信报》参与随报附送双周刊《LifeStyle Journa 优雅生活》的创刊工作，2014 年创办《MAGAZINE P》。身为资深传媒人，源顺认为一本好的杂志，必须具有前瞻性，紧扣时代和社会脉搏。
translations.introduction: 杂志，让人在短时间内洞察潮流趋势，有鉴于每一期的内容不同，所以每一次皆是由零开始，重新编版策划。杂志之于在业界孜孜耕耘了三十年的《Magazine P》创办人黄源顺，如同生命主题，它不止是名词，而是动词，因为坚持于一件事，需要不间断的驱动力。他深读杂志灵魂，反思生活态度。

title: Live Like A Magazine
name: Spencer Chou
occupation: Founder of Taipei boven Magazine Library.
bio: Founder of Taipei boven Magazine Library. Born in Taipei in 1976, Spencer Chou joined Tower Records as he is passionate about musio. Besides meeting with many music enthusiasts, the acoess to a large collection of foreign language magazines is his pinnacle significance. To him, the most fascinating feature of a magazine is the close connection with current life, which is the knowledge repository that the Internet cannot replace. He believes that the library is an essential presence in the city because people precipitate and think through while reading. In the early days of "wishing to evoke good memories and sharing." and first of its kind in the world, boven Magazine Library, was established to fulfil this passion.
introduction: The nature of Spencer Chou’s job nurtured his love for magazines, motivating him to set up Taipei’s Boven Magazine Library. Using magazines as a medium, Chou hopes to present a platform for the city’s creative minds to exchange ideas. Stemming from his childhood enthusiasm to share comic books with his friends, he hopes that this library can replicate that feeling and be a source of inspiration for the community.

translations.title: 活得跟杂志一样有趣
translations.name: 周筵川
translations.occupation: 台北 boven 杂志图书馆创办人
translations.bio: 台北 boven 杂志图书馆创办人。1976年出生于台北的周筵川，因为喜欢音乐而进入淘儿唱片（Tower Records） 工作，在那里除了遇到许多音乐狂热者，更重要的是接触到大量外文杂志。杂志之于他而言，最迷人的特性是与当下生活的紧密连结，那是网路无法取代的知识储存方式。他相信，图书馆是城市里必要的存在，因为人们通过阅读过程沉淀和思考。本着“想要唤起阅读美好记忆与分享”的初心，全世界第一家杂志图书馆 boven Magazine Library由此成立。
translations.introduction: 小时与同学分享可爱漫画，现在与社区分享灵感泉源 —杂志。台北 boven 杂志图书馆周筳川不爱念书，却喜爱阅读。他以杂志为媒介，创立市区中的文化交流平台，让来自不同背景的人交换或激发生活，在阅读空间中和有趣灵感相遇，他认为分享自己喜欢的东西是最快乐的。

title: Mastering Your Dream by 3P
name: Zung Heng
bio:
Zung is an award-winning international photographer. Born and raised in Sekinchan, Zung set up his own studio, The Photoz, when he was 24.
His is known for his distinctive ability to capture fleeting moments and emotions stealthily, which earned him the moniker "Ninja Photographer".
Zung has shot portraits of Anthony Robbins, Bill Clinton, George W. Bush, Andrea Bocelli, the Dalai Lama, and Donald Trump; he is also a favourite among the Malaysian royalties and the high society. Zung completed a personal challenge to shoot in 6 continents within 6 weeks, and has even travelled from Antarctica to the Arctic in 100 days on photography assignments.
introduction: Transform your weakness into a selling point that makes you stand out. Despite not having any professional training in photography, Zung Heng’s perseverance and boldness propelled him to a successful career capturing portraits of notable personalities. Zung reminds us to be brave in being ourselves and dare to try something different to achieve success. Instead of settling to be the best, why not strive to be the one and only? Let your passion, professionalism and purpose drive your dreams.

Zung reminds us to be brave in being ourselves and dare to try something different to achieve success. Instead of settling to be the best, why not strive to be the one and only? Let your passion, professionalism and purpose drive your dreams.

translations.title: 我的3P人生
translations.name: 王睦宗
translations.bio: 大马国际摄影师。出身于马来西亚小渔村适耕庄的王睦宗在24岁时创立摄影工作室“The Photoz”，以独到的拍摄手法及视角来捕捉和诠释拍摄者背后的故事。他不仅是马来西亚皇室爱用的摄影师，还拍摄过美国心灵讲师罗宾、美国前总统克林顿、美国前总统布什、美国现任总统特朗普等世界名人，作品在国际摄影界深获好评。此外，他曾利用6周游走6大洲完成环球拍摄工作计划，更曾在100多天内从南极到北极分别进行不同的拍摄。
translations.introduction: 把你的缺点，打造成为卖点。逆向行走追逐摄影梦，坚持不做第一，只做唯一。闻名国际的大马摄影师王睦宗秉持着热忱，告诉大家只要勇敢做自己，勇敢和别人不同，才会发现自己，做世上唯一的你：热诚、专业和使命！

title: Preserving the Graceful Mak Yong
name: Zamzuriah Zahari
bio: Zamzuriah Zahari is a dancer, choreo-grapher, actress and singer, specia-lising in traditional Malay dance and theatre. A recipient of the National Arts Award 2006 (Young Talent - Dancer), her expertise is in the styles of Tarian Tari Inai, Mak Yong Kelantan, Mek Mulung Kedah and Mak Yong Riau. She is committed to preserve and revive the legacy of traditional Malay dance and theatre through visits to her hometown, Kelantan, and studying the knowledge and movements of these disappearing art forms. Zamzuriah has performed both locally and abroad, and even designed a complete traditional dance syllabus at the National Academy of Arts, Culture, and Heritage (ASWARA). She currently lectures at both ASWARA and University of Malaya.
introduction: “Who else to love it if I don’t?”It is through holding on to our culture and traditions that we gain a clear picture of our identity. Zamzuriah Zahari, a traditional Malay dancer, choreographer and researcher, works hard to preserve the Mak Yong dance, “Tarian Inai” & “wayang kulit” so it can continue to exist in its original form for generations to come.

event.title: Passion
event.description: The flames of our dreams keep our life lit, carrying this torch we boldly take steps and blaze the trail, moving forward fearlessly. This bright spark and flame powers our hearts, illuminate it and making it invincible so we can overcome the uncertainties and challenges ahead. Without this torch, fear oloak us and we lose our direction in the dark. The flames of these ideas become our passion, we use our passion to go the distance and bravely endure the trials and tribulations before reaching to the other shore and taste the sweet success and it's flavour.

translations.title: 燃
translations.description: 生命是一把信念的火炬，在时间洪流里，采集勇敢与热忱的火种，引燃斗志，热烈地支撑起内心那份动力，跨越眼前障碍，所向披靡，发光发热。如同每人心中的那头猛虎，驱使你勇往直前，征服困难；哪怕长夜漫漫，只要恒持炽热决心与万丈热情，百折不饶中展现坚毅不拔的精神，冲破黑暗界线。让火焰持续金光炽盛，唯步伐不断砥砺前行。在岁月中激情燃烧自己，天生敢为，真我不藏，你终将在时代的苍穹里绽放属于自己的光芒 。

translations.title: Preserving the Graceful Mak Yong

translations.title: 玛蓉舞
translations.name: Zamzuriah Zahari
translations.occupation: 传统舞蹈及剧场的习舞者、编舞者及研习者
translations.bio: 马来西亚传统舞蹈及剧场的习舞者、编舞者及研习者。Zamzuriah是2006年国家艺术奖（青年 - 舞蹈类别）得主，她专研宫廷舞（Tari Inai）、吉兰丹州的玛蓉舞（Mak Yong Kelantan）、吉打的传统马来剧场（Mek Mulung Kedah）及廖内群岛的玛蓉舞（Mak Yong Riau），曾多次回乡或至各地采集这四种舞蹈的相关知识和舞蹈动作，带动及复兴马来西亚传统舞蹈及剧场，演出足迹遍布全国及世界各地，并在国家艺术文化遗产大学（ASWARA）设计出一套完整的传统舞蹈课纲，现为该校全职讲师及马来亚大学兼职讲师。
translations.introduction: “如果我不爱，那谁来爱？”坚守自己的文化传统，才能清楚了解自己是谁。马来西亚传统舞蹈及剧场的习舞者、编舞者及研习者Zamzuriah Zahari 努力捍卫玛蓉舞、宫廷舞和皮影戏，让它可以继续以最原始的呈现方式出现在我们的面前。

title: Malaysian Mandarin From a Chinese Perspective
name: Wu Hanyang
bio: A native of Quanzhou City in Fujian Province, China, Wu Hanyang's strong interest and passion for news and media motivated him to study journalism in Malaysia. The diverse multiculturalist society here provided insightful perspective and allowed him an opportunity to observe the Malaysian communities, understanding societal differences, and how to contribute to cultural exchanges. Wu's easy going personality and cheerful disposition allowed him to engage in intercultural discourse, enabling him to broaden his new knowledge and take challenges.
introduction: Wu Hanyang, a Chinese student in Malaysia, is intrigued by the linguistic differences of Mandarin in both countries. He shares some of the interesting interactions that he encounters on a daily basis as he adapts to this familiar language. Wu hopes that his stories can help to bridge the cultural gap and invites more to celebrate the beauty of language differences.

translations.title: 中国人看大马华语
translations.name: 吴瀚洋
translations.bio: 中国留学生。来自中国福建省泉州市的吴瀚洋，因为对于新闻媒体领域怀着一股强烈的热爱与向往，所以选择离乡背井来到马来西亚修读新闻系。他个性随和大方、阳光开朗，具备良好跨文化交际能力，也敢于接受挑战，积极接收新知识。马来西亚的多元文给予他足够的样本和更宽广的视角去运用专业知识观察社会，进而让他体会两国文化之间的差异，以及为文化交流作出贡献。
translations.introduction: 作为在马念书的中国留学生吴瀚洋，希望通过语言差异的发现，发挥出桥梁枢纽作用，分享这样的差异性。他相信这会是一种有趣的差异分享，因为我们分享，争论的其实并不仅仅是语言现象本身。与其说分享，不如说我们在这个平台上共享华文之美！

title: Redesigning Bornean Aesthetics
name: Wendy Teo Boon Ting
occupation: UK RIBA Qualified Achitect, Curator, Designer and Re-searcher.
bio: Wendy Teo is a UK RIBA qualified architect, curator, designer and re-searcher. She has won numerous accolades throughout her career in architecture, including the 1st Prize in Holcim Sustainable Architecture Competition in Switzerland, Archiprix 2009 in Uruguay, and the Columbia Threadneedle Prize. Teo's design projects have been exhibited around the world, most notably at the 2013/14 ArchiLab in France, In 2017, Teo founded Borneo Art Collective, a nonprofit organisation aiming to promote art, design, heritage, crafts, wellness concept and interesting stories of Borneo culture, helping Borneo to establish a creative crowd.
introduction: Wendy Teo, a UK-trained architect from Borneo, sought to apply her knowledge and skills on Bornean arts and architecture. She hopes to confront the potential decline facing Bornean art by providing a platform to introduce it to the world.

translations.title: 婆罗洲美学再设计
translations.name: 张文婷
translations.occupation: 英国皇家建筑师、策展人兼研究员
translations.bio: 英国皇家建筑师、策展人兼研究员。张文婷以在建筑设计生涯中，赢得多项国际奖项认可，如豪瑞（Holcim）可持续下一代奖（一等奖）、Archiprix、哥伦比亚-创利德奖等。她的设计项目曾于世界各地展出，当中最值得一提的是她受邀参展由蓬皮杜中心副宿K Frederic Migayrou 和法国奥尔良FRAC中心总监 Marie-Ange Brayer策划的2013/14Archilab自然建筑展览。2017年，她从英国回到家多后，开设婆罗洲美宇实验室，秉持婆罗洲合作精神，将海内外设计师、产业界能手、地方工匠进行合作配对，且从事多方位的美学产品实验。
translations.introduction: 属于自己的历史，就应该拥有它的说话权。身为婆罗洲人的建筑师张文婷，将她所思所想所学，学以致用于婆罗洲艺术，建筑内容上面，诚实面对艺术可能没落的挑战。归本回家，你也可以与世界对话！

title: Social Enterprise on the Field
name: Chan Zi Xiang
bio: One of the co-founders of social enterprise named Langit, Chan Zi Xiang, graduated with a major in Actuary joined an NGO trip to assist the aborigines (Orang Asli) from Lawas Plateau in Sarawak with basic water suppliers. That was where Chan and his partners came across very high quality crops that they weren't aware. As time goes on, Chan and his partners saw infinite potential and opportunity for this crops to develop. They believed that by establishing a sustainable economic ecosystem on crops, the system will provide a better future to the Orang Asli community. Thus Langit was incorporated for this noble social enterprise project.
introduction: Social enterprise firm Langit’s co-founder, Chan Zi Xiang and his partners established a retail platform to connect farmers from rural areas with the outside world. The platform not only solved the transportation problems faced by the farmers, it also facilitated knowledge transfer and share advance farming techniques, allowing the world to enjoy high quality rice produced from the inland areas of Malaysia. Besides the economic benefits, Langit also achieved sustainable development by redefining rural agriculture.

event.title: Relearn
event.description:
Since the day we came into this world, from our baby crawls to walking properly, from expressing joy, happiness, sorrow, and anger. We collectively learn from our daily observations through our hearts. We enter new stages of life at every interval, and past experiences then serve as our invisible guide to behave, perform, and improve our lives. How long has it been since you last learned diligently? The repetitive processes keep going on.

Going back to ground zero with our hearts composed, by releasing all knowledge gained and letting go, we seek new knowledge, begin drawing the line from a dot, which then diversifies, amplifies, and spreads into various ideas and concepts. Progress would not happen if there's no discernment after learning. Slack and incompetence would take place if there's no practice after discernment. Just like sailing against strong currents, the continuous quest for learning to acquire new knowledge, and the ability to adapt and be flexible during uncertainties lead to viable and positive outcomes resulting from changes. ‘Borderless’ in learning, let's get inspired by the beauty of learning.

translations.title: 學
translations.description:
呱呱坠地 ↓↓ 蹒跚学步 ↙↘ 走向世界 ↙↘↙↘↙↘↙↘↙↘ 人的一生
就是在学习中不断充实自己 ▁ ▃ ▅ 人非生而知之,唯有勤学不辍 ∅
启蒙 → 幼教 → 小学 → 中学 → 大学 → 工作 → 家庭 → 生活 → 晚年
擅长学习，突破自我，是成功者最根本的本领，也是安身立命之本 △♂你♀有多久沒有好好学习了？生活日复一日 ◐ 相似的过程与结局持续上演中，我们坚持走出舒适区，保持学习态。学 让我们懂得抓不懈必有所获。回家的路不止一条 ╬ 你探索了几条?人生要紧几步 ⇒ 必须要有归零的心态,思想上从零开始,实践中从零做起,把心态调整到坐标原点 ⦿
学 让我们懂得知敬畏而后严谨。学而不思 不进 ⊠ 思而不用 则退 ←学无止境 ∞ 不负时光 我们一直在路上 →

translations.title: 农耕新出路
translations.name: 陈治向
translations.bio: 社会企业Langit联合创办人。主修精算系的陈治向，在一趟深入砂拉越的老越（Lawas）高原地区，协助原住民处理基本水供的非政府组织行程中，和三位伙伴因缘贴进农民的农作生活，方发现马来西亚拥有如此优质农作物。时间的积累，治向和伙伴看见间中藏着无限的发展潜能。他们相信，只有建立可持续发展的经济生态系统，才会让优势为这个社区带来更好的未来。为此，一家社会企业 Langit，因此诞生。
translations.introduction: Langit 社会企业联合创办人陈治向与伙伴创立内陆农民与外界接轨的销售平台，解决交通运输的不便，分享先进农耕技术，让世人有机会享用马来西亚内陆地区孕育出的优质稻米，为乡区农民带来经济效益的同时，也得以重新定位乡区农业，使之永续发展。

title: Diversity of Coffee
name: Kenny Lee Wee Ting
bio: Kenny Lee is the founder of Earthlings Coffee Workshop in Kuching, Sarawak. Lee, possessing a DBA (Doctor of Business Administration), started to learn about coffee in 2011. Lee obtained the Coffee Quality Institute (CQI) 'Q' Grader license, obtained experience as a certified instructor with the Specialty Coffee Association of America (SCAA) and the Specialty Coffee Association of Europe (SCAE). He is also a certified lecturer and examiner, and was appointed as the Head of Asia-Pacific region of the Coffhe Consulate, Germany. His recent extensive research and his awareness aimed to shift the public's misconception towards Liberica, a type of coffee bean that is abundant locally, earned him the Kaldi Award at the 2018 Stuttgart Coffee Summit.
introduction: Our perception of taste has evolved over time, affected by factors such as geographical contexts and historical background. Due to this, Kenny Lee, the founder of Earthlings Coffee Workshop, shared that the taste of coffee should not conform to a fixed set of criteria. It is our subjective preferences that have brewed the diverse taste of coffee that the world enjoys.

translations.title: Diversity of Coffee
translations.name: Kenny Lee Wee Ting
translations.bio: Kenny Lee is the founder of Earthlings Coffee Workshop in Kuching, Sarawak. Lee, possessing a DBA (Doctor of Business Administration), started to learn about coffee in 2011. Lee obtained the Coffee Quality Institute (CQI) 'Q' Grader license, obtained experience as a certified instructor with the Specialty Coffee Association of America (SCAA) and the Specialty Coffee Association of Europe (SCAE). He is also a certified lecturer and examiner, and was appointed as the Head of Asia-Pacific region of the Coffhe Consulate, Germany. His recent extensive research and his awareness aimed to shift the public's misconception towards Liberica, a type of coffee bean that is abundant locally, earned him the Kaldi Award at the 2018 Stuttgart Coffee Summit.
translations.introduction: Our perception of taste has evolved over time, affected by factors such as geographical contexts and historical background. Due to this, Kenny Lee, the founder of Earthlings Coffee Workshop, shared that the taste of coffee should not conform to a fixed set of criteria. It is our subjective preferences that have brewed the diverse taste of coffee that the world enjoys.

translations.title: 咖啡杯里的多样性
translations.name: 李威霆
translations.bio: Earthlings咖啡工作坊创办人。李威廷，企业管理博士，于2011年开始接触咖啡，为将精品咖啡引入东马走访各国学习，获CQ1 杯测师执照、前美国精品咖啡协会指导员、欧洲精品咖啡协会讲师及考官资格认证，同时受德国咖啡研究教育机构“咖啡学人”委任为亚太区负责人。最近为了纠正大众对本地咖啡豆“赖比亚”（Liberica）品种的错误偏见而作出研究与演说，因此在2018年德国“斯图加特咖啡峰会”上获颁 Kaldi Award 咖啡生豆类科学奖，以表扬他对咖啡的贡献。
translations.introduction: 味觉审美因为时代变迁，地域差异，历史背景而存在着各自的偏好。Earthlings 咖啡工作坊创办人李威霆，从生命科学的视角告诉大家，咖啡的品鉴不应该有一套客观标准。因为主观的味觉偏好才能酝酿出世界多元的独特性。

title: Medical Facts? Myths?
name: Sam Wong
bio: Community pharmacist Sam Wong’s near-death experience from a surgery when he was young sparked his interest in the field of medicine. Besides his job, UKM-graduate Wong is also an avid writer - he has penned about topics covering general medicinal knowledge, and even fictional medical scenes from popular movies and TV series, in an informative and witty manner. Wong’s writings are well-received due to how well he simplified complex concepts; he has gone on to become Malaysia’s first pharmacist-columnist, authored a Chinese medical book, and currently manages his 7,000-follower Facebook page, @huangyaoshi. Wong sought to break the perception of pharmacy being an esoteric field and believes that understanding pharmaceutical knowledge should feel affable and have a human touch.
introduction: Pharmacist Sam Wong explained that the rising health awareness in society created two types of drug consumer: those who are very drug dependent; and those do not trust drugs at all. The former tends to be overly concerned, consumed drugs repetitively or overdose on drugs, causing them health problems without them realizing it. The latter refuses to consume drugs and rather rely on health supplements, thus reducing their treatment window. Both behaviors stemmed from the ignorance and illiteracy of drug knowledge. You are only responsible for your health when you aware of why, which, and how your drugs should be.

event.title: Relearn
event.description:
Since the day we came into this world, from our baby crawls to walking properly, from expressing joy, happiness, sorrow, and anger. We collectively learn from our daily observations through our hearts. We enter new stages of life at every interval, and past experiences then serve as our invisible guide to behave, perform, and improve our lives. How long has it been since you last learned diligently? The repetitive processes keep going on.

Going back to ground zero with our hearts composed, by releasing all knowledge gained and letting go, we seek new knowledge, begin drawing the line from a dot, which then diversifies, amplifies, and spreads into various ideas and concepts. Progress would not happen if there's no discernment after learning. Slack and incompetence would take place if there's no practice after discernment. Just like sailing against strong currents, the continuous quest for learning to acquire new knowledge, and the ability to adapt and be flexible during uncertainties lead to viable and positive outcomes resulting from changes. ‘Borderless’ in learning, let's get inspired by the beauty of learning.

translations.title: 藥物認知? 迷思?
translations.name: 黄宏圣
translations.bio: 黄宏圣，社区药剂师。一场与死神搏斗的手术启发他对药物的兴趣，误打误撞下投身药剂行业近十载。工作之余，他爱看书、电影和电视剧，也爱把生活经历与其药理知识结合，撰写成知识量高却不失风趣的文章，深受大众喜爱的同时也成功把药理知识普及大众。他是大马第一位药剂师专栏作者和中文医药书籍作家，经营着粉丝突破七千人的《小黄药师札记》脸书专页。打破传统药剂师深不可测的形象，他认为药不该只是冷冰冰的科学，也应该关乎着人心和人文。
translations.introduction: ”药剂师是你最贴身的药物顾问。“ 药剂师黄宏圣以本身的专业知识告诉大家，随着健康意识的提高，社会上普遍出现两种人：不吃药会死或打死不吃药的人。前者跑了多家医院，吃了重复药品，导致用药过量，健康每况愈下却不自知；后者拒绝用药，以保健品代之，却拖延了治疗的黄金时间。无论哪者，对药物副作用的轻视或是恐惧都源自于人们对药品知识的无知。唯有清楚知道为什么吃药、吃了什么药、怎样吃药，才是对自身健康最大的负责任！

title: Drugs / Super Skills for Life
name: Zoel Ng
occupation: Special Officer (Youth Development) of the Office of Deputy Minister of Youth and Sports
bio: Zoel Ng is the Special Officer (Youth Development) of the Office of Deputy Minister of Youth and Sports. From a family with secret society background for three generations, she marched into Putrajaya. She was a rascal who was suspended from school at the age of 16. She also went to juvenile rehabilitation centre before, but later on she established the Sungai Pinang Youth Community Centre, to design and implement various development policies for marginalized youth, and she has been in contact with thousands of youngsters every year. As this life affects the way of life, Zoel has become the shepherd of the wandering kids. Reflecting on her own experience with the belief “everything happened in the past is meant to serve as preparations for today”, she is convinced that even if one has taken wrong turns in life, there will always be a turning point. Although there may not be an immediate answer, but one day the answer will appear.
introduction: Zoel Ng came from a drug dealing family with secret society background that spanned three generations. Had she not experienced a turning point in her life, she would have ended up in jail or a rehabilitation center. From that point onwards, she started learning Jazz drum, served the community, pursued her studies in youth and social development psychology, established the Sungai Pinang Youth Community Centre, joined the Penang State Government, and eventually participated in policy making and assistance in monitoring the development of marginalized youth. Speaking of helping young people, her vast experience has empowered her with empathy and strength. As the Special Officer (Youth Development) of the Office of Deputy Minister of Youth and Sports, Zoel Ng would like to convey this message: Try to understand the marginalized groups in society. Our encouragement, even a kind, friendly gaze, may become the turning point in their life.

translations.title: 毒品 / 人生?
translations.name: 伍玥莹
translations.occupation: 大马青体部副部长办公室（青年发展）特务官员
translations.bio: 伍玥莹，大马青体部副部长办公室（青年发展）特务官员。从三代黑社会背景家庭，到走进布城——曾是在16岁被停学的流氓学生，到创办双溪槟榔社区青少年发展中心，设计并实行各项边缘青年发展政策。每年接触上千位青少年，走入感化院辅导，这条生命影响生命的路，让伍玥莹成为迷茫孩子的伯乐。凭借自身经历，以  “过去发生的一切，都是为了今天作准备”  为信念，她深信，人生哪怕路走错了，总有转折点，或许不会马上有答案，但有一天会出现。
translations.introduction: 一出生就输在起跑点，家里三代从事毒品与黑社会活动，如果没有遇到人生转角，今天可能就在监狱或戒毒所了。学打爵士鼓，服务社区，修读青年与社会发展心理学，创办双溪槟榔社区青少年发展中心 (EYP)，到加入槟州政府，参与政策制定与协助监督全国边缘青少年发展，都是生命准备的多个出口。扶持青少年，种种经历，反而形成了同理与能量。大马青体部副部长办公室 (青年发展) 特务官员伍玥莹想传达的是，尝试理解社会边缘人，我们的一份鼓励，一个善意的眼神，或许能为他们打开生命的转捩点。

title: Knowledge = Free, Education = Expensive
name: Nelson Ng Jia Jun
bio: Nelson Ng Jia Jun is the founder of ProjectEd, an NGO which strives to tackle education inequality in Malaysia. Growing up in a fishing village, Ng secured a prestigious Yayasan Khazanah scholarship to pursue MEng Aeronautics & Astronautics at the University of Southampton after being unsuccessful in his initial JPA application. Humbled by his experience and opportunities, Ng established ProjectEd, urging those with a scholarship to contribute RM45 monthly from their allowance into this student-led scholarship fund, thus empowering underprivileged students in their pursuit of tertiary education dreams. Through digital mentorships, scholarships funding, and educational workshops, Ng hopes that these initiatives can distribute resources and allow scholars to help fellow students in education and aspiration.
introduction: Due to the cancellation of JPA Scholarship in 2016, Nelson Ng’s dream of pursuing aerospace engineering overseas vanished. By chance, he was awarded with a Yayasan Khazanah scholarship which enabled him to complete his studies. He realised that the humbling experience of being granted a scholarship is a contribution to society itself. Hence, Ng founded ProjectEd with his friends, urging scholarship holders of our nation to donate RM 45 monthly to support students in need to fulfill their tertiary education dream. Currently, he has successfully supported 8 prospective students to enroll in university. Ng feels that everyone should contribute some resources that they have to create a better society.

translations.title: 知識 ↓ 教育 ↑ 獎學金
translations.name: 黄家俊
translations.occupation: 升学非营利单位ProjectEd创办人
translations.bio: 黄家俊，在籍大专生及升学非营利单位ProjectEd创办人。曾经，他因JPA奖学金遭取消导致留学梦碎，又因获得国库基金会赞助得以赴英深造而圆梦。如此转折，让他深深领悟到，奖学金是实现大学梦的关键因素。怀着一份回馈之心，他创立了ProjectEd，呼吁有幸获得奖学金的同学能透过每月45零吉的奖学金赞助、线上升学咨询或教育贫穷孩子升学重要性的方式，分享资源给其他有需要的学生，让学生能永续资助学生，推动人人都有平等机会上大学的教育理念。
translations.introduction: “The scholarship is given through you, not to you.” 2016 年取消的大马公共服务局 (JPA) 奖学金，将黄家俊到国外修读航天工程系的梦想沦为泡影。后来，意外获得 Yayasan Khazanah 奖学金得以圆梦的他感悟到奖学金的赋予是对社会贡献的责任后，他有感而发，与朋友们构建了ProjectEd项目，号召国内各地的奖学金得主每月捐献45令吉的奖学金，帮助有需要的学生实现升学之梦！如今已成功帮助8名优秀生升上大学的他认为，每一个人都应奉献手上的一点资源，让社会更美好。

title: Cycling > 2,000km < West Malaysia
name: Choong Zi En
bio: Interior designer and cafe curator Choong Zi En recently embarked on a cycling trip to rediscover his own country. Together with four other friends, the 27-year-old cycled around Peninsula Malaysia - across eleven states and 2,663km - a journey which took them 96 days. Choong felt that like many fellow Malaysians, he has succumbed to the numerous stereotypical views that we harbour towards our country, such as the rising crime rates, influx of foreign labours, and the unfavourable weather. He decided to prove himself wrong by taking on this adventure to re-experience his own country. Choong brought along coffee and tea to facilitate interaction with different people he met along the way, and through their stories, reflected on what it means to be Malaysian.
introduction: “The moment you leave your home, the learning journey begins”Before the cycling tour, Choong Zi En has a stereotyped view about Malaysia. However, this changed after his cycling tour with his friend around peninsular Malaysia. Every kilometer of his cycling drew him closer to revisit and relearn about Malaysia again.

event.title: Relearn
event.description:
Since the day we came into this world, from our baby crawls to walking properly, from expressing joy, happiness, sorrow, and anger. We collectively learn from our daily observations through our hearts. We enter new stages of life at every interval, and past experiences then serve as our invisible guide to behave, perform, and improve our lives. How long has it been since you last learned diligently? The repetitive processes keep going on.

Going back to ground zero with our hearts composed, by releasing all knowledge gained and letting go, we seek new knowledge, begin drawing the line from a dot, which then diversifies, amplifies, and spreads into various ideas and concepts. Progress would not happen if there's no discernment after learning. Slack and incompetence would take place if there's no practice after discernment. Just like sailing against strong currents, the continuous quest for learning to acquire new knowledge, and the ability to adapt and be flexible during uncertainties lead to viable and positive outcomes resulting from changes. ‘Borderless’ in learning, let's get inspired by the beauty of learning.

translations.title: Relearn

translations.title: 學
translations.description:
呱呱坠地 ↓↓ 蹒跚学步 ↙↘ 走向世界 ↙↘↙↘↙↘↙↘↙↘ 人的一生
就是在学习中不断充实自己 ▁ ▃ ▅ 人非生而知之,唯有勤学不辍 ∅
启蒙 → 幼教 → 小学 → 中学 → 大学 → 工作 → 家庭 → 生活 → 晚年
擅长学习，突破自我，是成功者最根本的本领，也是安身立命之本 △♂你♀有多久沒有好好学习了？生活日复一日 ◐ 相似的过程与结局持续上演中，我们坚持走出舒适区，保持学习态。学 让我们懂得抓不懈必有所获。回家的路不止一条 ╬ 你探索了几条?人生要紧几步 ⇒ 必须要有归零的心态,思想上从零开始,实践中从零做起,把心态调整到坐标原点 ⦿
学 让我们懂得知敬畏而后严谨。学而不思 不进 ⊠ 思而不用 则退 ←学无止境 ∞ 不负时光 我们一直在路上 →

translations.title:
單車 > 2,000 公里
< 西馬半島
translations.name: 钟梓恩
translations.occupation: 室内设计师兼咖啡厅馆长
translations.bio: 钟梓恩，室内设计师兼咖啡厅馆长。不过这次不聊设计，也不聊咖啡，来聊一趟单车之旅！27岁的他，突发奇想和4位友人骑单车环绕马来半岛一周，越过11个州属，经过2,663公里，深刻感受脚下这片既熟悉又陌生的土地。就像多数大马人存在的刻板印象，梓恩觉得这片土地治安不好、外劳众多、天气状况不佳等，决定出走，亲身体验自己的国家。除了基本配备，他带上了咖啡和茶，交换沿途故事。96天的单车之旅，骑入让他感动与反思的马来西亚。
translations.introduction: “踏出家门那一步，才是真正学习的开始。”未踏上3个月的单车之旅前，咖啡厅馆长钟梓恩对大马只有刻板印象，与朋友们骑单车环马来半岛后，对大马的印象从此改观，每骑过一公里，都让他重新认识这一片生于斯长于斯的土地。

title: A different Chinese
name: Neil Foo Seck Chyn
bio: Neil Foo is committed in his role as a connector in promoting the “new financing in building new retail” in Malaysia. He has held senior positions in various multinational companies. He witnessed the Asian financial crisis in 1998 and the economic storm of the US subprime mortgage in 2009. He has professional experience in global finance and is often invited to share his unique insights on different media platforms. He assists local SMEs to solve their difficulties and to embark on the trend of China’s and globalized economy, in order to shape the economic power of a nationality.
introduction: With 24 years of international experience as a liaison between SMEs, Neil Foo discovered that the Chinese communities who live in different countries come with their distinctive characters, ideologies and values, which influenced their styles of business negotiations. For instance, Mainland Chinese possess a clarity of mind with a focus on figures. They believe that boasting about the brand and size of one's business would increase its awareness and visibility, therefore they won't be modest about it.

translations.title: 窺探華人特性，你溝通對了嗎?
translations.name: 符策勤
translations.bio: 符策勤，致力在马来西亚推动 “新融资建构新零售” 的对接人。曾在各跨国公司担任要职的他，目睹1998年的亚洲金融危机与2009年美国次贷经济风暴的危机，对全球金融有专业的经验，常受邀到不同的媒体平台分享其独到见解，并协助本地中小企业解决困境，踏上中国和全球化的经济顺风车，以此塑造民族的经济力量。
translations.introduction: 具有24年游走国际间的中小企业传话人符策勤发现生活在不同国度的华人，因为拥有着各自的特性、思想、价值观，进而影响他们与别人谈生意的方式。比如中国人的思路清晰, 数字观念强，认为夸大自己的品牌和规模才能被看见，不会过于谦虚。

title: Literature – Life
name: Hoo Joo Chuan
bio: Hoo Joo Chuan is the regular guest of Hua Zong (Flower Trail) Literature Award. Without background in professional writing, he has changed his areas of work various times from farming, construction, education and manufacturing, in order to expand his vision. Furthermore, with his sentimentalism inherited from his parents, he is not only delicately observant, but also refined in describing the vicissitudes of life. For instance, his four-year experience taking care of his sick parents is touching. In order to elevate the local standard of literary reportage, he bought a flight ticket to go to Taiwan to observe the exceptional marathoner with Cerebral palsy Cheng Zhee Long closely during marathon, just to listen to his lament out of pain. He presents readers a raw, uncensored and authentic stories behind the figures or incidents, and therefore he deservingly won the Hua Zong literary reportage award three consecutive times.
introduction: Literary reporter Hoo Joo Chuan goes the extra mile to produce writings that aims to reflect the vicissitudes of life. He travelled to Taiwan to accompany the journey of a cerebral palsy marathoner to understand the latter’s experiences; he also made the journey to Balik Pulau, Penang to search for the “fifth taste” of durian and sought to understand the durian renaissance. Hoo’s delicately observant nature, coupled with his deep writing style, presented readers with raw and authentic stories. He believes that contemplation, rather than listening, can bring out the essence and truth of a story.

translations.title: 文字力量—生命容器
translations.name: 许裕全
translations.bio: 许裕全，花踪文学奖的常客。非写作专科出生的他，间中转换职场领域如养殖、建筑、教育及制造业开阔人生视野，辅以天生父母赋予的多愁善感，不仅使他观察入微，更能细腻描写各种人生百态，如他与父母共处四年的病苦经历令人动容；为了提升本地报导文学素质，他买机票到台湾贴身跟进脑性麻痺超级马拉松选手曾志龙跑马拉松，只为了听他亲口喊 “痛” ，把人物或事件背后赤裸裸的故事原汁原味呈现给读者看，以致他连续三届获得花踪报告文学奖的殊荣。
translations.introduction: ”用文字书写生命的纪录片 —— 报导文学。” 为了贴身采访脑麻马拉松健将在超级马拉松的经历，马华作家许裕全买了机票，全程陪伴；为了了解榴莲甜、苦、酒、花香之外的「第五味」, 他到槟城浮罗山背亲身品尝这场榴莲的“文艺复兴”，尝到了「麻」。他用内心的细腻，感受现实的真相，再用深入的文字撰写，还原真相现场。对他来说，最接近事实的核心，不是比谁听得多分享得多，但是思考了多深。

title: Still Your Mind
name: Huang Chih-chun
bio: Huang Chih-chun is the music director of U-Theatre Taiwan, a performance troupe known for incorporating elements of Tao philosophy, meditation and martial arts into drumming. Malaysian-born Huang started learning drumming at six and martial arts at ten, before taking a number of spiritual journeys to India and Tibet. He joined the Cloud Gate Dance Theatre and has gone on tour in Europe, the US and Africa. In 1993, Huang co-founded U Theatre with Liu Rou-Yu, a Taiwanese theatrical performer, and introduced novel facets of drumming by embodying the regime of “meditation before drumming”, thus synthesizing the two disciplines into a new form of performance art.
introduction: What is the secret of performing arts? U-Theatre Taiwan music director Huang Chih-chun believes that a performance artist should master three aspects, namely the rational core, the emotional core, and the movement core, which would allow them an ever-changing and endless expressive ability. In the case of a drumming performance, the three aspects are rhythm (rational), music (emotional), and beat (movement).

Malaysian-born Huang started learning drumming at six and martial arts at ten, before taking a number of spiritual journeys to India and Tibet. In 1993, Huang co-founded U Theatre with Liu Rou-Yu, a Taiwanese theatrical performer, and introduced novel facets of drumming by embodying the regime of “meditation before drumming”, thus synthesizing the two disciplines into a new form of performance art.
translations.introduction: What is the secret of performing arts? U-Theatre Taiwan music director Huang Chih-chun believes that a performance artist should master three aspects, namely the rational core, the emotional core, and the movement core, which would allow them an ever-changing and endless expressive ability. In the case of a drumming performance, the three aspects are rhythm (rational), music (emotional), and beat (movement).

translations.title: 喧嚣中修行 ∞ 宁静中击鼓
translations.name: 黄志群
translations.bio: 黄志群，“优人神鼓“ 音乐总监。自6岁起开始学习击鼓，10岁学习中国武术，浸淫在武术与击鼓的领域逾廿年。他曾加入云门舞集，随团在欧洲、美国和非洲等许多国家巡演。1993年，曾赴印度学习静坐的他与刘若瑀联手创办。“优人神鼓” ，以 “先学静坐，再习击鼓” 的方式，奠定优人以击鼓与武术为表演形式的基底。优人们皆称他 “阿禅师父”，其击鼓之神韵与技巧，堪称现代华人年轻击鼓艺术家之翘楚。主要作品包括《听海之心》、《金刚心》、《禅武不二》、《空林山风》、《入夜山岚》、《喂，向前走》、《郑和1433》、《时间之外》、《墨具五色》等等。
translations.introduction:
表演艺术的奥秘是什么？

优人神鼓音乐总监黄志群认为，表演艺术只要掌握三个要素，即理智中心、情感中心和运动中心，就可以千变万化，无穷无尽。若以击鼓为例，就是节奏 (理智中心)、音色 (情感中心) 和时间感 (运动中心)。

title: Building Merdeka
name: Dr. Lai Chee Kien
bio: Dr. Lai Chee Kien is a registered architect and professor in Singapore. He is the author of The Merdeka Interviews, Building Merdeka: Independence Architecture in Kuala Lumpur and etc. Among ten buildings that represented the spirit of the birth of a nation circa 1957, some of them are still being used today, while some have been demolished. In order to record the iconic buildings of this period, he has worked diligently to visit artists, engineers and architects abroad who participated in the construction project back then. Through their recollection, he figured out how the architects, under limited resources, carried the expectations of the founding father, Tunku Abdul Rahman, towards the construction of the national identity. With the combination of avant-garde creativity and local elements, the unseen deeds of the country’s founding philosophy were then constructed.
introduction: Dr. Lai Chee Kien, a registered architect and researcher on the history of architecture in Southeast Asia, shared stories on how the pioneering architects in Malaya helped to achieve Tunku Abdul Rahman’s vision of our new nation in the years before and after our independence was gained in 1957. Working under limited resources, they managed to combine ingenious techniques, authentic ideas and local elements to create buildings that leave a legacy of our nation’s founding principles until today.

event.title: Relearn
event.description:
Since the day we came into this world, from our baby crawls to walking properly, from expressing joy, happiness, sorrow, and anger. We collectively learn from our daily observations through our hearts. We enter new stages of life at every interval, and past experiences then serve as our invisible guide to behave, perform, and improve our lives. How long has it been since you last learned diligently? The repetitive processes keep going on.

Going back to ground zero with our hearts composed, by releasing all knowledge gained and letting go, we seek new knowledge, begin drawing the line from a dot, which then diversifies, amplifies, and spreads into various ideas and concepts. Progress would not happen if there's no discernment after learning. Slack and incompetence would take place if there's no practice after discernment. Just like sailing against strong currents, the continuous quest for learning to acquire new knowledge, and the ability to adapt and be flexible during uncertainties lead to viable and positive outcomes resulting from changes. ‘Borderless’ in learning, let's get inspired by the beauty of learning.

translations.title: 學
translations.description:
呱呱坠地 ↓↓ 蹒跚学步 ↙↘ 走向世界 ↙↘↙↘↙↘↙↘↙↘ 人的一生
就是在学习中不断充实自己 ▁ ▃ ▅ 人非生而知之,唯有勤学不辍 ∅
启蒙 → 幼教 → 小学 → 中学 → 大学 → 工作 → 家庭 → 生活 → 晚年
擅长学习，突破自我，是成功者最根本的本领，也是安身立命之本 △♂你♀有多久沒有好好学习了？生活日复一日 ◐ 相似的过程与结局持续上演中，我们坚持走出舒适区，保持学习态。学 让我们懂得抓不懈必有所获。回家的路不止一条 ╬ 你探索了几条?人生要紧几步 ⇒ 必须要有归零的心态,思想上从零开始,实践中从零做起,把心态调整到坐标原点 ⦿
学 让我们懂得知敬畏而后严谨。学而不思 不进 ⊠ 思而不用 则退 ←学无止境 ∞ 不负时光 我们一直在路上 →

translations.title: 建国建筑守旧创新
translations.name: 赖启健
translations.bio: 赖启健博士，新加坡注册建筑师兼大学教授，著有《默迪卡对话录》、《建造默迪卡：吉隆坡的独立时期建筑1957-1966》等。1957年前后10项代表建国精神的建筑物，有者至今仍被使用，有者则被拆除，为了记录这段时期的代表性建筑，他曾不辞劳苦往返国外访问当年参与建设工程的元老艺术家、工程师与建筑师，从他们的回忆中，梳理出关于建筑师如何在有限的资源下，承载着国父东姑阿都拉曼对于国族建构的期许，再结合前卫创意与本土元素，建造出具有国家创立理念的不为人知事迹。
translations.introduction: 1957 年独立前后，10 项代表建国精神的建筑物纷纷建立，专研默迪卡 (独立) 建筑的建筑史学家赖启健博士透过分享建筑物的小故事，解码先贤建筑师们如何在有限的资源下，承载着国父东姑阿都拉曼对于国族建构的期许，再结合精湛技术、前卫创意与本土元素，建造出具有国家创立理念的不为人知事迹。

title: Placemaking
name: Low Tuck Chuan
bio: Low Tuck Chuan, with his keenness nurtured from Taiwanese film school, he first ventured into the fields of education, media and natural rubber, and later moved to Kluang during 2013 general election. He proclaimed himself as the missionary who sow the seeds of community development, also opines that placemaking will attract economic investment and professionals to the town, but it’s also crucial to understand how to live and stay in tune with the local residents. He has been the organizer of the event named “Let’s go, back to the old street to celebrate the Mid-Autumn Festival” which took place in Jalan Ismail, Kluang. He has undertaken to organize the Kluang Festival too. Besides that, he transformed the Grisek community from an abandoned territory to a place where the villagers are proud of. As for now, he is promoting 43 hand-made Malay Tapir figures reading project, with 1,200 books hidden in the belly of tapir figures, with the aim to enrich the minds of the remote villages, creating the atmosphere of reading and dedication, and continue to deepen the education and community development.
introduction: Placemaking is the story between people and land. Low Tuck Chuan rejuvenated Taman Merdeka Kluang, organized the Kluang Festival, carried out the Roaming Malay Tapir Project, and transformed the Grisek community, turning the small village into a place where villagers are proud of. He opined that groundwork - living with the residents and listening to villagers' needs - is important. Tuck Chuan's duty is to gather everyone to join the community, with the hope that everyone would contribute their expertise and time, in order to make the community a better place. Only stories with warmth and significance are worthwhile to be propagated and passed on.

translations.title: 被城市遗忘的社区苏醒吧!
translations.name: 刘德全
translations.bio: 刘德全，拥有留台电影系的敏锐，先在教育、媒体、橡胶领域打滚，后于2013年大选迁居居銮。自喻散播社区营造种子的传教士的他，认为地方创生不仅吸引经济与专业人士入镇，还需懂得蹲点，与当地居民同调生活。先后在居銮依斯迈街办 “走，回老街过中秋” 、承办居銮节，还改造玉射社区，把荒废之地变成乡民自豪之处，后续涟漪不断。如今推广43只手作马来貘阅读计划，让其腹部藏有的1,200本书籍充实偏乡心灵，吹起阅读与回馈的风气，让教育与社区的营造继续深耕。
translations.introduction: 社区营造是人和土地的故事，“日出希望” 推手刘德全先后活化居銮独立公园，承办居銮节，推行流浪马来膜计划，改造玉射社区，把小村小镇变成乡民自豪之处。他认为蹲点很重要，和居民生活在一起，聆听和组织村民要的东西。德全的工作是把人聚集起来，投入社区，期待大家付出专业和时间，一起让社区更美好。而有意义和温度的故事，才能被传播和传承。

title: Spirit Singing
name: Anna Chong
bio: Anna Chong is an indie singer-songwriter from Seremban. Her debut album, ‘Tack’, won the Best Indie Album at the 2015 Malaysia PWH Music Award. Chong continuously experiments with different sounds, styles and lyrics - she composed her songs in Chinese, English and even gibberish. Her ethereal second album, ‘A Reset of Earth’, was launched in 2017. Chong has composed songs for numerous singers including Winnie Hsin, Claire Kuo, Rainie Yang and Andy Lau. Besides singing and composing, Chong is also involved in music arrangement, teaching, post-production and organizing music festivals.
introduction: To Anna Chong, music is neither a tool for comparison nor to impress others, but a medium to record life. She is true to herself by accepting her uniqueness and chooses to be intimate with the incomprehensible; she listens to her voice for composing the most authentic and original music.

translations.title: 源回歌者灵魂
translations.name: 庄启馨
translations.bio: 庄启馨，大马创作歌手。做接地气和有种的音乐，是她致力创作的理念。她在2013年首发《TACK》专辑，于2015年荣获马来西亚娱协奖最佳独立音乐专辑奖，并在2017年推出一手包办的专辑《源回A Reset of Earth》，让人们听出她这些年的成长与印迹。就写词人身份，她也曾写过歌给辛晓琪、郭静、杨丞琳、刘德华等著名歌手。至今，已为人母的启馨仍不偏离地在音乐路上装备自己，学习编曲、教课、后制、办音乐会等，同时坚持写着有种的歌，唱出地气的feel。
translations.introduction: 于大马创作歌手 Anna 庄启馨而言，音乐是她用来记载生命的媒介，不是用来比较和讨喜的工具。那就是她写歌的目的。她对自己坦诚，接受自己的与众不同，选择与深不可测的心亲密接触，用心聆听自己并且创作最真实及原始的音乐。

title:
时尚造型思考
Stylised Your Thinking!
name: Allien Gan
bio: Allien Gan is a Shanghai-based freelance fashion stylist. His talent for styling was first unearth by a judge during a blind audition for the reality TV show, I Wanna Be A Model. At the 2010 STYLO fashion week, Gan debuted his avant-garde collection which incorporated recycled materials into its design. His resourcefulness proved to be useful and laid the foundation for his styling career when he moved to Shanghai for better prospects in 2013. Gan has worked with major fashion labels like Louis Vuitton, Burberry, and Michael Kors; he has also done styling works for artists including Zhang Ziyi, Tang Wei, Dilraba Dilmurat, and Jackson Yee.
introduction: Shanghai-based freelance fashion stylist Allien Gan has collaborated with international stars and world-class brands as their image consultant. However, instead of visiting luxurious fashion houses for his pieces, Gan preferred to explore hardware stores and second-hand shops. He believes in sourcing locally, storing efficiently and improvising intelligently according to his client. Gan advocates that everyone should be finding their own self-worth and value on their own stage.
